I highy encourage you guys to try them the Ptron one's, they are absolutely amazing!

name: Vineet
title: Defective
content: It worked smoothly for 4-5 months. No ear pain during long usage but left side stopped working suddenly about 5th month from purchase. It comes with no warranty so can't do anything. Either order new one or listen from right side only. seems manufacturing defect to me.

name: Siddharth
title: Very Disappointed with this JBL Lead
content: I bought the above JBL lead, just a month a ago and today is the date when one ear plug becomes disfunctional.. I mean this is really pathetic. Now the question will arise of not handling the product with care but actually this is not the case.. I am so frustrated with this kind of situation as it is not expected from JBL's product. I am so disappointed. Now, I have to again invest my money in buying a new lead because the returning window is closed.. I request to look into this case with utmost importance and wanted a replace. How can JBL's product can be waste within a month.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent sound at this price. Got it for RS.600 on sale
content: At Rs.600, it's worth the money. It sounds just right if used with a good quality streaming for audio. Also conference calls and mic is Crystal clear. I have used Boat Basshead 225 for almost over a year, it had better punch to it than the JBL, though some may feel boathead has a forced bass.. Also the mic got spoiled in Boat within 3 months of use.. The wires for JBL are bit delicate and are not tangle free, but manageable with care. Overall 4/5. Those looking for a more sturdy and more bass, with tangle free wires, use the BoAt Basshead 225 instead.

name: Razique Sherief
title: Quality sound for the price
content: Good sound quality at this price range. Not sure whether it has a noise cancellation feature, but it does insulate from ambient sound as it is well tight inside the ears. Only con I found is about the durability of the cable. It feels so thin in your hands and not sure how long can I depend on it. A flat cable should have been much better.

name: Manojkumar  Jaiswal
title: Bought 2 times
content: Bought this product twice from Amazon. Minimum price is around ‚Çπ550 and max is ‚Çπ600.. It lasts for around 10-12 months delivering premium sound quality for listening songs and watching movies. The best thing this earphone has that no other earphone has provided is ots microphone. I talk alot for hours and never till now I have got a complaint from the other side for sound quality. It's perfect but a bit delicate after 10 months cause it's wires start cracking up, and wire cracks around the jack and speaker but still it works. So at the end I'll say close your eyes and go for it, and you'll never think about other earphones considering the quality it delivers.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏èüíôüíöüéß

name: Hardik Bhalodiya
title: Irritating delivery system
content: This feedback is not about JBL earphones quality. JBL earphones definitely have Rich sound quality with bass. Issue is about delivery system. First delivery person call and tell me that I wasn't found my house so that I go at area office and collect it. I said okay than after when I tried to call than he is out of range and even after 3 days of that incident Amazon can't tried to contact me for again delivery so I decide to return and my gift plan to gave this earphone to close friend was canceled.

name: Ananth
title: Good performance , not long lasting
content: As of the day of review i have used this earbud for almost 5 months now.. The sound is crisp amd clear, bass hits just the right spot, no distortions, the mic works perfectly as intended.. Now to the downside , just like any other wored earphones i finally faced the nightmare of losing sound from one of the earbuds , in my case it was the right side that also had the mic attachment, so it began with random sound controls and google assistant popping up withhout any prompt which means the mic system was affected first, then the right side went mute .. For the price i would say it is still a good product, not sure if the care i provided was what broke the earbud but i am still happy.

name: legallyblinde
title: i'd recommend
content: i don't buy headphones over 50/- so i may not be someone to rely on when it comes to headphones.. the noise cancellation is good. so is the bass if you turn it up in the phone (obviously).. but if you're travelling in a bus where people are having heated "debates", take your headphones off and enjoy feeling superior to those lecherous troglodytes.

name: Souvik Gayen
title: Is this c100si or c150si ??? However sound quality is amazing.
content: Thanks to Amazon for giving this @549 only. But I have little confusion about this head phones. Is this really c100si or c150si? flipkart and original jbl website shows this is c150si. Warranty will work or not , I don't know. It's very light weight & Sound quality is awesome (5star) ... No pain in ear, material quality is poor because of its built quality. very thin wire and looks microphone joint wire may be broken any time. So little bit confusing about durability. But it goes very well. Perfect for Redmi note 5 pro. overall giving it 4.5 star.

name: Chandan Agrawal
title: Very Poor and Cheap Quality
content: Worst Quality JBL Headphones that I have ever used. These are too delicate and not at all sturdy.. Sound quality is too poor, very similar to any street quality ones. Forget about Bass and Noise Cancellation.. The price may lure you to purchase, but you'll really repent paying a ruppee more than 100 anyway.. JBL, I never expected such a thing. It certainly has embarked a negative mark on your reputation.

name: JuJu
title: Mi Basic Vs JBL
content: You Don't Need Bass!! for sweetness you also need Mid and High Frequencys.. In this price range good sound. quality. Much more Balanced sound compaired to Mi Basic Earphones.. If you're thinking to buy Mi Basic Earphone, spend some extra and buy JBL. I compaired both Mi and JBL side by side. It's my true experience.

name: Kunal Tanwar
title: Good product
content: The amount of bass coming from these tiny monster was quite surprising for as I've been using T110 and bought that same model twice, but I took a chance with this. And bull's eyeüòé. Pros:. - Good sound quality. - high , mids and lows are equally balanced. - such kind of bass at this price is definitely. worth it. - microphone is a plus point. - comfortable fit ( better than t 110 ). - angled earpiece gives good grip. Cons:. - sometimes highs are bit sharp. - not a flat wire so tangling could be an. issuee. Conclusion :. A must buy even if it lasts for a year or two, worth the priceüëç. Bought it for ‚Çπ 599/-

name: Mallikarjun N
title: Simply awesome
content: Don't listen to any other feedback. See it to believe it one says i would say listen and experience it.I am using this since a month its hassle free and great product. I am also using IBall Bluetooth plug ins, but JBL is simply awesome. Trust me JBL is once of the best products. Test these JBL plugins in you tube you either dolby atmos or any bass music, will feel every bit of sound even at very low volumes.. Like- great bass and treble and clear voice and dialogue's.. Dislike- Cannot think of any.. Thanks JBL.

name: Jaswant Toor
title: Fantastic and fantastic.
content: Amazing. If i have rated it 5 stars, i mean it fully. I have numerous reasons that why this product is fabulous. But i have noticed a cons also after testing it for 20 seconds of my first use.. The basic Pros are:. üéßThe coordination if highs and lows is hus fab. I have used it now for a while on Poweramp and handles every effect as if it is a high end priced earphone. Hands off yo JBL.. üéßThe bass and treble is jus fantastic. Basically before buying this i was quit a bit nervous about the bass as i only want a high quality bass but JBL c1000si had proved itself in terms of bass and treble. So no issue on that topic.. üéßIf we talk about the quality that is also above my satisfaction but the problem is that the wire is not tang free. Otherwise they are pretty much handy and are available in different colours and are probably fantastic.. The Cons are as follows:. When i first used it on poweramp, i was too impressed by the sound quality because that was exactly what i needed. But i noticed that if we increase the volume to full, the headphones affects our ears and if we feel somehow uncomfortable from ears after hearing the sound at full for long time.. ‚ô©‚ô©‚ô©‚ô©‚ô©So that was my experience which i thought to share and i have an eye on this earpiece then without waiting for a second, place the order. They are fabulous.

name: Prasannakumar
title: It is suitable for bass lover, but It'll damage ur ears.
content: It is not reached my expectations. Only bass is not enough. But also stereo and vocals are needed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Defective product and hopeless after sales support from JBL
content: I bought this product in Bangalore and realised that it is one of the worst headphones I‚Äôve ever bought from JBL. In less than a month‚Äôs time, the headset has stopped functioning. There‚Äôs no sound from either end while making a voice call and the sound suddenly oscillates while listening to music. Even the headset is not so comfortable to wear for a long time.. The customer support from JBL is even worse because they asked me to visit their one and only service centre in Jayanagar, Bangalore for replacement and the cost of traveling is almost equivalent to the cost of the product. There‚Äôs no other way that JBL would offer you a refund or replacement. So, my seven hundred rupees are gone for a toss.

name: Ramanathan Kashinathan
title: Good product, with a bad build
content: Had brought this product, over 3 times on amazon.. 1. The sound quality, is awesome (4/5). 2. Reasonable good outside noise cancellation (2.5/5). Drawbacks. 1. It isn't worth the price it commands (buy if you get it for 500 or less). 2. The build quality is bad, i.e. its really bad. After a few months, the wires start to degrade and the degradation is quite visible. At certain places, the internals are pretty visible.. Overall, its a product you should buy, if you wish to buy an earphone with good sound + mic, and don't mind replacing them over 6-12 months.

name: siddhant
title: Don't buy before reading it. It may save u
content: If u r looking for nice earphone which gives nice quality , good bass , amazing microphone. Go for it, it has only one big problem which is huge.. I am using it for 5 months and I haven't got any problem with it except the material of earbud,. After using it for an hour u may start to feel a lot of pain in ur ear ,. It doesn't have any sound leakage so ur ear might feel pain after using it for an hour. In my case I don't use it anymore due to this problem, if u gonna buy it to wear for 2-3 hrs, then say bye bye to ur ear cause u r gonna damage them.. For this prise range I'll give 4/5. Subscribe to iceman1000

name: Ashwini Phatak
title: Bass up your life.......
content: This product is of high quality material, great sound , bass comes alive when you use it with Dolby Atmos, you can feel every bit of sound produced, works fine, has 3sets of ear buds for every size , noise cancellation is excellent,and also it's quality....

name: Manoj Aggarwal
title: Expensive in relation to the quality
content: Product does not appear at par with its brand name.. Quality of the wire is similar to the one you get in an airplane for free.. Quality of boat headphone which came at 2/3 the cost is far superior both in terms of sound quality and product make.. U recommend this one to be avoided. I did not see that it does not have a return option.

name: Shreyas Surve
title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY SPENT
content: Into 4 months of usage and one earpiece stopped working. The build is quite flimsy and the sound quality is not upto the mark for its price range. The mic was either defective or not good enough, had to hold it near my mouth for others to hear me clearly. DO NOT BUT THIS PRODUCT.

name: Xtreamer
title: Amazing sound quality.
content: I really like the quality of the sound which a user experience through these earphone. Best in it's category.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Good option. Would recommend.
content: I was highly skeptical of the product I was gonna receive but thankfully wasn't disappointed! I won't say I'm an expert in these things, but I know this much. It sounds great, is sturdy, survived a few water splashes and I don't have any complaints so far. It's been 4 months since I bought it. So far so good.

name: Neha
title: Nice..
content: Recently bought this product, delivered on time and product quantity is nice.

name: hel2heAven
title: Awesome but poor build quality
content: I'm writing this review almost after 1 yr use.. Base and sound quality is top notch in this price. I don't have any concerns with sound quality and other things but very poor build quality it's having.. I had to replace the item just after one week use cause my earphones got unplugged from Jack accidentally and it stopped working.. After 2 months use, the joint at Jack got damaged (same as shown in image) and one side stopped working. I gave it for replacement in service center.. After getting new piece I started enjoying the music again but same problem occurred. Now it's damaged again at Jack joint.. If you think to buy this then remember u should take excessive care of it. And it's not at all recommended for work outs ( lil dumbell just pressed on mic and it stopped working).. Everything is first class expect the build quality. It's not rough handlers like me.

name: Hari Srinivas
title: Good earphones for the price. Just don't Overuse it
content: First things first: This is a very good earphone considering its price. It is loud, bass is ok, highs and lows are good.. If you get it at around 500-550 during a sale I would a say it's a steal.. But........... My experience was not that good.. Initially it was working all fine but suddenly one day the right side of the earphone was not working. This may be due to overuse. But that's not an excuse to JBL. Luckily it was under warranty period and I went to the nearest JBL store and had it replaced.

name: i_YGS
title: Average and OK product
content: It is ok earphone not like others. there is ok sound quality and bass quality is very poor and low. there is many brand earphone available in this price but there bass quality is much better than this noise cancellation is good. overall product is OK and average...

name: Rishi RAJ
title: Not impressed.
content: Good but it should be balanced. On connecting with diff phones it has diff output.. If u r song lover and u need quality then don't go for it.. Bass is good but if wanted to increase the sound by more than half then treble becomes sharper that is unbearable.. And on some phones treble is low but voice is suppressed.

name: Pranav
title: Not durable at all
content: This is the most useless earphones. I used it for around 4 months and then suddenly i noticed the noise of one earphone to decrease gradually. I got it changed from service centre with no difficulty and then after 4 months i got the same problem again. There was a person at the service centre who got the same earphones with the same problem and a call also came to the executives for the same problem in same model. The sound quality was good, can say one of the best in this range but not durable at all. I suggest to buy some other earphones in the same range.

name: Jyothi K.
title: Premium-looked budget earphones.
content: Good built Quality. Premium look. Has 3 eartips(small and large.It comes in medium size eartips). Long good quality rubber cable. Nice mic. Super sound and bass. Can hear a little bit of sound from outside. Super bass. Can feel it when the volume is in 70% to 100%. Nice Quality eartips but after long use(about 15 to 30 minutes) the ears will start paining. Cable is long enough.

name: Shyam Kumar Edodi
title: One side stopped working after 6 days of moderate use
content: I used the earphones sparingly for about 6 days and one side stopped working out of nowhere. I am absolutely flabbergasted. As someone who has used many high end earphones, I was keen to try what JBL had to offer with this relatively cheap pair. Unfortunately, I am completely disappointed. I wouldn't even let my dog listen to the the disgusting quality of the earphones. There is almost no bass, and it performs even worse at higher frequencies. After this experience, I am more despondent with JBL and their ability to deliver on good earphones. Do not buy this product even if it is the only choice.

name: ashik
title: Only for treble lovers
content: I thought this in ear headphones will be good as everyone suggested it..... But the sound lacks bass..... It has very thin wire which will become a mess in future. 3/10 for bass. 8/10 for treble. 7/10 for vocals. 9.9/10 for Branding. 9/10 For Accessories. 8/10 for packing. But I'm a Bass lover.... So I'm disappointed in the product.. The Branding in JBL products will be always higher.... This had JBL logo on everywhere. Anyway. This is easy to carry. The treble is good. Those who like bass don't go for it.. You will regret it. This earphone is only for Treble and vocal lovers. Thank you..... Hope you buy Products worth your money.......

name: Niraj Dholakiya
title: Very good sound.... weak microphone reception
content: This product is apt for listening to good quality music, as it provides good bass and clear notes.. Only shortcoming of this product is while taking the call other person can not get your voice clearly.. That means weak reception by microphone. Otherwise its a good product.. the knob can be bit of issues if you wear under a helmet.

name: Mohit Patel
title: Great for the Sound Lover but material quality is weak
content: Wire is not that great but sound quality is amazing yes one can use long time if handled with care I have been using it since 1.5 years and orderd 2nd for my brother although if keeping in mind the sound it delivers at the price point we get the sound is amazing if you are a sound lover and have limited budget than close your eyes and get this it won't disappoint you but if you want a durable headphones than this is not for you

name: ANUVAB DAS
title: Worthy one but the plug is not so up to the mark
content: wow, amazing sounds like i am in heaven but less than senheiser cx, now in may 2019. my headphones the left one got damaged,now i am listening with one.. After one year the headphone got totally damaged and after one replacement from the jbl store it is now replaced by a new one.. now today on 5th june 2020 I have totally rejected the speaker and headphones.. I wondered how JBL is so cheap.. So JBL is not a better one.. Now shifting to senheizer

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy, stops working in a month and u will not get a replacement due to any bullshit reason
content: JBL has lost it's quality plus there's no use of warranty. The images shows that even if there's a wear and tear on the outside (with no physical damage and this wear and tear will happen due to bad quality rubber which they intentionally use), they will say that u r not eligible fr replacement. I even asked them how can the wear and tear on the rubber affect the audio and how did the audio stop working when there's no physical damage, they won't answer u.. Plus, my earphones stopped working 1 month and 15 days after buying.

name: Adithya Easwaran
title: Good earphones with lack of bass
content: I have been using this earphone for the past 3 months . From my experience the earphones are worth buying as no issues found till date. Reviewing about the sound quality ,it is quite good but it is missing the bass in it .You won‚Äôt be able to experience the full sound experience as the bass is not that impressive in this earphone.. The durability is quite good till date .The earphone is not tangle free though. The quality of the wires are above average. I bought this earphone for Rs.699 . I feel the product is worth buying for the money offered to me(even Rs.800 seems to be good bet).. I would not recommend this earphone for those when want to feel the bass.Finally the amazon‚Äôs timely delivery was impressive.

name: vamshi
title: Best choice under 1k. JBLüéßüëå5‚≠ê
content: Worth buying with its price and quality.. JBL C100SI is 1st best option for in-ear earphones below 1k. EDIT:- after 6 months usage - above earphones pause Play button which is right wire pulled upwards (by mistake) which copper wire is visible but still is works PERFECTüëç . for sound Quality it's üéßüëå and üí™ durability which is value for moneyüí∏üí∏100‚úì. and I have tested boAt earphones 100 which is around ‚Çπ350-390. it is also good and has good bass but deep sound Quality highs and lows ,bass,pitch,etc. are perfect you can enjoy song. boat 100 also best choice if you budget is below 500/- or else you can go for JBL C100SI without any doubt. ‚≠ê/‚≠ê/‚≠ê/‚≠ê/‚≠ê.

name: Santanu Bose
title: For those who want quality sound
content: For any earphone apart from earphone hardware quality, one of the main factor is what mobile device you are using. When I connected this with Realme U1 it performed brilliant, but with my Redmi Note 8 its performance was not that level. Another main factor is eartip size. With bigger size its base become heavy and with smaller eartip sound become sharp a little bit. Anyway the sound quality is good enough within 500 - 800 /- price bracket.. Comparing with Boat 225 and Realme Buds2 it is superior in terms of sound quality not build quality.. If you are a music lover, can go for it.

name: Vike
title: Nice earphones to buy under our budget
content: This have more clarity in low's, mid's, and high's. Before I was using senhizer cx180 which is class leading with price of 800 with no mic. This JBL's had mic and good build and comparable sound quality. I bought it for 630rs which is also less when we see what it offers. Finally good one.

name: Sumit Singh
title: Absolute bang for the buck
content: This is the best earphone under Rs 1000, better than boat bassheads 221 and jbl T110, I've tried all of them... I'm writing this review after complete one year of usage,. I got this earphone for Rs 699/-. Pros:. 1.Awesome sound quality for what you're paying. 2.Bass 4/5, the bass has improved since I bought it.. Its sounds much better now. 3. Treble 5/5. 4. Comfortable. 5. Superb mic, I play pubg a lot, and the mic record really clear voice.. 6. Very sturdy, today I accidentally washed it with my jacket and I was worried if its gonna work.. I let it dry in the sunlight and worked fine as new.. Cons:. 1. The buds often come off now, be careful. 2. No anti tangle cable. Nothing else

name: Kusaraju Padala
title: Working even after Washing
content: I am using these earphones for approximately 10 months. I ordered this on 14th February 2018 and today (13-01-2019) I washed them in washing machine for almost 70 minutes. And they soaked in water for the entire time. When I saw them after completion of washing I am really pissed off and wanted to throw them away but just wanted to check how they did in water. Bingo they are working as brand new. Thank you JBL I know they are not water proof or anything but what a brand. I did all the earphones tests on youtube, they topped in all the tests. #QualityDoesMatters.. Once again Thank you JBL

name: Naveed
title: Classic Acoustics
content: As expected from JBL.. If you are looking for excellent sound and comfort, this is it, go for it.. If you're looking for Bass, opt headphones. Earphones are always for moderate acoustics.. Overall, the best in its class, don't spend more money by opting others as this fulfills all requirements from an earphone.

name: nisha k.
title: JBL made me 'Angry'!
content: From a brand like JBL, this earphone does not fit the bill.. The bass quality 'which JBL is very well known for' was not there,because of which many sounds were missing! Though, clarity is overtly enhanced. The provided earbuds can get slightly painful if you don't have BIG EARS!

name: Prakhar T.
title: BEST EARPHONE AT RS.599
content: IF YOU WANT THE BEST EARPHONE OF RS.599, JBL C100SI IS THE BEST CHOICE EVER.. 1) SOUND QUALITY = THE SOUND QUALITY IS THE BEST IN THE SEGMENT. MORE BETTER THAN REALME BUDS 2.. 2) NOISE CANCELATION = NOISE CANCELATION IS GOOD ENOUGH #RATE=4/5. 3) BASS QUALITY = THE BASS IS MUCH DEEP THAN ANY OTHER AND IT HAS MUCH PUNCH. THE BASS COMES WHEN IT IS REQUIRED NOT ANY OVER POWERING BASS LIKE REALME BUDS 2.. 4) COMFORT = VERY LIGHT WEIGHT AND VERY COMFORTABLE IN EARS.. 5) MIC QUALITY IS VERY GOOD THAN OTHER.

name: Ishan
title: Value for money product, good sound quality
content: It's been a couple of months since I an using it,and I am extremely happy with it. The sound quality is at par with earphones of much higher price. It is light weight as well hence cab used for long hours like a 4-5 hour train journey, I do so a lot. The fit is also very good. Only drawback is the build quality, you will have to take care while using and storing it in a pouch or bag pocket. The wire may become loose on mishandling. But look at the price guys. Just be careful with handling and I am sure you will love it.

name: Zwinzz Koushik
title: Overrated
content: Don't know why these earphones were overrated by many people.. bass & tribbles are quite similar to MI Basic earphones (399‚Çπ). And build quality is also not soo good... Lead will tangle every time... Rather than this you can go for Realme buds2... I have been using these both simultaneously... In my opinion Real me buds 2 is better option than this.. ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Amazon Customer
title: For those ,who prefer quality of sound over the loudness
content: These review is for those who prefer quality of sound over loudness, seriously if you wanna have a earphones with a loud sound there are a lot of options, these are not good for that and after browsing alot of reviews and blogs , i bought these ones, these are well upto the mark, well i didnt try senheiser, pistonfit and ath which are described better than this , sorry fanboys of other companies i dont think other earphones arent any good i tried boat,ant,realme somewhere they are behind either in high or lows, well it comes to personal preference but for me i prefer quality of sound

name: Sarvagya Siddhu
title: Best budget earphones
content: So I've been using these earphones for 8 months now and it is working flawlessly. I have them in my ears almost 8-10 hours a day (yes I am a pretty heavy user). I have dropped these earphones several times but not even a single sign of wear and tear. I don't regret the decision of buying these earphones. The only con about these earphones is that the base is a little decent, could have been a little heavier. 9.5/10 is how I would like to rate it. Go for it without any second thought, it is very durable, comfortable, and the sound quality is also amazing.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst Product till now for my life
content: Such a worst ear phones..How they are producting and how amazon team accepted this kind of Products encourasing..Please Amazon it is impact of your brand also... My ear phones wire got cut , i went JBL service center they Physical Issue will not come under warranty, but in the item site they didn't mention any Rules for Warranty only one year warranty they mentioned.. A such and worst product i never saw upto now, amazon and amazon customers please be aware of JBL products .

name: Ganni
title: No replacement even if it's in warranty
content: Product is very good, but don't expect for the replacement even if its in warranty.. Hi Ganesh,. I apologize for this experience. I assure you that this is definitely not how we want our customers to feel.. I wish we could help you with the service of your JBL C100SI, however it can only be replaced if it is under warranty, since the product is non-repairable.. We consider your feedback to be of high priority and will work towards making your experience with JBL a better one.. Thank you so much for choosing JBL. We appreciate your understanding.. Regards,. A.Manideep.

name: Pankaj Srivastava
title: Chinese product. Wears down in a year.
content: It was good till it worked but then it completed one year and stopped working the very next day. And I couldn't find any service centre. With covid all around, I just had to let it go.. Amazon could provide JBL customer care number which was not functional at that time.. Being a CHINESE product couldn't expect anything better than this.

name: Himanshu Gupta
title: Decent Sound quality, good bass, okayish build quality
content: Using these earphones from 4 months now, quality is good for the price. Build quality not that good, mine 3.5 mm jack has been bent but, can't complaint much for the price. Base is quite good and gives a decent music experience overall.. EDIT1: Now 7 months have passed using these earphones and suddenly left earpiece stopped working. I have contacted service center they've replaced my product easily. Great service, but the build quality of earphones are not upto the mark, though they sound good, but, build quality is poor.

name: Raghavan alias Saravanan M
title: Was good this time.
content: [Review for the previous order on 2018/2019] I have ordered the same JBL in Black colour a few times in the past. In the same way I thought of trying the red one but it was not good as the sound quality was poor and very intermittent.. Unfortunately the return period was very short and I had lost my opportunity to get it exchanged/refunded ;(. [Review for my recent purchase on Aug2020] This time the product was perfect. I am happy with it.

name: Annu kumar
title: no one buy this is jbl earphones
content: dont buy this product bcoz bcoz today one month complete one side was not work so pls dont buy today no one have time that he was going to service center nd where there is service center nd no service center in this area so if u buy first u check service center in ur area then buy this is so disappointed. last i thought its not jbl problems prblm is amozon when u see all comments there is issue in a month one side haedphn so why r u hold this product in amozon its not going bed image jbl totally prblm with u this type stock hold u on ur site waste money products pls don't buy any one

name: Jeet T.
title: Reliable, Good quality and satisfactory services.
content: I ordered this earphones back in DEC. 2019. Me and my family use it almost everyday. Let me tell you guys, we've been using it for more than 4 hours a day on average, we'd throw it from the sofa to the table in the corner and nothing would happen to it. It's strong, the sound quality is good on phone and even great on pc or laptops. After using it like this for over a year, my left ear piece stopped working. I didn't waste any time and ordered a new one. I got it under 3 days of placing the order. This is the best wired earphones you can get out there. This thing has my approval :)

name: Shubham Dwivedi
title: Good sound quality | Value for money
content: 1: Premium quality.. 2. Very comfortable no pain in ears after using it for 2 hours. 3. Noise reduction is very good. 4. Bass is a little less but treble is a quite good and very balanced voice.. 5. Mic available. Bad thing is wires are not tangled free and JBL should provide a pouch to carry.. Otherwise better than Skullcandy and Mi basic earphone. If you don't need mic go for Sennheiser.

name: Rahul
title: Fake product by Amazon
content: I have been using JBL earphones for around 2 years, last time when I bought the same model for around 699 Rs, It was really good and worked for around 2 years. But this time when I bought in a deal for 600 Rs, the product I received looks fake, the buttons that control the mic doesn't look the same as the previous one and wires look so thin and even the sound is not same as the previous one. Also i am facing the issue with the plug-in jack.Earlier it was fitting properly but now jack is loosely fitted in the phone.. It seems fake ones are sold during the Deal times.

name: Gopal mishra
title: For base lovers but its not durable for more than 2 years and worst built quality
content: Now its 2 year completed and right side ear bud is not working in my earphone ..... now left is also not working ..Thaths the quality of this jbl in- ear headphone .. i would say 3rd class quality . And worst built quality. .....i have nokia in - ear headphone which i bought in year 2008 and still those working perfectly thats called the quality and durability .... ...... .. .. .. These jbl in - ear headphone is not durable and tangle almost every time ... Yes the voice output is really good but there is not any durability ........ .. .. .just in 2 year these earphone died ...although i used them occasionally and also used carefully .... .. .. .. Bad experience from jbl i didnt expect this from a earphone which cost aproxx rs 800 ... .. ... I didnt recommend it till the company didnt improve its durabilty and quality

name: Ishwar sharma
title: Good
content: You can hardly go wrong with jbl. The sound quality is superior to every other earphone in this price segment. The bass is little bit low but you wont notice it too much. The build quality is also good, as I am using these earphones for more than 1 year now. Plus jbl also provides a nice carrying pouch with the earphones.

name: Sagar
title: Great for the price
content: Great sound quality & frequency response (on testing i can hear it from 12Hz to 18000Hz).. Build quality is okay, cable is thin and not tangle free so be careful.. Mic quality is also good.. L shaped jack would‚Äôve been great.. Overall great product.

name: Jamil
title: Cheap quality, No Bass..
content: Very cheap quality material used. Looks Like 50 rs earphones. Sound same as boat bassheads 100 which is available at 350rs only. And my previous boat earphones have better quality wire. It has No Bass. Only treble, which cause too much pain in ear. Don't be fooled by the so called "Deal of the day" or any other sale. I suggest not to buy this crap. Better options are available at lower prices. And last, no return, only replacement. So think before you buy.

name: ABHISHEK KUMAR
title: Left earbud stops working
content: It has been always the problem with JBL earphones...after 5-6months one of the earplug stops working(left side one mostly). The sound quality and bass quality is good but the only thing is about its built. I have used two earphones of jbl among which one's wire got broken from its jack and others left earplug stopped working.. And the worst part is there service, its 1 year warrenty on there product but you will not find any way to claim your warrenty.

name: Aashish Ray Mallick
title: 100% Genuine review
content: I am a huge fan of these budget oriented segment of earphones. And have tried and tested a lot of them.. Now coming to these earphones, they are superb and justify the price tag. None of the earphone is so balanced. Punchy bass won't give you headaches (as many boat bassheads do) vocals are crisp and clear, highs are the way they should be. I use them on daily basis to attend 6 hrs of class + movies +YouTube and never had any complain. I used these earphones, slept with earphones still in my ears and hence I can say they are quite durable contradicting to their apparent thin wires.. Summary:Just go for them

name: GnanaPrakash
title: Worth for a caller, not for a movie freak!!!
content: I am writing this review after using this headphones for more than a month.. Headphone is most suitable for handling mobile conversation rather than watching movies and songs... Bass effect is better that, the tone and diction of the speakers pronunciation and words are clearly understood..... But the quality of the 3.5mm jack is average that, it makes a moderate contact with the phone... One has to adjust/rotate the jack in the phone in order to hear the speaker at ocassional instances..... Overall a semi decent product...

name: Dr Dang
title: Worth every penny that u spend ..
content: My first review on amazon after using it for many years because this product deserve it.. this review comes after using it for 1 year and 9 months.. the durability of the product is worth every penny every spent. I can vouch for it because i use them throuƒ£hout my day while working and the most important usage us while i am sleeping .. i use them every night while sleeping.. and i toss arpudn but neer ever have i faced any issue with the plugs being broken , the wires getting twisted and cracking and tearing.. after a long pwriod of rough n tough use .. tossing in the handbag with keys and what nkt never ever did they damage .. Go for it .. sound quality ia superb with ultimate noise cancellation..

name: Vaishnavi Upasani
title: Excellent Product. Amazing durability. Best earphones at such decent price.
content: I have been using these earphones for almost 3 years now. Not a single issue till date. They still work as brand new earphones, even after being used quite roughly. After using these, I won't be able to settle for anything lesser. Couldn't have got a better product at this price. Very happy with the purchase. Thank you.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Does not have a long usage life
content: I bought these earphones a few months ago and it worked fine for 4 months. And then I started hearing more volume on one side and other was relatively low. As I kept using the volume on of them started falling and eventually it stopped working on one side. Do not buy if you need something durable and long lasting.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Cost effective
content: I was using a branded headset previously which i received while buying the phone,as it was torn out i decided to buy JBL. When it comes to design and material,it overtook my all headsets which i previously used while sound effect comes to play,it is not pretty much good compared to that headset.So overall it is good choice to those listening music litely.

name: Amit
title: Worst earphone!
content: Voice is not as people/JBL claim, it's worst with respect to price. Material quality is also not good. I will not complaint much if Amazon take this product back because i bought Boult Audio BassBuds Storm in just Rs. 399 today and i am really happy with the quality of that product.

name: megha s.
title: Average earphones with mic issues.
content: Was using Sony MDR XB55 before this one and sound quality is no where near. Just an average earphone for 500 bucks, didn't expect much when I bought it and expected it to be just fine for my office call needs. But, found out that it's mic is faulty( tried it on multiple devices as well) . Thats the saddest part. So no use for me.

name: Ritesh Mahajan
title: This Product is "not" for BASS lovers.
content: Advertisement of this earphone is wrong by JBL.. They show it has very good BASS quality. But practically it is lacking somewhere.. > Music Quality is Good. But Bass is not good as I expected.. > Build quality is avarage.. > If you are a BASS lover then plz don't buy this product. Because overall sound quality is good. But Bass is not present at all.

name: MOHIT KUMAR
title: The best
content: This is the first time i am taking out time to write a review. I have always been fond of listening songs. First earphone that i bought was Skullcandy ink'd in 2015 then Sennheiser cx 180 in 2017, and i swear that this jbl c100 is best best best of these three, only thing that i don't like about Sennheiser is that at full volume its sound becomes very sharp and unpleasant. So honest review go with this one. Also i bought realme earphone also to check but immediately returned that. Best i have ever used till now is this jbl c100si.

name: Pallab Pain
title: Good headphones. But can't possibly have a MRP of 1299/-
content: Just got them today. The material feels rather average. The sound quality is good for the selling price of 549/- But it's quite hard to digest that these are originally priced at 1299/- Even 549/- feels a little expensive for these. Buy these for casual use and that you don't care if they get damaged or lost. Otherwise, I'd suggest to go for a better pair of headphones.

name: Abhijithjake
title: Best in-ear headphones for the price range
content: Now i have used this product for 3 months... The sound quality is great and thats obvious cez its JBL , even the bass is not bad u get what u deserve for this pricing .... But dont think there is a noice cancellation , because its an in-ear headphones it dosent have anc ..... Over all the product is worth the cost if ur going for an in-ear headphones....

name: Ankit C.
title: Punchy, clean sound without emptying the wallet.
content: This is my first pair or JBL earphones, and I am quite satisfied with the overall build quality. Sound is very clean and punchy, though the base is high, it does not get overwhelming. Watching movies or listening to music, these have been great for everyday use with my phone and laptop both.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Just go for it !
content: First and foremost, kudos to Amazon delivery. I've ordered at night 1130pm and I got the earphones delivered by 10am next morning. Very satisfying!. The earphones have really impressed me a lot. The clarity in sound is incomparable! Very crystal clear sound. The bass and treble are just perfect for an enthralling experience. I loved the earphones very much. JBL indeed stood for its brand. 699 at this quality is just superb! Anyone looking to buy this, just go for it!. Material looks less durable but that time will only tell. Volume control with mic would've been icing on the cake!

name: Aditee
title: Don't buy!
content: One side of headphones stopped working in first ten days and now second side volume is also very rash and wierd. Unfortunately return window closed and stuck with these defective piece.. Either buy directly from shop or buy cheaper MI headphones. Disappointed!

name: Abdul Basith
title: Fake product
content: There is 2 different tag on this product. 1 with the lengthy tag is fake and another small 1 is original i guess because i used small tag black earphones which awesome back then ,but white and red has lengthy tag which is fake and doesn't have any good in it. The sound quality is horrible. Its nowwhere near to the sennheiser cx180. So before buying compare with other brands like sennheiser, sony and realme buds(recently popular choice)

name: Roger
title: Not premium quality
content: The wire has worn out within a month and im very dissapointed by this is our money any worth with such type of product the roadside products are working better and not getting worn out but now days orginal products are worth any penny. Disaapointed.

name: Shivam
title: Best earphone in this range
content: Headphone review. 1. Packaging good. 2. Made of premium quality plastic. 3. Very comfortable no pain in ears after using it for 2 hours. 4. Noise reduction is very good. 5. Bass is quite good. 6. Very good branding.. 7. Mic available. Best part of this earphones that is tangle-free. Sound quality is owsm,bass is good, you can hear every single detail.. But one thing i want to mention here dat if you r looking for the beat earphones in thiis price range wid mic den go for it.

name: Rishi r.
title: Good product for daily, casual and calls
content: If you are taking this for mainly casual use and main focus is for having good call quality, you don't want to hold mic near your mouth. Then go for it good product.. If you use with your laptop then with use of equalizer and all good sound.. In this price range it is very good.. If music is preference go for boat with same price. But if calling is your equally important then this is your product.

name: Anandakrishnan
title: Lasted for just 13 days
content: I am very disappointed with this product. I bought this product on great indian sale and the price was 445. But it's one ear piece got damaged within 13 days. After 10 days of purchase so I cant return(like the seller knows it). I used the headset with ultra care and while using itself it got damaged. I never buy jbl earphones again.. * My Sennheiser headset is still working perfect even after two years.

name: Jasper
title: best earphones i ever used!
content: my first pair of these jbl worked over a year, never have any other earphones lasted that long ( i use them pretty much all the time). after a year only one side was working, i thought ok good run, and bought the 2nd pair! idk why i connected the 1st ones to my pc, they worked! and still going on, 2nd year :D

name: The Alchemist
title: Nope.
content: JBL, this is not your good product, even you know that.. It does not offer much at its price. The bass ic low and unclear, voice quality is not pleasing and the earphone design isn't much ergonomic. IF you know better, you will look for another product.

name: Lionel Dsouza
title: Declining performance. Dont buy
content: At beginning the earphones were functioning properly but with time quality degarded. Noise cancellation is becoming zero. Microphone has become pathetic and earphone sound quality is equivalent to those normal earphones you get when you a low budget phone.. My personal experience with this earphone is not good. Not worth buy. I dont recommend

name: Sibani Roy
title: Amazing earphones but noise cancelling can be improved
content: This is my 3rd purchase and this is one of the best earphones in the market with great sound quality but bass quality is decent ‚ò∫Ô∏è and noise cancelling is also real good the built quality is just amazing .If u r searching with great bass this might be not great but if u want to experience great quality music/sound it's really best u can avail.. Don't get confused with lot of reviews just go for it won't regret purchasing it

name: Abhineet rajput
title: Not a Dependable Product
content: The Product may work for a month or just a year. It suffers from the problem of losing sound in one of the earplugs. In my case after taking proper care and stuff it suddenly stopped working in the left side. The outer body is intact with no damage any where but there is no sound in the left side. Quite disappointing as I expected it to last longer

name: Anikesh Prasad
title: Overall Great Earphones
content: I am writing a simple review to give am idea of the product.. 1} SOUND: Minds,lows and highs are totally balance. Output is very good. Vocals are very Clear. Tribles are also excellent. The overall sound quality is excellent.. Sound quality is better than Mi Basic,Boat bassheads 225.. 2} BUILD: Build is average. You have to handle it little bit carefully. Not for the extreme rough users. Mi basic and boat bassheads 225 has better build quality.. 3} COMFORT: No words to say. It is one of the most comfortable earphone. It is more comfortable than mi basic and boat bassheads 225. If you need Comfort the don't go with Boat.. 4} Mic: Sound produced through mic is clear. The button is also having a feature to play previous track.. 5} Instruments separation: It has good Instruments separation. Good for pubg players.. 6} Bass: It produces good bass.. I got it for ‚Çπ549 and it really worth it!

name: Chandrakant K
title: Great sounding pairs
content: I knew these were gonna sound loud on my Moto device which they did deliver on.. It has sufficient punchy bass with balanced treble. Mids are present but not much.. Great isolation which provides noise cancellation.. I wouldn't mind to buy these again but in different colors.

name: Kevin Vira
title: No service centres or exchange assistance
content: I have been using this product for the last 6 months and the sound volume has decreased suddenly. Since there are no service centers in India even though it's in warranty I cannot get a replacement. Not worth if you are looking for a longer term use.

name: Ayush Jamwal
title: JBL by HARMAN!
content: The sound quality is awesome as that is what you can expect from JBL but the wire quality is poor as it is made of rubber which on getting jerk could be damaged, but the sound quality is awesome as these are the beat budget earphones I have ever used.

name: Tanmoy
title: Product is good but not value for money..Price is little higher.
content: Quick delivery by amazon. Did not expect that much fast delivery by amazon without prime. Highly appreciated.. Overall the material quality is good. But the wire quality not that much great. Bass is little low,treble is perfect, I have to adjust the bass in Equalizer. Overall sound quality is good. Price is little bit higher compare to sound quality.

name: jeewanbabu
title: unsatisfaction..
content: i bought 2 ear phones at a time... after one month, one earphone set stopped not working mic, i wanna keep for replace, but there is no replace option. i am very sorry for it.. i unable to give 5 stars.. JBL is my all time favorite but this time i need to divert from JBL..

name: Ashwini Nakil
title: Worth buying.
content: nice product within 800. Bass quality is average and worth for this price. one can also go for boat earphones for good bass requirements, but it don't last for long, where JBL does that job for you. I am using more than 6 months now and I used it very rough and throw anywhere in bag, it's still performing well. Must buy within this budget.

name: Azhar Shaik
title: Bad sound quality with useless noise cancellation mic.
content: [Edited after 2 months] Just using for 2 months now and seems to be a bad one. Sound quality is not good enough even this is so loud that we can not listen at full volume and yes sound quality gets compressed . Mic is not good at all, noise cancellation is of no use. Can‚Äôt take calls in public places.

name: Udayan Roy
title: best option in this budget segment
content: It is made of medium grade plastic. Sound quality is better than what you expect when you invest this kind of money. It has plenty of bass to offer with significantly loud mids and lows. I can not talk about the durability as I purchased this product last week. I recommend you readers to go for it. It is better than 99% other brands selling similar products in this price bracket.

name: lalit
title: Could have been batter
content: It is good if you regular buds user . But it‚Äôs hurt your ear which is not good for your ears. U can not put it in your for long time . Even 5-10mints. The main thing it falls out from your ear regularly which is very awkward ü§®. I don‚Äôt think soo it has noise canceling feature too it‚Äôs not working good.. The bass quality is awesome . Appreciated for that.

name: Jithin
title: Good Quality Product
content: Product is actually pretty cool. Gives very good song quality, and a decent mic . I didn't felt that noise cancellation facility that much. Still it gives some effects of good brand. built quality is very good I think I can use the product for another 2-3 years. Only thing I am worried about price of a product because some brands give you the same kind of product with lesser price. I paid for JBL to avoid taking a risk.. Overall if price comes within Rs.500/- it is a pretty cool catch

name: Raj D.
title: Good purchase, thank you Amazon.
content: It's a good purchase. Good sound quality and bass. Two more ear pads also included with it. Warranty card also found inside the box... Easy to insert in the ear and sits tightly, reduce out side noise by 30% approximately.. Sound representation is good with good bass and tribble range... Two things can be mentioned... 1) Price is at little bit higher side if compared with other competitive brand like boat.... 2) A small pouch bag also need to be supplied with it which will be helpful during carrying in the pocket when headphones are not connected with mobile

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for small ears!
content: I bought these thinking they come with changeable fronts but even the smallest are too big for my ears. If you struggle with ear phones that have this shape from other brands, don't buy these ones either. They are a terrible fit.. For everyone else, feel free to buy. Sound quality and volume is great.

name: Tanmoy Sen
title: I Am Happy üòç
content: I brought it in May 2018.. Almost a year not a single issue. But yes I use it for only 2 perpose... 1. To attend a Con-Call 2. I am big fan of music so to listen music. It didn't disappoint me.. " Noise Cancellation": 5 out of 5. " Sound Quality" I would give 4 out of 5 I have Bose portable music box comparing with that this is my rating. I have never used it while working out so no idea. It fit very well to my ears. In nut shell I must say VALUE FOR MONEY.

name: snehal
title: Amazon services
content: Everything is ok with the product but the customer service and delivery is worst from the Amazon in urban areas. Even though I'm prime user i have to request them to deliver it on time and if return then also I have to call so many time to customer services to pickup. They are not taking any steps against the delivery services they have tie-up for. This is worst experience I am having since last 3 months from Amazon. This review is for Amazon and it's services not for the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not happy with the product
content: Not happy with this purchase. Within a couple of weeks of the purchase, sound has stopped coming from one of the earphones. I was not happy with the fitment of the earbuds as well. Unable to replace or return, as the date for the replacement elapsed just a day earlier. I actually wanted to return it from day one, as I was not happy with the product even then, but the return option was not available.

name: Arpan Chakraborty
title: Worse Experience with jbl head phone
content: Sound quality good but durability and materials is very bad My suggestion is don't go for this product. After sell service is not good enough. I brought this product and stop working after 6 month though there are no liquid or physical damage they refused to solve it. I found many of writing good reviews but after 6 months they will understand. Try boat product they provide better build quality and good sound quality at cheaper price.

name: Abhirup Mondal
title: Good budget headphone with moderate to high bass output
content: This is one of the most popular budget headphone in the market, build quality is moderate, if you give the wires too much twist it may cause a problem, otherwise it is all right for daily use. Bass are good and immersive but it sometime covers the vocals way too much. For some song you may find vocals are lower than bass, midtones are allright. And above all its JBL so you will definitely get a satisfactory output. You may go for it if you want a balanced headphone with good brand assurance, rather than high bass headphones(boat basshead or realme). Opinions are personal.

name: Kavita
title: Not satisfied
content: Not at all good. Does not fit comfortably in the ears. That itself is a major negative.. Rest all are just anicillary points. If it does not fit properly in the ears then there is no scope for reviewing other qualities like sound, bass etc. Best avoided

name: Asit
title: JBL - JUST BOMBARDING LOUNDNESS. ;-)
content: I've used Boat 220. That time i thought that was the best earphone with amzing loud bass and clarity.. But this JBLC100 has changed my opinion. Its really so comfy to wear first due to light weight than Boat one, BASS is loud with soothing, doesnt pain your ears which Boat does it you wear for longer time due to its heavier metallic body.. In case of wires i would prefer Boat is better, but its all YOU, if you keep it well maintained it won't tangle when you took out of your bag and stuffs.

name: Ashutosh
title: Definitely one of the best at this price range.
content: It's been over 14 months since I've been using it,it's still working the same as it did when I bought it.. the wire may be thin but the quality of it is preety high and it's quite durable... The main thing, that's sound quality "is unmatchable " at this price range.. as I've tried many of other earphones of BoAt , Skullcandy , Sennheiser and some others... The high and low tones and the clarity of the sound is excellent..Even better than many 2-3K priced earphones... the mic is good and the earphone can be used outside quite easily... The only slight downside I feel is it's slightly high treble, As I'm a bass lover ...The high treble was an issue for quite a while..But it too can be corrected if you can use the right sound equaliser... After that it's sound quality is unbeatable.... If you are in doubt.. I'd recommend you all to definitely go for it... " A gem of an earphone at this price range!! ". üòé

name: Rahul Raj Singh
title: Amazing bass and sound quality.
content: Pros. 1.Sound quality crisp and clear.. 2.bass has nice thumping sound bass is amazing.. 3.Noise cancellation is good but could be better.. Cons. 1.Design is ok ear bud design could be a better I felt so.. Go for it worth a buy in the world of truely wireless earphones.

name: Suraj Kashyap
title: Serves the purpose
content: Unlike the description, bass is not punchy. However, I just wanted an wired earphone with mic to attend virtual meetings as the one I have is without mic. I prefer wired earphones as my past experiences has shown that the one without mic works longer than the one with mic. Sound quality is decent for the price range. You will be quite satisfied with the results, just don't expect them to sound like a 5K earphone.

name: Gaurav Gupta
title: Worst JBL headphones. Dont buy this product.
content: These headphones of JBL are worst quality. product. I bought it in January and by June they stopped working. The customer support is pathetic. My product was in warranty but still they did not replace my headphones saying that mesh is missing. I never received the product with mesh from Amazon. They just fool the customer by saying that there is a 1 year warranty. You will never get replacement. Please dont waste your money in buying this headphones. I will never recommend this product to anyone.

name: Pushp Anuragi
title: Great product by JBL.
content: Absolutely love these bad boys. A bit high on the high end so they might take a bit to get used to especially if you are coming from Apple's EarPods but overall they're good, especially for the price. About the durability issues that people are complaining, been using them for over an year with quite abuse I would say and they still work as new.

name: sumi Chakraborty
title: Buy it without a second thought...
content: This is my first time using a jbl headphone... and I love it. I am writing this review after using for 6 months and I am very happy with it. the sound quality and the effect.. much better then all the headphones I have owned till date.. UPDATE: its been a year and a half since I have had this. Very impressive for something I bought for 700.. looking for a replacement now as the earphones have stopped working. Not necessarily because of the product but since I used it very roughly the last couple of months. Would buy this again if I don‚Äôt find any other good headphone..

name: Vivek Kumar
title: No warranty...Not for music quality lovers.... for music lovers Go with samsung or sony
content: Too much bass...but does not have these qualities.. 1. Very less or little streo music.. 2. No 3D output.. 3 No Treble reducer.. 4.sometime there are two different types of music sound in a single same song.. 5 No warranty By Harman international in india. It give warranty only in 2 or 3 country.. so for batter music experience you should go with samsung or sony earphones

name: Dharam Choudhary
title: Overall quality is very good. I'm fully satisfied.
content: Reviewing after 5 month use.... Qualities. Sound quality is very good. Bass is also good but little bit poor. Wire quality is very solid. Mic is at best placed so you don't need to hold mic in hand in front of your mouth.. I also bought Boat basshead earphones in one month earlier which is not good as JBL.. I feel Pain in my ear after use of 1 hour of Boat basshead but this problem is not in JBL headphones.. I love it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I will surely suggest My Friends NOT to But JBL
content: I bought this product on September 2018, it's been seven months and I used it regularly. Suddenly one side stop working and when I went to JBL service center so they tell me that ' apke mike ke side se tar dikh rahe hai, toh apka change nai ho sakta, I was like mera mike and wo sab ka lead chal raha hai but dusre side ka nai chalra. They didn't listen to me. They just wasted my time and money. I am really very very unhappy with them. #NOtoJBLfromNow

name: Saumik Chaudhury
title: One of the best earphones under 1K.
content: Was previously using Audio Technica CLR100, which has a slightly better sound stage but also the worst build quality. This earphone on the other hand has a mic, a better build quality, a good sound stage and a reasonably balanced bass output. Got it on a sale @599 and I'm quite happy with the product.. Under 1k it's either this or Sennheiser CX180 (missing the mic). Whichever you buy it's a good deal.

name: laxmanvasupalli
title: Nice product at this price ....
content: Sound quality is awesome.. bass also good... It's sound experience is almost equal to Sennheiser CX 180 ...and it has mic also... So go for it ... Worthy for money...one drawback is that when we listening songs at high volume, the sound is coming outside... except this everything is excellent...

name: Abhishek
title: Awesome headphones
content: Ok Guys , So I am very picky with what I buy and choose from plethora of these products .. These headphones are just outstanding in terms of noise cancellation and beats . Now here is what made me put a review .. "I had got them washed accidentally 2 times and guess what both the mic and the headphones still working . :) ". Super happy with this product , please go ahead with any doubt .

name: SACHIN S.
title: Earphones good for calls, not for music
content: I purchased these earphones going by the brand of JBL and the noise cancelling feature it offers. I wanted an all purpose ear phones with decent performance if not too awesome. After using it, I can say it's good for making calls. So far no one has complained of voice not clear or audible. But if you are planning to use it for listening music, then it's a big disappointment. Very flat sound. Very little bass you hear. Sound is not balanced when it comes to listening music.

name: Mangesh
title: Worth it
content: Good basic earbuds. I wanted earbuds to block ambient noise, because my workplace often gets noisy. And I also wanted to replace the bad, non-earbud headphones that came with my smartphone. Though this particular item didn't have a built-in microphone, the price was reasonable enough that I decided to purchase it. Initially, I found the tiny pinch holds on the eaebuds difficult to let them be inserted easily and quickly into ears. But with some practice that problem has receded. And, no complaints on sound quality. Overall, it does the job well enough.

name: Sanchary Ghosh
title: Good product
content: I need very basic earphones and this serves that purpose. The sound is good enough on my phone and really loud on laptop. If they are maintained, by winding them up when not in use and not pulling hard, it will last long. I have been using them for more than 4 months now. The call quality is also pretty good through its speaker

name: rahul kumar
title: Very gud at this price but a bit less durability
content: Pros: very clear and differentiating sound of different instruments. Very good earphone at this price. Outside noise cancellation(in ear). Long and easily untangleable cable. With Mic. Good brand value and aesthetics.. Cons: quite less bass i.e. not as expected. Can't hear at very high volume as it is high pitched and less bass but bass can be improved using sound equalizer based apps.. Durability is less. Didn't expect it to be this less. One side of the earphone is not working and it has only been 11 months of purchase.

name: Fitness Guy
title: Okayish product but will not buy again
content: You get what you pay for. This is a cheap product and quite basic. The sound is actually okay and I can't complain much. Ditto with bass. Nothing great, but okay. I use this for a number of calls though, both with my phone and tablet. The mic is quite poor, which is why I give it 3 stars instead of 4.. If you want something just to listen to music etc, then this is okay. If you want something with which you can take calls, it will still do the job, but it isn't good in that aspect.

name: Praveen George
title: Good quality while it lasts
content: September 2018. I am using it on a daily basis for the last three months. It is the best earphone you can buy that costs below 700 rupees.. Update: October 2019. Left side has stopped working. It was not caused by rough usage. There seems to be some sort of planned obselence built in to it.

name: Neeraj Lohani
title: Durable and handy but not for audiophiles.
content: I had this exact same earphone earlier and ordered a second one for my father and surprisingly the old one had a noticeably better sound than this new one when tested one after another with same device and same song. That's a question mark on sustained quality for JBL. Build quality is robust as always.

name: sridhar
title: Good Product at this range
content: Had purchased almost a year ago. Today its stopped working of right side.. Till date I have used this headset nearly 4 - 6 hours per day.. There is no pain or irritation while using continuously.. Feeling bad & sad to accept the truth that its not going to work hereafter.. Have to get the same within a month.. Waiting to get new one.... üéà

name: Daud Ibrahim
title: Compare With MI earphone of Rs 799
content: If you compare it with Mi earphone of Rs 799 ,. Bass of this JBL is quite less than MI's earphone .. Build quality is not that enough good in JBL to satisfy because mi earphones build quality is enough good they covered wire with something like cloth or .. Microphone quality is also not good in JBL .. Mi's earphone is value for money but this JBL's earphone is some how feels like i paid more to get common features .

name: Adyl Khan
title: Good investment
content: People who wants a simple yet branded with a decent price can definitely buy this... Its been a year n still works like a charm... Every product u purchase from anywhere depends how responsible you are to maintain its quality n its life.

name: Sugato
title: Stops working. No service centre/ warranty support
content: This is the second JBL earphone I purchased. While the sound quality is good, in the first, the mic failed after 4 months and in this one, the left earphone stopped working after 6 months. In spite of taking great care. This is very flimsy. There is no warranty or service support. DO NOT BUY!!

name: Avira Thomas
title: Great audio quality
content: Very good at blocking out external noise, useful in the outdoors and noisy areas for making calls. Button on mic works with amazon music for changing tracks and for answering calls. Covers the ears completely, so good when outdoors in windy conditions.

name: Avdhesh Thakur
title: DON'T BUY AT ALL
content: I thought the brand is JBL and the sound quality will amuse you. Because it was not a cheaper earphone. It costs Rs 700.. When I used this first time the sound quality was even worst than the earphones you get at Metro stations in Delhi in Rs 30/-. I couldn't even return it because they said they have delivered the same product and there is no damage in the product. So I ended up keeping it.. Recently I bought an earphone from Nehru Place at Rs. 60 and it is working really good with good sound quality.

name: Elangovan
title: Best in affortable range.... got it for Rs.649
content: Please buy as they did quality material for us in near to affordable price... Their are many factors you need to look to hear quality sound... Usability... stability... integrity... But as this is in affordable range you need to look for what u need. This is best.

name: Vikram K
title: Fake JBL Product
content: It looks like a fake product ,. * No Bass. * No quality sound. * mic is not working ... Go to JBl store and buy the same product for rs 1200 you will get the original one ... Don't Buy via online , there is a lot of difference in the product bought from Online ... Don't fool by this fake offers ...

name: Soumyadeep
title: 100% Recommended!
content: A sturdy wire, superior sound quality, a cutting edge look, and handiness are a few things which make these one of the most desirable budget earphones. I have purchased these earphones for a second time in a row, and what I love the most is its longevity, the wire is so strong that it simply won't give up under minor to medium stress. The bass quality is not super good, but the best among the earphones in this price range (below Rs. 800). However, the poor noise cancellation and mic's poor background cancellation features are a few downsides.

name: R2D2
title: Good sound quality through out the range (bass to treble)
content: Sound quality is absolutely gorgeous! Clear mid-range, good bass, good treble! Sound cancellation at my end it obstructs outside sound. Caller can hear background sounds but they do not cause any kind of loss of clarity

name: Amazon Customer
title: A must buy. Very good quality.
content: Amazing quality. Bought it and plugged in to listen to a song, fantastic bass effect. Voice quality is also very good while talking over the phone. There are other brands in the list but I loved the JBL.good value for money. Don't think twice just buy it.

name: Hriday
title: Awesome service
content: Bought these for ‚Çπ599.. Great sound quality, built and even the mic.. For some reason, they stopped working after 7 months of usage and Harman support was kind enough to replace the same for me. The replacement from the time of creating a ticket and getting the replacement delivered took about 30 days which was frustrating.

name: Harsh Karmakar
title: Not durable
content: Amazing sound quality. Just simply amazing. Also comfortable and fits perfectly in the ear. But the wire and the joints aren't durable. After about 7 months the left earpiece's sound reduced by 40% but then again after about a month the right earpiece's sound reduced by 70%.. It still works tho but the sound has really reduced.

name: Amarjeet
title: Not worth it
content: The cable tore apart within 4 months. Now it has completely stopped functioning. Perhaps my expectations were probably way too high. very disappointed. Nonetheless when it was fully functional, it was a treat to my ears and the beats the earphone generated were truly mesmerizing,yet I won't recommend it unless you want to purchase it every 4 months

name: ShriSJ
title: Dont buy it, It will last for 6months after that they dont even replace it
content: Product i purchase is good no doubt but problem with one side of earphones will going to occurre after 6 months i replace it with another one but still got the problem after 2 months of uses if you looking for earphones that will last long atleast year i wouldn't recommend this... Also customer service is not that great.. To sum up with one word is useless üëé

name: Max
title: Not durable
content: I purchased this product from Amazon at the time of sale. I get this for ‚Çπ549. But the product I received was damaged. After replace I got new earphone. But after a month its earphone jack was not supporting in my mobile. I tried to plug it into the laptop but their also it was coming out easily. It was only working when it has to be hold it with jack in the plug. Sound quality is OK but the product is not durable.

name: Disha
title: Worst experience. Please don't buy. Quality has degraded completely and gone to the dogs.
content: These earphones are a classic example of how a brand can ruin their best selling products and make low priced products. This is my second purchase of these earphones and this time they barely worked for 2 months. Both the sides have stopped working. Due to my trust in this brand, I blindly went for these earphones without looking on new launches and the quality has degraded completely. And it is giving me trouble at this point when earphones are such an integral part of work.. Never buying these again.

name: Silpa
title: One of the ear piece not working after 4 months of usage
content: Im rewriting the review because the durability of this head set is less. I has been using this head set for two years..within this period i had bout two. First head set lasted but now the durability is very less. I bought the last one before 4 months..but now..one of its piece is not working and lost its speaker quality. Im not sure why this is happening. Im so sad for I have to buy another within 4 months period..But sound clarity is superb..

name: Abhijeet Das
title: Good ear phone
content: First of many thanks to amazon, to give this amazing deal & quick delivery. This jbl ear phone is nice but bass not as boat basshead 225 which I purchased 4 months ago. Otherwise brand name is good & quality of music is also good. Thank you Amazon.

name: Sourav Mondal
title: Not Comfortable for ears
content: The earphones built quality is low, price wise not perfect is built. Vocals and Instruments sounds are clear and clrestal,But bass is lower,....If you need to hearing just clear voice,sound, Instruments than its Perfect but not for hard Rock,Metal,Havey Metal,Hip Hop. Decent quality overall and the earphones buds size so flat if you use smaller size though it's not fit in your ear.Very uncomfortable if you push hard in your's ears it's hurt's and painful also.

name: Dayana
title: Superb but only for first 6 months......
content: I bought this headset (C100SI) and it was working fine for almost 5 months. After 5 months, not able to hear anything in the right side earphone. So i called CC and they provided me a new headset. That second new headset is just 6 months old and i m getting the same fault this time also. i called CC once again and they said like u have warranty for the first 6 months only so u dont have a replacement this time. So this C100SI life span is just 6 months. After that you have to look for another headset. Please choose your headset wisely.

name: Anonymous
title: Very poor sound
content: Don't go for this model it's a complete mess. I have compared the jbl models which cost around 800 give superior performance.But this model which costs 545 rupees is a complete disaster very poor sound and if ur a music lover please don't buy these especially for students.I think these would be better for people who don't want to listen beats and bass but only pure and clear music.

name: Rohan
title: good
content: its amazing to listen songs with cool bass nd nice quality of sound nd yess games too but i ordered this item by testing my friends earphones which were same but mine one is having a fault in its pin when i bought it nd when it was delivered i opened it then i saw that it is little bended or something then i thought thats like that i might be thinking but yess my friend said u should replace it

name: Ashutosh
title: Average headphones for the given price
content: I purchased this earphones after using previous BoAt earphones . Comparatively this earphones are quite under delivering. I do not see the output as per specifications provided in the product.. I would recommend to consider boAT earphones if you want good bass and music quality

name: Kindle Customer
title: For rough and tough usage
content: I lost my previous sony earphones EX255AP damnn expensive but worth it, then i ordered a lower range earphone set offered by JBL..i was like let's try this out..i'm not jokin but I've put my earphones in the washing machine once then i stepped on these earphones...so you can guess...but the quality still persists too good. Loud with good treble adequate bass and a nice noise cancellation, the earbuds may seem harsh on the ears so change it(i changed it with the sony earbuds)

name: Neel
title: Bass is not that great!
content: Affordable earphones with decent sound quality. I purchased it for the calling purposes mainly and it works perfectly with clear sound. Can't recommend for solely music and video viewing purposes as for my taste the bass isn't that great and the treble is pretty high!. But overall a decent purchase.

name: Himansu Pati
title: garbage product, not working even after replacemnt
content: wasted my money, time and effort on this garbage product. The first delivered item was defective. So I got a replacement which was again stopped working after 10 days. Now don't know what to do with this headphone as it is equivalent to garbage for me for which I paid 600 INR and wasted my time and effort to buy this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: JBL Handfree Edm Music Lover
content: Best Sound For EDM Music Lover. No compromise For Sounds Best JBL Sound Handfree Bass is Excellent. Brad Is Value your Money. With Mic:Yes. Connector type: 3.5mm headphone jack. Powerful drivers deliver thumping bass. JBL Signature Sound. 1year Warranty. Other Like No Any Compromise In Sound. Also Parcel And Amazon Services Good Super Thank you Make This Handfree JBL & Amazon Are Hospitality People Are Happy To Buy Value of Your Money

name: Siddhant Hardik
title: Stopped qorking in 15 days.. not able to replace.. very bad quality..
content: I have ordered the product on 4 Aug 2020. It was delivered on 6th august 2020. It worked for 15 days and after that one side earphone stopped working and microphone also dont work.. very bad quality. When i wanted to replace this item i am not getting any option.. it has standard waranty of 1 year.. but stooped working in 15 days... very bad item from JBL.. how can i return and get it replaced.. It has been delivered by Amazon. Please let me know..

name: Jayant
title: Pure sound...üòåüòåüòåüòåüòå
content: It is pure typical jbl sound....accurate sound.... Good experience while listening music..and film...üòäüòä. Yah...if u are thinking for good earphone don't go with boat not as good....as jbl.... But i didn't use that sennheiser earphone but in that mic is missing so i will go with jbl one only...ü•≥ü•≥. Very good quality product...wire is not as great but 1 year warranty is there...so i don't think so it will having some problem...üôÉüôÉ

name: Nafeesah Fathima
title: Waste
content: It works well got first few months but then sound comes only in one earphone and not the other. I prefer Bluetooth headphones or earphones as they last much longer than these earphones. I expected much more than what I got because I thought JBL was a good brand. It stopped working properly after 8 months of use. Not even an entire year it worked. Waste of money.

name: Rishiraj
title: Simply the best in this range!
content: Have atleast bought 4 pair of this headset. Its the best you can get in thdi price range audio quality is gud, Mic is good for calls and is also comfortable for long use. Without a doubt the best earphone in this price range!

name: Nishant Sharma
title: Without any doubt go for it.
content: All the features work as per the product description. Anyone who is giving negative review, maybe don't know how to use a product. Anyone complaining about bass, not sure what you are looking for in a product like earphones. If you are not satisfied just hang woofers on your ears..
