Anyone who is complaining about noice cancellation, please try to adjust the buds, or try to change the size of buds provided in the box.

name: Praful
title: Awesome earphone with great bass
content: 1. Made of premium quality plastic 2. Very comfortable no pain in ears after using it for 2 hours 3. Noise reduction is very good 4. Bass iS littie less but trebble is quite good and very balanced voice 5. Very good branding 6. Mic available Bad thing is wires are not tangled free and JBLshould provide a pouch to carry Otherwise better than Skullcandy and Mi basic earphone. If you don't need mic go to Sennheiser. Overall satisfied with the product don't think go for it

name: A dissapointed JBL user
title: ONE REASON WHY YOU SHOULDN'T BUY THIS
content: ONLY REASON NOT TO BUY THIS EARPHONE. If u want to buy this earphones then cool go for it. But if you want a earphone which should work for a long time then this is useless. And don't fall for 1 year warranty they won't repair or replace if ur earphones doesn't work. I bought this for 600/- and in less than three months the left ear piece wasn't working. I went on roaming around the service centre and they gave some silly excuses and that's it they said nothing can be one. Now I have to buy another one

name: Mahendra Akula
title: Good Quality Product üëå for Great Music & Calls purpose
content: Good Sound quality with bass effect and with good noise cancellation. Light weight and fits easily to the ears. Good ear buds for perfect fit to ears. Product material quality is premium.. Overall it is worthy product and it is good buy such quality product for listening to quality music as well as for taking calls.

name: Om
title: Great Sound Quality, Poor Durability
content: Could use them for roughly 6-8 months before something gave in internally and one side of the earphones stopped working. Even though its still under warranty, JBL does not have a service center in my city, nor do they do a pick up and drop.. Better durability would make these a peach.

name: Dheeraj Sharma
title: Not Holding the position properly.
content: It does not hold in the ear properly. Even while sitting on a chair, the bud (or speaker) slips out, forget about using on the move.. Otherwise the sound quality is fine.. Depth is missing. Means, Bass is not very prominent, Treble is.. Response of microphone is good.

name: Janak Lotwala
title: 1 Star Review.... Quality degraded so bad, it's harmful for ear
content: Generally, I am not much into reviews.. But came here specifically to mention the deterioration of quality that this product has undergone.. Have been user of this earphone from past 2 years. Previous one was great, but malfunctioned in 2 years, hence purchased, same new. Its terrible. Voice quality is so bad for Music that it will harm your ears.. Highly avoid.. Wish I can give 0 star

name: Noor
title: Great quality earphones
content: Using it for last 3 months..still works great. Initially I thought the price was high but I have used many head phones before this one feels good quality. The wire and speakers are strong. Sound quality and microphone quality is good too.

name: SP Gondal
title: Good. Remember no volume up - down button.
content: Though good it doesnt come with volume button like my previous ones. I didnt check before buying but I've always had ones with the volume control button so I expected it. Otherwise all good I am no music expert. But sound is not a problem. So all in all not bad.

name: Vinod Uniyal
title: Worst product just work for few days only
content: Why there is not Zero rating option or negative rating option. Seems This is not original JBL product this Chinese made product looks same as JBL. I have purchased because of JBL, but its not working well. some time left side speaker stopped working. sometime mic not worked. worst product and not durable, waste of money.

name: Miraj Trivedi
title: Worst product i dont thing so its JBL at all
content: I had very bad experience with these headphone.. I was super excited to receive headphone.but i received headphone that not working at all.. Thank you so much amazon for such kind of services.. My suggestion is to please do some quality checks before grant anyone to sell anything on your platform.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very good pair of earphones with average build quality
content: Iam satisfied with the purchase. Received the product today. It has good sound quality, vocals are so damn clear that you fall in love with the music. Isn't that much bassy but you get clear audio and even 60-70% volume is sufficient. It sticks into your ears, is very light, has a decent mic which can be switched off as well.. All in all a good package but the wire thickness is seriously low they are thinmer than the old gen earphones yoy receive with mobilephones...so build quality could have been better. I rate it 4.5/5

name: Maya Wathore
title: These headphones are quite good than other brands like boat
content: This headphones are too good than other brands like boat and many others.. Jbl is my one of trusted brand.. Bass - 9/10. Vocals - 9/10. Noice cancellation - 8.5/10. The only thing which you have to comprise is the wire don't you use it carelessly.. If you can't handle you should go for wireless headphones but you will have to charge it whenever you are going to use.. So bcoz of charging issue i bought wired headphones also it cheaper than wireless. Better for go for this product its awesome

name: Priyanka
title: Sound Quality is good. Price could have been lesser
content: I have been using this product for more than a week now. Sound quality is good. Mic quality is also good. But price could have been little lesser. When i opened the package, felt it like a cheap product. But with use realized its of quite good quality. mic is at correct distance which makes it easy to use without having to hold near mouth all the time while talking. 3 sizes of ear tips is of no use until multiple people are using the product but it surely comes handy in case if you lose one of them (I have lost the ear tips a couple of times before)

name: pooja
title: Good earphones with good sound quality and decent bass
content: Very good quality earphones. I was skeptical about the thin wire first,but I am been using it since 4 months. good build quality, good sound quality,bass was decent - not so loud as in speakers. Good earphones for everyday use.

name: Mayank Mandela
title: Poor Sound Quality of JBL by Harman
content: Poor sound quality. I am a musicians cum singer so I am very much quality focused person when it comes to sound quality. I thought being JBL by Harman it would be super sound quality but was disappointed after listening the sound quality. The Bass quality is Zero . I compared it with my Nokia ear phone which I had received along with my Nokia phone while I purchased and I must say the sound quality of this free accessories of Nokia is far far better than this JBL by Harman . I would never recommend anyone to buy this .

name: Aditya raj
title: sound quality is awesome but not durable and noise cancellation  is also good.
content: Good earphone (in term of sound and noise cancellation) under Rs1000 but it is not durable. Left ear piece stop working after 3 months.. The sound quality is just awesome and in respect to sound quality and noise cancellation this earphone will fulfill your demand.. But its left ear piece stop working after 3 months . I contacted the service centre for replacement but they refused to replace it because the rubber cover at the jack had teared up.. From jbl, i didn't hope this type of performance.

name: Shoumya Jana
title: Good earphones on a budget
content: Best in class hands down. Offers clear sound with decent bass. Best earphones in this price point. You have to wonder how they aren't 1-2 times the price. This is my 3rd earphones in the few years. My only gripe is they should offer tangle free wiring now. On an average they last for about 7-8 months based on my usage. Go for it if you are looking for a no complaints earphones for less.

name: ph baria
title: After 1yr 4 months of use i suggest that if you want to full fill your requirements you can GO
content: I am writing this review after 1yr 4 months of use.. I am a regular buyer of Amazon.. Best part of this earphone is that SOUND QUALITY IS Owesome, Bass is Good and you can hear clear sound.. It contains 3 sets of earbuds.. Value for money. Negative Point :. - It doesn't have plus(+) & minus (-) key. - after 6 months of use it's 3.5mm Jack portion becomes weak i think it's sign of dead earphones.. I want to buy 2nd time if Amazon give me discount.

name: Susheel Thakyal
title: Service issues with manufacturers India
content: The product is good, within days of using the product, now speakers not working. We have already complained, no resolution. If JBL is such a big company, can't they replace this product, and more important it's in warranty. Just bought and issues with speakers. Amazon is seller, however manufacturers is responsible to replace this product. It seems service by JBF at India is pathetic üòí. No resolutions even after mails and verbal communication to company in india.

name: Bablu Yadav
title: Disgusting piece sold at Amazon
content: This is the worst JBL earphones I have ever used. I have used JBL 150si and JBL T160. They both are way above this. I don't think this is even a genuine product. The packing looked original but the sound quality is exceptionally bad. A 200 rs unbranded earphone can sound like this. I switched from sanheiser cx180 and I am in disgust with this JBL.. If anyone wants JBL, buy it from Flipkart and get 150si during offers than buying from Amazon.. Utterly disgusted.

name: Chetan R Harithas
title: Super comfortable, decent microphone
content: I bought it because I really needed a pair of earphones with a mic and it serves that purpose. Don't expect good sound quality.. I mean it's in 500rs range. It doesn't get loud either, lesser than compared other 800 range earphones but it's super comfortable on the ears. I almost wear it for around 6-8 hours a day and I feel no pain or discomfort at all. So I'd say it's perfect if you're just buying it for the mic and want it to be comfortable. Otherwise I'd suggest to get something else.

name: Shilpa Gandotra
title: No volume control
content: I didn't realize when I bought these that there is no volume control on these earphones which is a bummer.. Otherwise they have performed well during phone calls, watching videos and listening to songs on the phone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: don't buy these low quality product, bad experience.
content: never buy headphones of JBL from Amazon I bought two this one (JBL C100SI I) yesterday onward not working. another (JBL T160) I bought that is also not working properly sound is very less. All these are Chinese made a low-cost segment. JBL must stop to fool customer and save your brand image and Amazon plz don't earn money by selling the low-quality product.. Warranty is given but nothing mentioned how to claim it. disgusting experience. I would request customer not to buy any such electronic product from Amazon.

name: NeOZ3rxes
title: look out for automatic volume changes and google assistance opening
content: Sound quality is good with good bass and decdnt dynamic range with a little missing on the mids.. Have been using for 5 months now and now i see an issue with it. whenever i plug em in, the volume keeps changing automatically. Moreover, this problem jad actually been ther from 3rd month but in the form of opening google assistant automatically, which was very rare fr me. it has practically become unusable although being in good condition. still not fixed but inside warranty. i hope they get it fixed soon though.

name: whitebeard
title: A general user.
content: not an earphone afficionado. For me it is enough, as i was looking for a durable and an affordable product.. the one thing that i was looking for is how well it rests on my ear and it doesn't disappoint.. surprised to see noice cancellation on such a cheap price. i wouldn't say it's the best but it works for me to focus while taking lectures online.. have to care for the earphone jack as there's no L shaped bend. Except that there's no other worries that i found.

name: P S Ranganathan
title: Very Unhappy
content: Product is definitely good, but i am disappointed that the product is manufactured in china, during my purchase i did see that it was mentioned that the country of Origin is India. Amazon or the Seller should not fool people like this.. I being regular shopper with Amazon and very very unhappy on this purchase not sure what process is followed here.

name: abhilekh
title: Worst Service In Earphone segment
content: Worst earphone from the service point of view.. JBL takes 1 month to repair the earphones.. Service centre you have to go twice if are in a big city like bangalore .. Once for getting token and 2nd time to get it repair.. It lasts around 6months if use it with care.. Normal Sound Quality.. Please for for sennheiser if you need quality on product and service... Great From Amazon..

name: Harmeet A.
title: Good
content: The earing bud is not as per indian people ,as the bud is very small. Not very comfortable.. Overall the sound and effect is very good. Satisfied. Only issue is cant put the bud for long time as not comfortable.

name: Abdul H.
title: Don't Buy It
content: I don't recommend this earphone.. 1. It automatically reduces the sound level to zero, and when I turn the volume to full, it again reduces to zero. I got frustrated. It happens frequently. 2. Its wired. I better invest another 1200 and buy OnePlus bullets wireless earphone. 3. The mic is very bad, I had hard time calling my friends and I had to shout while speaking.. Very bad earphone, this is my honest review and I 200% don't recommend this

name: Khalid
title: Totally satisfied and will re buy
content: Other than mic it is an outstanding product. I play pubg where sound is really important to detect enemies and I have not used better headphone than this.. It has lastest for 1 year with rough user like me so totally happy.

name: Mahes
title: Excellent product and service..!
content: Within 2 and half months one side speaker stopped working.But they gave me a new one within 3 days.Same speaker fault happened to me in MI earphone i couldn't even reach them.Excellent customer service and a product JBL provides Don't miss this .Just a phone call and whatsapp confirmation no need to go anywhere if product fails.

name: JAYESHKUMAR BHATT
title: One of the best headphones in the price range
content: I've been using these for more than 2 years now and I also lost them once and reordered the same ones again. Its at a prefect price range and the shape fits perfectly in the ears. The sound quality is great and with Spotify these have really shown.

name: Ragil KR
title: Good
content: Good one.... Bought two of this.. Jbl signature sound where u feel the trouble in every frequently. Very comfortable. Light wight. Best earphone under 1000 rs. 150 model also good which i bought 3 of them.... 200 model i have not used..

name: Mathanraj
title: I Expected More
content: To be honest, i would say the sound quality is good but not the best. Bought this after reading several reviews, but to my opinion with regard to price one can go for "Boat" brand itself. For the price bracket of 350, it does its job well.

name: Prachita Naik
title: comfortable
content: comfort level. walking/ jogging it doesn't comes out of ears.. while sitting also it is most comfortable earphone compared to my other earphones (Samsung and boat i have). while sleeping/laying down is comfortable as long as you lay down on your back.. sound quality is very good if you keep your mobile volume to full you will be able to hear sound just by keeping it near you.. bass - my Samsung and boat earphone have better

name: SABY J
title: Doesn't give a crisp sound
content: The product has got a good look. I found the treble to be very high with low bass. Doesn't look like a signature JBL product. Good for that price but the music are not punchier and tends to distort a little at volumes above 70%. Bass needs more improvement. Overall an average product

name: ABHINAVA DAFADE
title: Best earphone in terms of Sound signature and is better than SenhC180, but built quality is a low
content: Overall it has awesome sound signature whether it is bass or the crispy sound. The low and mids are well balanced even at high volume it might not hurt your ears. You need to tune your equalizer to boost the bass further to enjoy bass, it has decent bass as of without equalizer. Bass is not muddy at all, it comes when it has to and it feels like air punch on eardrum. Yeah! You can really feel it. I am sad for the built quality as the plastic cover used on it got torn due to curls in the wire. Overall 4.5 for jbl. idk why they dont promote jbl in india.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best there is!
content: It's too good! I have been using it for about two years. The wire has begun to wear off now, thought it's durable if used with good care. More than two years use at this price is more than enough.. Sound is awesome.. Quality is impressive.. Very comfortable for long time use as if comes with total 3 bud sizes to fit everybody's ears.. Price is competitive.. Value for money.. Noise cancellation is good enough.

name: Harshvardhan Tiwari
title: After 5 month review!
content: It's been 5 months since I purchased this awesome pair of headphones, and boy they are working quite fantastic. I can write this review with pros and cons but I more believe in short one's. I am travlelling in train now and because of the noise cancellation of this headphones I can't able to hear the train honking. Best build quality,noise cancellation and of course sound quality. I seldom write reviews but this product forced me to do so. Believe me buddy, you'll never regret after buying this headphones!

name: Dheeraj
title: Worst warranty/replacement
content: I‚Äôd have given negative ratings if possible. One side stopped working within 2 months.. Regarding replacement within warranty, JBL will ask you to visit nearest collection center. If you‚Äôre in Mumbai, things will be even bad for you as there are very limited service centers and considering the current situation its difficult to visit their.. Neither JBL, nor Amazon will understand this and you‚Äôll end up keeping the defective product anyway hoping the lockdown eases soon.

name: Chaitanya Naik
title: Sound Is boss by Harman
content: Sound quality is so better from Relme Buds 2,. I use for 1 year 8 Month and no complaints for Sound Quality but I regret to explain that the built quality is not so good, In 3.5 mm Jack wire may cut so that the sound is not deliver from speakers, but when I shake the wire near Jack then the sound is coming.. Now I buy once again this great ear phone cause I can't leave for that great sound. Whatsoever about built quality doesn't matter for me.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It don‚Äôt last it‚Äôs warranty period
content: I have purchase 4 Jbl earphones through amazon none of them lasted for one year. All four headphones one ear sound has gone before warranty period . Last one I bought in may in which again sound in on ear has stopped . working . When i was question by some one on warranty then I realized and checked on warranty it‚Äôs one year I have written to them for last product let‚Äôs see what reply I get . But non of them lasting for year something is wrong . I found sound as good till the time its been working .

name: Akhilesh Nacham
title: Mik and Mik button is not working
content: Hi Team,. This is my second headphones which was replaced with my first headphones. I am surprised if all the products are detected? I would like to replace this red headphones with the white headphones atleast those white colour would work properly.. Note: I request you to please send the technician, so that I can show him directly about the defective product. I would also like to take a video while showing him so that people gets awareness. Pissed offffff.

name: ASHNA R
title: Stopped working after 8 months... Amazon supplied a duplicate or bad quality product
content: Please don't buy any electronics items online. I purchased this on 15th February and after 8 months it stopped working. They just supplied a duplicate or bad quality product and we, costumers have no place to complain about the issue if we purchase online. And I have a philips basic earphone, which is working nicely for about 5-6 years without any complaint.

name: Sameer Avhad
title: Worst Product and even Worst Warranty Service
content: Usually JBL products are durable, but this time my "JBL C100SI In-Ear Headphones" stopped working on 5 months. After calling Customer Care, they suggest to send the product by courier to Gurgaon Service Center for replacement.. It does not make sense to spend Rs.300 on courier for replacement of product which costs Rs.700 and that too they have no guarantee about replacement. Why cant there be service centers in major cities if you are selling product through out country.

name: Raj
title: One of the Best budget earphones in terms of sound quality
content: Better than boat 225 in terms of sound quality and comfort.those who doesn't like too much bass this is the best earphones for you in this budget.I rated 5/5 for sound quality and noise cancellation.sound is very much crystal clear and not distorted even on full volume.the ear buds are very much comfortable and you can easily use them for hours.built quality is avg. But you can negotiate it with in this prize.

name: Balram Choudhary
title: Technical disorder with manual mistake.
content: In this case fault was mine. My phone was not working and getting hang anytime. Due to touch problem in my phone, the order get cancelled by mistake. Then I tried my best not to cancel and contact amazon immediately. Unfortunately the product was shipped and cancelled. Anyway I will never change blaim amazon for this. I tried this product possessed by somebody else, but quality was not good.

name: Dr. Sarang
title: Quality Product by JBL
content: These Headphones from JBL are very good quality with low budget. Excellent quality sound, nice fitting in ears, noise cancellation by rubber ear buds which fits accurately in the ear canal without any discomfort. You can use these ear phones continuously for 5-6 hours without any trouble.

name: Ragul Ravi
title: Good for its price of ‚Çπ550
content: The sound coming from the product is not so high. But the earphones is very well blocking the ears so that we cannot hear any sojnd from the outside world. We will be having many different other products at the same price range. So I dont suggest you all to buy this productfor sure. But I can say you will not be disappointed with this one.. Also quick delivery for this product from amazon... Kudos to that...

name: Sanjeevani Saikia
title: Keep tuning!
content: Sound, bass, noise cancellation, fit and everything else is just good. Plus it's got a mic. It's better than the others available for the similar price range. Got it for 549. Edit: The right one stopped working after a few months of using them.

name: sumit singh
title: Great earphones but wire quality is bad.
content: The jbl C100Si is a great earphone regarding the sound quality (bass not that great). The earphone fits in your ears quite comortably.Sound is good,you can clearly hear the vocals and instruments,bass is there but not very high.if you are a rough user than these earphones are not for you as the wire quality is bad (my boat bassheads 100 have a better wire than these) and also they get tangled easily.I got these from the sale in just 500 rupees.There is only one button for play,pause,play next song,play previous song.

name: gayathri thangaraj
title: Frustration
content: Horrible. Within 2 days, left side ear piece stopped working. As i didn't have the complete package, couldn't return it. What a horrible thing. Trusting the company and thrown the package on same day, but it didn't work the very next day. Whats the need of brand and nonsense?

name: RAVI BHAKAL
title: Definitely buy, but beware Made in china
content: I love JBL. I have many JBL products.. These earbuds are awesome.. What hits my mind is that it comes with a tag saying " made in China"ü§îüòí. And now before completing a whole year, right side earpiece had stopped working.. So i guess this is its durability.

name: Krishna gouda
title: Warranty claim
content: update: I use it 4-5 month good bothside speaker.after that right side speaker did not working.i try my best to claim warranty, they just say your earphones is physically damage.. But I try to search where is the physical damaged ,I seen that ear jack uppar supporting cover just twist,main earphones cover is very good conditions.I think company play imotions with consumers... Re: thanks !! JBL too late to response warranty claim.

name: The rock
title: Not satisfied
content: Good product but sound quality is not as I expect. JBL not send me original product I think this product was copy because when I received I read all the instructions there written this product is made in chaina so I think this is notüò§ orignal but product was okay not given five star. I give you 5 out of 1 star because I m not satisfied with this product....ü§®

name: Ashwin
title: One of the best on the market!
content: Rare to see earphones of this quality at this price. Bass is a little low but overall sound fidelity is excellent. Can take a lot of abuse as well. I have stuffed it in my jeans and my backpack and carted it everywhere without breaking for over 2 years.

name: rocky
title: Poor quality.
content: Do yourself a favor and don't buy these headphones. The sound quality is, what's the word to describe it? Jarring. You want to actual enjoy the music, not diverting your attention to imagining about how better it could have been. You get what you pay for. Spend more and get something better.

name: Venkatakrishnan
title: Decent headphones in budget
content: Sound quality is good with this pair of headphones. However, the wire quality is very thin and hence can be considered below par for a premium company like jbl. Bass is not thumping but is not bad too. Overall for 550 bucks, can't complain much.

name: J.mat
content: JBL has never been disappointing, the sound quality is too good. The bass is also good enough.. the noise cancellation is not good enough in lower volumes. The way it looks is stylish and it fits perfectly in the ear. The only tiny problem I faced was that, We can receive calls through it, but we can't cut a call on the earphone itself.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent earphones
content: Excellent earphones. Durable and lightweight. Earbuds are comfortable and can be worn for long hours. The wires look thin but I have used them for a couple of years without any damage. Sound quality is pretty good and bass is decent. No active noise cancellation. JBL earphones have better sound quality than most of the brands in the similar price range. Great buy for regular use.

name: Ankit Singh
title: I Brought 2 ear phones back to back Both stop  working same time interval :(
content: in 2017 I brought this earphone and I really love its sound quality but after using it around 6 months, Right ear stop working I was so obsessed with it and go for another one but the same thing happens after 8 months from purchase date. I am so depressed and heartbroken due to this incident. its affect me economically too I did not want it to repeat. so now it's over jbl ... TA TA

name: Rishabh Vashisht
title: Weak wire, Stopped working within a month
content: Wire is too thin, and within a month the right earpiece stopped working which has mic attached to it's wire, it cant even take a little impact of accidental pull which usually happen during sleep or taking out from the pocket. I am stuck with this as the costumer care number is always busy and there is only one service centre for whole Delhi and NCR which i cannot access in this pandemic.

name: DM Panda
title: Very comfortable, you can easily use it 7-8 hrs a day, without any pain.
content: This one is good in its price range. I have used Sony Extra Bass AP-75 earphones which are extremely rich in sound and bass. So this earphone isn‚Äôt that good for me. But at a price range of 650, won‚Äôt get good from this. One thing is very clear, these are very comfortable earphones. After wearing for a while you will forget that you have it in your ears.

name: Tarun
title: Mic is terrible and a nuisance
content: I wanted a earphone that I could use to just talk to friends on a call or something, but the mic picks up every piece of audio loud and clear that's supposed to be for the ear part of the earphones. I can't use these to talk to anyone as it echoes everything they are saying making these earphones a nuisance.

name: Rajiv Kumar Sivaram
title: Stopped working after 1 week of use
content: Stopped working after 1 week of use... Best to go for Creative..its lasts really long... Thought ill try something different n went for this...But utter flop... Did not return but instead plased order for a Creative EP-600 which I was originally using as durability is really good.

name: Ashish
title: Heaven for a basshead.
content: If you‚Äôre into EDM, Hip Hop, then you should buy this. Lows are fantastic, mid & highs are alright. But it‚Äôs a budget headphone and you‚Äôre getting beast in that category.. If you like sound straight, then it is not recommended, because of great lows you cannot really feel any magic in highs and mid. It felt a little lifeless when used for jazz, classical, alternative.

name: R S
title: Under quality product from a well known brand
content: Poor quality microphone phone, people on other end of call cannot hear clearly while using headphones, and there is no noice cancelation as advertised. As mentioned by other reviewers, if you love bass this headphone is not for you.

name: dhostbhubhu
title: Ear wax eater headstone for PUBG....
content: Pros..... 1) good sound .... can give all effects if you are playing PUBG on mobile..... 2) Nicely connects Samsung models like J7,galaxy tab A 8 or auxus phone..... Con..... 1) eats wax from your ear daily.... so good for your ear but... have to clean it daily ( as per your usage) on a softest cloth available in your home....

name: Program
title: Good but not very good
content: 100/100 for noice cancellation, but sound isn't clear enough.. Very low base compared to other earphones (under 500).. This Earphone is not wrinkle free and rubber at metal Jack is started tearing after use of 20 days (physical damage not considered in warranty). Jbl product registration is another headache (you may not find product registration page easily on jbl India site). This product isn't value for money.. It's price should be 400-500.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Horrible product
content: The right side of the earphone has stopped working. The microphone cannot be used for speaking as the opposite person cannot hear clearly. Not recommended to purchase. Amazon needs to stop recommending sellers if the product become defective within the warranty period and they expect us to go and try to find the seller who is located in another bloody city to rectify the defect. Really disappointing service by Amazon. Happened 3 times in a row.

name: Asha
title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT. PERHAPS FAKE
content: The right earphone has stopped working and it is just 6 months since I bought the product. The customer care number just plays tunes and keeps you on hold with no solution. Kindly replace the same for me. Seller is not supportive. The customer care number is invalid. and even when you write to JBL, they ask you to come to remote service centres and no guarantee of replacement in spite of being on warranty. DO NOT BUY.

name: MV
title: Good sound quality but not lasting.
content: Earphones on one side stopped working after 5 months of use. Then I had them replaced after speaking to JBL customer service, since there is one year warranty. The replaced ones have also stopped working on one side now after 1 month use.

name: Dhaval
title: Okay, not great
content: It is an okay headphone with decent sound quality. Not to expect much in this price tag and segment. But if you are an irregular, infrequent user then this is fine. If you are a heavy user, would suggest to switch to else.. When you run using this, the thumping sound carries into your head and makes it bad for use for running.

name: Rani Chatterjee
title: The best one I have used in this proce range.
content: I have used this same product twice before, so this is the third time. And within this price range, I find it to be the best.. Though frequent use causes the attachments to break and the wores show, still, sound quality is very nice.

name: Athul
title: Best budgeted earphones .... ever
content: The sound quality and the material used to make this earphone is great..... And also because of the good quality material ,the earphone is much lighter when compared to the other .. When taking about answering a call this earphones are good becoz of the reduction of the surrounding noise and it also enhance the voice through the mic.. I think the modal of the jack is pretty old ..and also the wire is sometimes getting tangled if it is not kept properly.... .. these 2 problems were solved this earphone will be much better..... But even with these problems this earphone is better when compared to the other earphones of this price....

name: Dhanesh Sawant
title: Amazing product
content: Wow great product amazing good quality üéßüéßüéßüéßüéß and superb for listening music and watching movies and best noise cancellation is also good while calling amazing product nice. Wow amazing product with a good noise cancellion and bass quality is really very nice i had purchased this product on 8 june i like it very very much and very very good product .üéºüé§üéßüéßüéßüéßüéºüé∂üé∂üéµüéºüéßüéßüéßüéßüéºüéßüéßthanks a lot amazon thank u really very very much have a nice day amazingüéßüéºüéºüéßüéßüéßüéßüéßüéß

name: Chandramani singh
title: Best in Price
content: Used this model for few months, very satisfied with the sound quality and noise cancellation.. The size of the buds is perfect, can be used for hours without causing any pain or distress.. Best for people who sleep sideways while listening to music.

name: Roopa
title: Average headphone and not comfortable
content: It's more of a brand value. Music quality is decent but no wow factor there. Very regular call quality. Looks very delicate. It does noise cancellation by snug fit but same thing makes it uncomfortable to wear more than a hour.

name: Venkatraman
title: Excellent Buy at this price point
content: This JBL is a must buy and a worthy one at that, if you are looking at a lower price point and high quality. Delivered neatly and working well for some time now. The Bass is good on this one, voice clarity is good. You might not want to take official calls, due to a 100% noise cancellation not being available. For music and workouts its a great choice. The quality of the material used for manufacturing is nice. Overall a good package to benefit from.

name: Lee
title: Worth it under 600‚Çπ segment
content: Used this for like 2-3 months and still it didn‚Äôt disappoint me!. Good when it comes to sound quality especially when u r in travel it reduces outside noise!. But can‚Äôt use it continuously for more than 3 hours, it hurts a bit when using it for a long time!

name: Paul Martin
title: Pls do not buy fake
content: Guys do not buy this is a cheap duplicate,even the price of lightning deal itself is not worth - this is not a product of JBL i know for sure, i have using JBL and Harman products for the past 10 years from earphones soundbars till studio monitors , these are fake duplicates

name: Anubhuti S
title: Simple and does the job - great sound + bass
content: Rated it 2/5 for Volume Control since it does not have Volume buttons on the mic panel. I brought it as a knee-jerk replacement for my old earphones which stopper working after a faithful 3 years.. I'm not a huge music/audio fanatic so my review may not be very weighted. This does the job, hasn't stopped working so far, mic works great, the sound quality and the bass are quite good. I would recommend.

name: Anand
title: Ok Item
content: The build quality is pretty poor and gets tangled pretty easily. That does not look well. The quality of the audio is acceptable for a normal user. Bass is pretty heavy and noise cancellation works decent.

name: Dr. G@ur
title: Stylish but Unreliable
content: The product is exactly what one would expect from JBL. Color is awesome and so is the sound quality. Ear pieces don't give pain to the ears and are comfortable to wear. Movie or music, a nice experience is guaranteed.. One little thing though, the earphones broke down after 6 months of use though JBL was ethical enough to replace them. That's good of JBL to keep its promise. It would have made for a great review but unfortunately the replacement too stopped working a few days after the warranty expired!

name: Pankaj
title: Overpriced for this quality
content: Not a great sound for this price. I expected better. I have another earphone in the same price segment with a different brand which is much better than this. This kind of quality is available in 200-300 INR easily. Don't waste your money buying this.

name: Kunal S.
title: JBL C100SI review with pros and cons
content: jBL C100SI review. best earphone under 1500rs. I got this for ‚Çπ599 on Amazon sale. PROS-. Sound quality is wow...these days people are preferring Bluetooth earphones but i must say this is far better than those Bluetooth earphones.. Noise cancellation is amazing.. Bass quality- base is adequate.. good mid's and low's.. very pronounced vocals.. wires are tangle free.. a dedicated mic for taking calls and call clarity is amazing.. CONS-. wire quality is not upto the mark you have to use it carefully otherwise can get damage easily.. lack of bass. rating just based on the sound-8.5/10

name: VinSeeTech
title: Crystal Clear Clarity...
content: Excellent quality product.. crystal clear clarity sounds ... Bass frequency is like Dolby sounds... best fit in ear and have no feel for pain even using it at long period... Drawback is it has no volume controller.. and is thin wire.. But I recommending this for comfortable and quality sound hearing...

name: Tinu Cleetuz
title: THOSE YOU DOESN'T NEED A MIC CAN PLACE THE ORDER
content: the headphone is good but I'd like to let everyone one know that it's say it comes with a mic! YES!! they are right but IT DOES NOT WORK!. My original order was returned because the mic did not work and i was given a replacement! When the replacement arrived, the first thing to do was check the mic & there it goo... AGAIN MIC NOT WORKING!. I would suggest the headphone for those who doesn't need a mic! Apart from mic the headphone has a quality sound!

name: Meet Mehta
title: You wo t regret buying it !
content: The product is really extraordinary. It performs extremely well in the sound department. The lower frequencies are bang on with great results at the opposite end. Best in the price range for wired earphones.

name: Faizan Ahmad
title: Amazing, Good quality, Good Sound
content: Its amazing earphone just as i was expecting in this price range from a brand like JBL. The mic is very good and noise cancellation of mic is amazing. But yeah bass is not that good but overall this is the best product that i think i may get.. I will surely recommend you this earphone if you are gonna use it for gaming or making video for YouTube.

name: Sumit Thakur
title: Connector of earphone is not so good
content: Sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality was good... But life of earphone was not good... As I buy it on 08.june. 2019. Left side of speaker was get damaged, I cut the left side of earphone and managed to used only right side.. But after 1 week right side also get damaged. And earphone now is not for any work as it is now fully damaged... And while I troubleshoot the fault, it is because of the connector.... The wire get damaged at the connector end.

name: Amritansh purwar
title: Jbl & it's degradation in lower segments.
content: If you're a jbl fine. This review is not for you!. it's wire quality is so weak that more than feeling the emotions of song you are focused that the wire doesn't get damaged. Sound and everything good but look for better option like evidson b3/4 , ant audio , woofy bass head , klex X1 . Far more superior and you'll bless me when you get those products rather than this. will not suggest to buy.

name: Yash
title: Good Earphones but has one problem
content: I have been using these earphones for almost 3 years now. I have bought 4-5 of these in these years. The sound quality is really good and the bass is good as well but it's not very powerful though I like that. These are great earphones but the only problem with these is that one earphone stops working after almost a year even if you use them with care. Sometimes it stops working after some months. I have noticed this problem with most of the earphones in this price range. Apart from this these are good earphones and are better than the Sennheiser CX180 cause it offers a microphone and the sound is balanced. If you want more bass than you should go for CX180.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Defective
content: Please don't buy these as there is a manufacturing defect (2020 manufacturing). A lot of echo and feedback during calls.. I cannot even register for warranty. No good support from customer care.. I purchased 2 earphones, both have same issue.. Got to know from some friends that it is a known issue in this year's manufacturing.. Very bad customer support from JBL

name: Amazon Customer
title: DUPLICATE PRODUCTS FROM AMAZON
content: I buyed this from Amazon and the responce of Bass is very low, just same as normal headphone and there after I returned it to Amazon.. After a week I purchased the same from the market, and the sound clarity as well as Bass response is awesome.. SUGGESTION:- Always buy from market with bill to avoid Duplicate Products.

name: Raghvendra singh tomar
title: NOT DURABLE
content: I have brought this headphone on 5th march and it's left side ear bud stops working in october.. As it wa in warnatty but JBl service centers are limited and customercare telling a long process to replace it

name: Ankit Pal
title: Best of the best
content: you can't find better earphone than this no matter what price, this is solely for talker. it has noise cancellation mic which is the best feature of this earphone, super light weight and comfortable.

name: Hyderabad Family
title: Amazing product
content: Really good product, amazing noise cancellation, sound quality is so good sometimes I think the sound of coming from my room and I turn back to see if someone is there! Really great product for extended use, comfortable and doesn't hurt ears after wearing for long, which is a problem with many headphones

name: Aryan Rao
title: Defected within month and a half
content: I bought this earphone month and a half ago and left side of the earphone isn't working. I am really disappointed by this earphone and same happened with my jbl headphone who stopped working after 2-3 month. Actually wire end at the jack is of very poor quality and which is the main why this earphones stops working.. You cant even claim warranty as there is no proper website neither the site as mentioned on the box is in reach.. Now i am stuck with this earphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Please do not buy!!
content: Very bad product. It is a very new product with amazing noise cancellation. But, I did not know it cancels all sorts of sound. Mic is poor with the person on the other end always complaining of no sound..and after 4-5 days the bass also went poor. Utter waste of money. Now due to Corona outbreak I cannot return it also or contact any customer care.

name: Mahi
title: Poor quality Microphone. Earphones aren't working well after a month
content: The sound quality and bass quality of these earphones is really great.. But... the earphones are really a problem. They catch a lot of static and are not at all noice cancelling. My noice is never clear due to this earphones during zoom/google meet calls. But I let that problem go. Now, just after 1 month of buying the earphones, there is some distortion in the noice whenever I move the cords, even with the slightest touch.. Worst experience

name: Alfar Alfi
title: Budget friendly
content: As a heavy music lover I can't recommend this. But due to the budget this is really good. For a first time user this is really good and heavy music lovers it's not recommended. The highs lows and mids are not good.

name: JITENDRA CHHIPA
title: small life
content: I am purchase same time JBL and boot earphone but after use one year JBL earphone have a J1 right side earphone not working properly and they have damage and whenever I use one side is not working properly in JBL product but as at the same boat earphone working a nice and good swan with sound quality boot is a good and JBL is not a good this product is not good

name: Tapan
title: Good for the price
content: Good overall earphones for the price.. I bought these and the Boat Bass head 255 at the same time.. These are have had better sound quality and are more comfortable to wear from the beginning.. These earphones are also working great after 2 months of regular use while the boat ones have lower volume coming out of one earpiece now. Go with these if you are confused between these two.

name: Natasha Aman
title: Worth everything you pay for
content: Second time I bought these earphones (first set got stolen). I love them!! Love the bass, cancels out noise, good on volume and clarity, ticks all the boxes. I was never a fan of in ear headphones but these totally changed that as they are quite comfortable to wear. Must Buy!!

name: Amritesh Kumar Sinha
title: Best sound quality at this price by jbl
content: Best earphones you can get at this price point. Sound is very crisp and clear. Bass is adequate not overwhelming. One drawback though, at higher volumes sound can be heard by surrounding people. Just be careful with the thin wires.

name: Sourav Tiwari
title: Dont gift this to your gf ,
content: I ordered this for my gf and she started complaning me why didnt you gave me bluetooth speaker ,why this one i was so ashamed that day my head was down ,great now she broke up we are not talking for more than 3 months ,i dont know hows the product ,if you can contact her please ask her for the feedback yes she didnt gave any feedback of our relationship so bro ask that to ,i am going for the next one i just want to check wether am doing right or wrong

name: Arunesh
title: Sound is great but built quality is not up to mark
content: Cheap built quality.. No coating or protection on wire.. No L shape connecter.. Price is high if we compare with other brands but it looks cheaper plastic.. Sound quality is nice

name: Rohit Kumar Swami
title: JBL vs Sensor .. sensor wins.
content: JBL is good but they should work on build quality of earphone. I use Sensor 310 dor last 1 year in same rate around 650rs. But i must say build quality and sound quality is equal to JBL. Sensor is not big brand like JBL but JBL should work upon yourself.

name: Biken patel
title: Paise vasool .........
content: I bought this headphone in nov 2018.... Now today on 10th july 2020 i am giving review of this JBL headphone... Still this headphone is working as its new... I love the quality of sound.... Before few month wire of headphone was damaged by me.. but that outer damaged hadn't effected on sound quality.... This is my first headphone which stays this much long duration of time.... I really love this..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Replacement request
content: Hi, I got the JBL c100si earphones on 12th Jan and started using the same since 15th jan. After 2 week's use I encountered the problem with microphone of the earphones. When I make the call, the person on the receiver end isnot able to hear me. Also when I play music, it gets paused automatically and I need to replay the music manually from phone. It's quite irritating to face such problems just after a week's use of the earphones. I want a replacement of the same though the replacement window closed on 22 Jan.

name: Sameer
title: Should you go with brand nameüôÑ?
content: If you're a rough user please dont buy them . Im serious they're really fragile.. As far as noise cancellation is concerned its passive that it blocks all sorts of music by sticking like a valve in your ear which might irritate you after some time.. If you're confused between realme buds 2 and this one i recommend go for Realme one, because i know you are more attracted to brand name but believe me it (particularly this one) doesn't worth.

name: Android Member
title: Best Earphones at this price point
content: I have been using this earphone for 8-9 months and have not had any issues so far. If I talk about the sound quality of this earphone, it is quite good, the base is very good and the clarity of the sound is also very good. Build quality is average, it is made up of plastic and cables are not braided. Full review available on "Android Member" YT channel.. 1. Overall 4/5. 2. Sound Quality 4/5. 3. Bass 3.5/5. 4. Noise Cancellation 2/5

name: Rohit Dutta
title: Excellent product and appriciating service by Amazon.
content: JBL is a known and popular brand. Describing only about this product JBL C100SI, it do have a wounderfull and clear sound üîä. I would recommend you to go for it. Use it, you'll believe yourself üõí.. Amazon service is also appriciable, in this period of COVID-19 lockdown 4.0, Amazon has early delievered the item with proper precurtions taken as per Corona Virus hygiene üëè. Great Job Amazon üëç.

name: Surender verma
title: Not looking a original product
content: I using JBL ear phones last 3years that time I was purchased from JBL store same product same model in red color and their quality of sound is totally great, but this time when I purchased this from Amazon only I choose a different color but the quality of sound is so cheap it's looking like duplicate product

name: Swati
title: QUALITY ISSUES
content: I HAVE PURCHASED THE HEADPHONE TWICE, THE SOUND EXPERIENCE IS NICE BUT THE QUALITY OF WIRE USED IS POOR. THE HEADPHONE WIRE WILL START TEARING OFF ULTIMATELY EXPOSING THE WIRE THAT TOO WILL BE GONE IN SOME DAYS.. INITIALLY THOUGHT THAT I MIGHT HAVE HANDLED THEM ROUGHLY SO NEXT TIME SAME HEADPHONES WERE ORDERED AND I KEPT THEM INTACT. BUT SAME THING HAPPENED. AFTER JUST 6 MONTHS. THE WIRE STARTED TO TEAR OFF AND NOW ONLY ONE EARPIECE WORKING.. WILL RECOMMEND TO GO FOR OTHER BRAND .

name: Vishnu Rajeevan
title: Had a really poor experience with this
content: The product got damaged in a couple of months! And to avail warranty, I was told to ship this product to a JBL warehouse; which would cost almost the product price! So had to throw it away! Disgusting experience

name: nixram
title: A decent low budget headphone
content: Don‚Äôt expect much from it. It‚Äôs a cheap buy if you need a replacement for your mobile headset or if you need one for your laptop. But I am sure there would be better choices out there with far more better quality.

name: Manoranjan Paikaray
title: Worst
content: Really not good. I saw review and order it but there's big problem when I plug in its not working properly for conversation. So in my point of view we can't it.. I throw all packing material that's why I can't return also. So pathetic.

name: Anirudh
title: Nothing great but usable still.
content: Fair purchase for non fussy users. High on durability. Not so high on precision sound quality. Will do for regular travel, and sometime leisure usage.. Also kind of fits the use and discard category.

name: Revati AS
title: Disappointing
content: For JBL, this product is disappointing. Half the time the right ear phone doesn't work. When reached out to customer care for replacement I was asked to drop it in a service centre. My visit to the place for dropping and picking the earphones would cost the same as the earphone itself and hence I dropped the idea of visiting the centre. Please do not pick the model if you want quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sturdy as Iphone headphone
content: Sturdy.. but dont have chance to listen music as i bought for Phone calls mainly ... the ear bud rubber available in different shapes ... small one suits me well .. Decent buy .... I like the sturdy build... expect more life Also works with Iphone and android

name: prathmesh
title: Go for It
content: This is my 2nd time purchase first headphone i used for 15month which i lost then this same headphone i purchased. This headphone has good sound clearity ,BEST noise cancellation ,bass is good Overall it gives u best music experiance.i found only one con quality of wire is not good .wear can be seen after one year.but it can be avoided by using headphone cover and taking care wire .so I will strongly recommende This is the headphone for good music experiance Go For It.

name: Kushan
title: Could have been better
content: Sound is nice but the wire quality is average as you'll have to be careful all time because you cannot use it harshly as the joint might get damaged as its a straight joint not an angular one..so these earphones must be for those who enjoys sound quality as regular person might damage it in a month or two.

name: Sandesh
title: After replacement..its awesome
content: I have ordered this product in Amazon sale .. received early.. great service from Amazon..but product is not working.. only left jack is working... Right side is not working..i m very disappointed.. but Amazon replaced this product with new...n new one is just awesome.. thx amazon

name: Asari Abdur Rahman
title: Better that other brands out there.
content: I have used this product for almost more than 15 days.. The best thing in addition to sound and structure is its small bud size die to which i can sleep wearing them. Other earphones are such a pain in this form. Well done.

name: Sunil Shinde
title: Not upto the mark as per JBL standards
content: Overall review of the product. Material quality- not up to the mark 3/5. Sound quality - not upto the mark by its own standrds. Durability - it sucks since I used it very carefully and never used while I am traveling. Only used when I was home and listening to music but now there is no sound from one side.. If you are not here for JBL brand and you can buy this at lesser 500 bucks then you can go for it since it doesn't justify it's own standards.

name: Tourlin T.
title: Best for day to day use
content: it's JBL! Believe it. It's been months that i bought. Still enjoying with no issue. Treble is a bit high. U need to adjust the earpiece at an angle to fully enjoy the BoOm!. For best durability, use a headphone pouch while carrying. The wire is a little thin.. Overall it's a best buy

name: Vineeth Vinod
title: Only lasted a few months!
content: The quality of sound and bass are good but the product did not last long. After 4 months the left speaker started fading and then after some more time it completely stopped working on the left side.. Same happened to a friend of mine who bought this product.. I would suggest not to buy this one. At least not online.

name: Prajwal Chigod
title: Best product in the price range
content: If you are buying a earphone within price range of 10k, this is the go to earphone from jbl. ear fit, awesome, sound quality awesome, bass awesome. but the build quality is low so have to maintain with care, its wires are prone to get cut or detached so handle with care, the only drawback is its build quality. so if you are looking for good sound quality earphone with mediocre build quality go for this earphone without any second thoughts.

name: Firdaus
title: Very bad post-sales service
content: They went obsolete after less than a year. The issue was covered in warranty so I asked them repair it. Their customer service team gave a false assurance, told me it'd be picked up and replaced but nobody came and they made me wait just long enough so that the warranty on my headphones lapsed.

name: Pranjal Vats
title: A must have in the price range.
content: I must say I am in love with these. The sound quality is absolutely brilliant. Though one thing to notice is that has not so great cable quality,it gets tangled easily,mine broke in 7 months. But hey the sound quality overpowers everything. Bass is adequate, mids are perfect,highs are good too. U must go for it,if u want good sound.

name: Regular Customer
title: Good Sound But Poor in quality.
content: - Material used in wire is quite delicate doesn't feels like a JBL quality product.. - The audio jack pin doesnt have a strong and hardened material cover to protect the wire enough from bending.. - The Left and Right Icons should have poor visibility in terms of color and placement.. It would be great if this product comes with music controller.

name: Ananya
title: Bad quality
content: The package in which it came was in quite a good condition.It was delivered on 10 October 2020 the delivery was on time and till now I have used it only twice.The first time I used it was working well but now voice is coming in only one earphone the other one has no sound.The replacement time period has passed so I cannot replace it.But I would definitely want Amazon to come forward and do something because it's within it's warranty period.Amazon please reply.

name: Phaneendra U M
title: Great sound, good build quality
content: I bought the earphone to attend meeting calls over phone. They are very good and the earplugs block out most of the noise from outside. The mic also id good. I'm not a very big music person so the clarity is very good and the quality of music is amazing for me. Build quality is good too though I have to see how it goes in the long run. Overall very satisfied with it and would definitely recommend.

name: vk rajvanshi
title: Mic stops working before a year, without any reason
content: Bought on dec 3,2017 from cloudtail india it's 19aug, 2018 today.. Before a year it's mic stops working, without any reason.. Though it's speakers are quite durable, i use it rough but they still work great, has great sound quality, but durability is less compared to t series

name: Sandip Das
title: Super Bass!!
content: Pros:. 1. Could never believe this small beast could deliver a sound of this quality.. 2. Very nice finish of the product. 3. Even if it is cheap one from the JBL, there is no compromise on the work it does. The bass is really unbelievable along with the mids and lows.. Cons:. 1. As of now there is none.

name: Deepak Prabakar
title: Bad sound quality
content: I bought this for my dad under the blind assumption that since its a JBL, must be good. Lifelong user of Audio Technica here. I expected these to be a little heavy on the bass. And it is as expected. If bass is the only thing that you need from your music, go for this. Else, it's a definite no-go. I bought these as a replacement for Motorola earphones that come in the box. Sadly, those have a better quality compared to these.

name: Adnan Khan
title: One of My Best Decision to Purchace It...
content: This Earphone is one of the Best Earphones Ever I had. The Sound Quality is Excellent and the Bass is Punchy and I would Like to Give 5 Stars to its Durability Because when I Am in Train Due to Rush the Earphone was dropped on the floor of the train and people crushed it But when I realised that my earphone was Crushed I was in Shock and I think that it was broken. But I picked it and try to use at that Time I was Totally Shocked thet it was Working Properly

name: keerthi
title: Not satisfied with service
content: I would have given negative rating if existed.. The design of the product lead to its physical damage by wear and tear of outer cover even after handling with care.. They claim to give 1 year warranty which they didn't because it was physically damaged.. Eventhough it's the company fault not designing the product to be robust, user has to bear the loss. Product is not worth the price.. They should have tagged JBL with handle with utmost care.

name: CJK
title: Best in this price range
content: Best earphone for this price. I'm using it for last 3 years. Not even a single complaint yet. Both sides are working extremely fine. Sound quality is perfect. Noice cancellation is good. Bass quality is outstanding when the price is considered. I felt that the mic is not upto the mark. Not the best for recording your singing. Thouh, if your concern is listening to music in high quality and phone calls, I can promise you this is the best in this price range.

name: srivalli
title: Completely useless
content: I got these earphones on 29.10.2018 and today is 31.10.2018. Believe it or not one side of the earphone is not working and next I realised all those people trying to call me and when I try answering them using these earphones the mic is not working.. And this also does not have a return policy. So please don‚Äôt buy these earphones as it really doesn‚Äôt serve the purpose of one.

name: Sandeep
title: Faulty before 3 months of purchase.
content: Not completed 3 months since I bought it. Left ear plug voice has nearly gone despite of using it with full care. The product description stated 1 year warranty but don't know how to claim it and where to go.

name: Kartik Gautam
title: BANG FOR THE BUCKS!!! üíØ
content: The sounds quality and sound stage is excellent. The bass is punchy, comes at the right time and just goes away. Sound doesn't gets muffled at higher volume levels also. The highs are crispy and clear, the mid levels are also good. The earphones are very comfortable to wear for long periods of time.. But the build quality seems above average... No braided wire, all rubber coated and also..the earpiece are totally made up of plastic.. but it's good quality plasticüëçüèª.Got this deal for just 699 rupees it's a MUST BUY PRODUCT üíØ.

name: A. Powers
title: Stopped Working in a month. JBL Customer Support BAD !
content: Ear phone on one side stopped working in a month's time.. Warranty / Customer Support very bad.. Sent product to service centre as told. No resolution. Only messages regretting delay in response.. Bottom line. Buying JBL Ear phones is risky. Suspect refurbished product being resold in market, explaining low cost offers.

name: IT shavy
title: Not recommend for crowded places or to use while traveling.
content: Voice is crystal clear .. Bass:7-10. Treble-10-10. Look & feel is cheap. 5-10. Avl Color option Red,black & White. Look & feel is cheap. 5-10. Its Audio quality is similar to "Audio Technica CLR100" for more BASS go with "JBL T110" in the same price bracket.. Recommended for Home only where u can listen all instruments in music play.. Not recommend for travelling or noisy places.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stay Away from this Product!!!
content: I ordered the same headphone a year back, that was really awesome, but this time I have ordered and I found a problem on the right earpod, their is a chirping sound when the headphone is connected to my mobile and idle, I reordered and they delivered it today, this time the the right earpod is not working, (the headphone is brand new). Please don't order this one , no one is bloody checking before the delivery, Amazon!! Please awake....

name: Deepankar
title: Buy it off
content: The wires are thin and sleak.. Looks premium.. Super small microphone, doesn't look weird hanging from your ears.. Brilliantly small earpieces that set right inside your ears, barely even visible.. Great, well balanced audio performance and long enough wire.. This is exactly what that you're looking for.. Simple, sophisticated, low profile, great performing set of earphones.. Loved them.. Get them for 600/-

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointing buy
content: I received the product on 31st May. The sound quality was good. But the mouth piece just stopped working on 23rd June. Now it doesnt serve the purpose. Thought it would be a good product since it is JBL. But highly. disappointed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice experience
content: I heard that it cancels noise but when I talk to someone using this earphone, the other person can still hear the surrounding sound. Apart from it, sound is excellent for music so far. Volume control button should be there but I am not too fancy of it. They have given what they promise so I am happy.

name: Piyush Agarwal
title: It is good for listening to music but it gives me a headache when I use it for a phone call.
content: It is good for listening to music but it gives me a headache when I use it for a phone call. I faced the same problem in an earlier noise cancellation earphone by Panasonic. It seems that noise cancellation earphones are good only for listening to music and not the best choices to use for making phone calls.

name: Saurav Joshi
title: Comfortable mic position .
content: When it comes to sound quality JBL have been in this business since and then . Consistent quality and robust design . Why this one's different from other variant in same price range is .. the position of Mic is in right and closer to your mouth thus ease of use .

name: Balasundar
title: Not recommended
content: No deep bass as they claimed.. Replacement requested and got new one.. The same problem persists on the new one.. If you are a bass lover don‚Äôt opt this.. If you need to enjoy the depth of music you can consider but still lot of other products are good camparitively.. My suggestion is don‚Äôt buy this for both call purpose and listening music.

name: Govind kumar
title: Poor quality
content: Poor quality durability verry bad i suggest guys oraimo legendry. https://www.amazon.in/ORAIMO-LEGENDARY-SOUND-EAR-PHONE/dp/B078FXZ7GD/ref=sr_1_15?crid=109QG40GIGCT8&keywords=oraimo+ear+earphones&qid=1579707944&sprefix=oraimo%2Caps%2C274&sr=8-15

name: Keshav
title: Not sure of the originality
content: I already have 2 sets of original JBL C100SI that I got from US and JBL store in India.. Both sound same and build quality is same.. However the one I got here online was thin wired (poor build) as well as bass, loudness and treble were all very weak.. You can't play max volume on the original ones...however I felt the online purchase were barely there.. I dont know its different vendors on Amazon that provide differing quality products.

name: Prasanth Gorripati
title: The Best in this price range
content: I have been using these earphones from the past 8 months. Best sound quality and bass in this price range. I have used JBL C200SI earphones prior to these for 14 months. I didn't notice any difference in sound quality or bass between the two of them. The rubber on the headphone jack is sensitive, need to be careful with that. Mic quality is good. In this price range, i would highly recommend this headset.

name: Vijuuüòç
title: Good
content: It's not a non-tangle wire. It tangles. Not worth of paying 600Rs(price at which I bought at the time of sale). Envent headset is better than JBL I feel. I tried replacing but they said replacement is only with the same piece rather than allowing to buy any other. But sound is very good

name: Khutheibam Asker
title: Good earphones for calling purposes.
content: Advantage : mic is good enough to be heard by the person on other side without being picked up. Better than Sony.. It vomes with 2 more ear buds which is useful to adjust.. Disadvantage:this is in comparision to sony earphones.. The ear piece falls off more easily but is good enough.. Sound quality isn't that good. So, for music lovers, go for sony which costs 200rs more. Those who use it more for calls, you can go for this.. Also, in the description, it was said to be made in india. But like im showing you, it says in the product label, it is made in china.

name: SURAPATHI SAI KIRAN
title: Cost Efficient Headset.
content: JBL, The name says it all! I have used this Headset for an year now & I must say that it has served its purpose! The Sound quality, Bass & Noise Cancellation aren't something you find very often in the headsets ranging around INR 599. It's a Go-to Headset for a reasonable price.

name: SARAT
title: Over all it is very good at the price.Simply go for it.
content: After 1 year of usage :. 1.The built in quality of the ear phones is good but will be more better if the cable is of tangle free type and 'L' shape connector is provided.. 2.Bass and treble are decent.. 3.Sound quality and Loudness are also good.. 4.I didn't felt any inconvenience after listening the music for an hour,also the buds fits properly in the ear.. Overall I would give a rating over 10.. 1.Sound quality and loudness:9/10. 2.Bass :9/10. 3.Treble:9/10. 4.Built quality:8/10.. It will be much better if it is used with an equalizer.

name: Tinny
title: No trademark JBL sound quality from JBL C100SI
content: A JBL earphone endorsed by A R Rahman with overall bad quality sound output & horrible bass effect. I am 100‚Ä∞ sure A R Rahman must have never used these earphones personally . I was expecting the trademark JBL sound quality but highly disappointed. There is a big Made in China tag attached near the connector end which answers your doubt on the overall sound output from the JBL C100SI

name: dinesh
title: durability very bad
content: 1. sound quality. sound quality of this headphone is impressive . treble and vocal is excellent but the bass is little bit decent.. 2. durability. durability of this headphone is very bad . truely this is my 3 rd no. purchase . i have purchased nearly 3 months ago but now right earphone is not working . i don't know why it is happend with me? no one headphone is lasting more than 5 months . i purchased this headphone bcz the sound quality .

name: Sundar C
title: Good Product
content: Its a very good ear phone, convenient for use while driving wearing helmet. On daily basis regular usage the first one lasted for about 6 months, went again for the same model. Let me evaluate the life of product this time.

name: Faaez
title: It's not real JBL.
content: Everything is good.But we can't use this product more than 5 months. Automatically one side will not be working. It's not my own experience. Me and my friend brought this same product and we are facing the same issue. For warranty we need to courier to Gurgaon.

name: aayush kalra
title: YOU MIGHT NOT GET THE GOOD ONE at once.
content: So, at first I got (cannot say defected piece or fake) the earphones in which if the singer (in the music video) or the anchor (took a few seconds to continue speaking, in the middle of that vaccuum, I could hear that shrill noise (krrr...) Very irritating voice.. I asked for a replacement.. Got one just now.. Now there is no noise, it works fine.. Rest let's see after a few days usage.

name: Rajeev S.Mohite
title: Best in the class!
content: First of all I bought (for Rs.499)this after using sennheiser CX213 for 2 years. So I will be comparing with CX213.. Build Quality is Average, I find CX213's build quality somewhat better.. Sound clarity is almost same as CX213, I'll give CX213 10 and this one 9, but bass is great on this one.. Plus mic is additional point for jbl.. If you are confused between sennheiser CX213 or cx 180 and this one, I'll suggest you go with this one.. I can't comment on durability yet, but sennheiser's are quiet durable and their warranty rocks. Choice is yours.

name: Diyu Joshi
title: Worst service center
content: Its been only 2 months I m using this earphones... and the earphone isnt ..I tried to contact the service center but they didnt replyd...Before that I had used Boat eaphones... Boat gives u fastes service in case of replacement or warranty recovering.. I am fed up with jbl's service.. plz guide me to how to replace the earphones..

name: Rajesh G
title: The Input line wire failure
content: Within 1.6 years the Input line wire got damaged. Handling of headset done in proper way.Even though the failure occured. Proper manufacturing analysis not done for this product. The Failure mode occurnce is high on the particular place shown in image. This is the very major critical area for the head set.. JBL is branded one where they failed to perform this simple failure analysis in Design makes us unhappy. No quality on product accuracy.

name: rajalakshmi
title: Wrong Country of Origin
content: Decent product.. The country of origin is wrongly mentioned as India. The original country of origin is "China".. To Amazon,. Please don't cheat Indian consumers by giving wrong country of origin. Please correct it.

name: Vineet
title: Best one under Rs 1000.
content: Sound quality is very very good and probably the best for this price. The bass quality is good, the vocals are crisp and clear.. The noise cancellation works very well.. What I didn't like is the wire built which seems to break off (nothing as such happened with me though).. For me this is the best earphones you can buy under Rs 1000. Don't think twice before buying this.

name: Hitesh P.
title: Not too much good
content: JBL headphones C100SI quality was so poor.. Within in 2-3 months the headphones are getting off. First right side was not audible. Then both sides are not worked.. I used to use only for working purpose not continuesly so totally I'm unsatisfied this with product.

name: Obed Jamir
title: JBL... Not To Be Confused With WWE's JBL.
content: This was one of my very first JBL products. One thing I've noticed about name brands is that they make cheap products but it doesn't compare well with other new arrivals at the same price range.

name: Prathik Kini
title: Good earphone with mic
content: Sound quality is amazingly great.. It has mic which is not present in cx 180.. Mic quality is good too.. I liked this earphone.. Bass quality is not that great but pretty good.. So if u are a bass lover better go with boat or Sennheiser cx 180.. Only a single button . No volume buttons.

name: B. Roy
title: Good sound quality but cable is not.
content: The sound quality is very good but the wire near the mic is tearing apart. I use it in bed to listen music and near took it out door but still the wire is tearing apart. Still working but not for long.

name: Suman Chakraborty
title: Hopefully best one at this price
content: I have been using it since last 2 days.The product is really good. It's lightweight, soft on ears and the sound is good too! The bass could have been better but at this price this is way too good than its reputed competitors.

name: NITIN SUMAN
title: Bass is low as compare to the Sennheiser cx 180
content: I have used all three Sennheiser cx 180, Boat bass heads and jbl c 100.. Here is my findings.. Bass: Sennheiser cx 180 is winner. Mic: JBL C 100 is winner. Wire quality: Boat is winner. Only prons about Sennheiser is that it doesn't come with mic. Sennheiser CX180 must launch it's 2.0 version with mic. I can bet that it will beat all the wired earphone section that comes under 1000 rs.

name: Ojas Hardikar
title: Oh my god the difference in sound quality ü§©
content: I had this at the start, and then for the sake of convenience I started buying Bluetooth earphones, but then I lost these, and kinda forgot abt them. But after a year or so I reordered these only because I felt the need to have backup earphones, and when I listened to music on these there is such a huge difference between the find quality, like these are so much better

name: Nirmalya
title: Very bad quality
content: The earphone has some issues with connectivity. When I plug it in my phone it automatically decreases the volume to zero. I checked online they say this kind of issue happens with cheap headphones.. The mic is not very good either. It creates a muffed voice when its not exactly on top of your lips which is bit annoying.. Overall one of the worst earphone i have used.

name: Rupam96
title: Got malfunctioned within 11 months
content: Good at first, but little bit of disappointed because one speaker's sound started to decrease after 8 months.... And after 11 months it got malfunctioned! Thank god for being dead within the warranty period as it was replaced by JBL service centre.. But from a brand named JBL it's unexpected to be dead within 10 months!!

name: somnath
title: Earphones with Microphone Feature.
content: These Earphones using Since last 5 Month.. Found Qite well performance especially liked the Microphone feature that is Closed to Mouth ,So that I have experiencedvery Clear Conversation.

name: chidambaram
title: Not Durable
content: The sound quality is good, however the product didnt last for more than an year in my case. Exactly 1 yr after purchase the left side wasn't working for me. I am managing with the right side alone as of now. I am an average user of the earphones i hardly would hav used it for 2 to 3hrs per day in the past 1 yr and still it lasted exactly for an yr and is now wearing out. I have therefore given a 3 star. Wont prefer this product the next time.

name: Sibasish
title: Good quality earphone!!
content: Good quality earphones but sometimes the jack losens up and one of the earpieces doesn't work but when the jack is pressed the particular earpiece is audible. However, after nearly using everyday for around 9 months one of the earpieces is not working.

name: Shilpa Lad
title: Disappointing
content: I gifted this product and my friend is not at all happy. The voice quality is poor and many times even I can barely hear the conversation. The noise cancellation is average. For the brand that this is it's a disappointment.

name: Subho Saha
title: Good Sound But Last Less...not durable
content: Used this product for a year. Though the sound quality is good, yet the product started malfunctioning in around 11 months time. Currently it became unusable. So durability is of course an issue. May check out other products for e.g. SkullCandy or Philips. Those are still working for me even after 2 years.

name: Ankur
title: Difference in sound of both buds....Left earbud not working after 1 year...
content: Sound of the right earbud gets lower after 6 months of usage and now after 1 year of usage left earbud not working- no any sound is there in left earbud...,back of jack inserting pin is also not rounded at 90¬∞. Finally, not satisfied with the sound quality as there is difference in sound of both buds...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not durable (would last less than an year)
content: This headset gives a balanced experience. There is no noise cancellation. There are very less chances that it will last for over an year; one of the branch would work.(super annoying). Dont go for it if you are looking for something durable.

name: Mrutyunjay Bal
title: JBL ROCK-GREAT VALUE PRODUCT FOR ONLY RS 550 PERFECT SIZE
content: JBL C100SI HAS A GREAT SOUND AND PERFECT BASS AND TREBLE. ITS REALLY VALUE FOR MONEY ITS PERFECTLY FIT IN EAR ON FLICPKART ITS LOOK BIG IN SIZE BUT ITS PERFECT FIT.ITS HAS REALLY AWESOME SOUND.. APART FROM THIS I AM USING SONY SBH24 HEADPHONE WHICH IS COSTING RS 3500.00 & SONY MDR-XB55AP WHICH IS COSTING AROUND RS 2200 WHICH HAS A GREAT SOUND.
