BUT BELIEVE ME JBL C100SI COSTING RS 550 HAVE GREAT SOUND.. JBL ROCK BUT THE DESIGN AND BUILD QUALITY NEED TO IMPROVE BUT FOR RS 550 ITS REALLY VALUE FOR MONEY.. I HAVE USED SENHEISER CX180 IF YOU LOVE EXTRA BASS U PURCHASE SENHEISER CX180.BECAUSED IT HAS UNWANTED HIGH BASS.

name: SANCHI S.
title: DUPLICATE HEADPHONE RECEIVED.
content: One of my colleague has the same model purchased from Amazon in Oct-18 it has fantastic sound quality. I purchased JBL after found good sound quality from my colleague headphone. But unfortunately my headphone quality is not so good.

name: Rajiv ranjan tiwari
title: Very nice deal
content: I will start with the pros first :-. 1. Great design of the ear buds, I mean you can plug any earplug in any ear and won't feel discomfort, although it is specified R for right and L for left.. 2. Great colour options. I choose red because it has less negative reviews than black.. 3. SOUND is great. Though it has less bass than BOAT ones, although boat too has its cons.. 4. Have a good mic, great sound during calls, simple design, extra ear buds in case you loose or tear the buds, great jack.. Now the cons:-. 1. I feel sooner or later the part where the wire and jack connects is goona rip apart if not handled carefully.. 2. It tangles too much.. 3. No case is provided to store it when not in use.. 4. Looses to boat with less price when it comes to bass.. 5. Feels little uncomfortable while sleeping.. 6. A little overpriced.

name: Gaurav
title: May be JBL's Worst product
content: I read few negative feedback but still trusted 'JBL''s brand, but the time I plugged them in my computer, I was heartbroken.. Worst ever bass, I am not asking for a Metal Music Bass, but a basic bass is also needed for music.. The sound quality is similar to the headphones to get in Flight.

name: Narayani
title: poor quality product
content: I received very poor quality earphones...at first I was suspicious regarding it's quality, but my friend tried it and said it is good,there is no point to suspect bad about it...but look at it I used it since less than a week and the right ear peice is damaged, the buds falls off due to poor quality material, and sound in the same ear is also affected badly...I want to return this.

name: Sri Sanagavarapu
title: Lasts 4-5 months max
content: I've bought these ear phones several times. The sound is very decent for its rate. However, don't expect these earphones to last more than 4-5 months. From my experience, it would be around 4-5 months of usage where one of the ears would stop working. If you are anyways looking to switch to better quality earphones in a couple months, I would definitely recommend this for temporary usage. Otherwise, you're better off with a different pair.

name: VP
title: Perfect for taking calls! And listening to music casually.
content: Using this from a week now. So far it's good. Sound quality is good, both while listening to songs or taking call. Noice cancellation doesn't work all the time. Given the price, there is nothing much to complaint!! Go for it.

name: aj17
title: Bad built quality of cable, sound quality of mic and speaker are very good.
content: I am fed up with this. I brought two and both cable got damaged within 2 months. See picture. Anyine who is very gentle with headphones can blindly buy this. But if you are rough on handling, buy mi rs699 headphone which is more rugged but less sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great Earphone.
content: I am writing this review after using this for a couple of months. I am really happy with the product. The bass is amazing. The mids and trebles are crisp and clear and the microphone is crisp and clear as well. The noise cancellation is amazing as well. Light weight and fits in your ear perfectly. I use it all day and i don't find any issues. JBL is amazing and they have showed it in this product.

name: Deep
title: Pretty good for the price
content: That said, they are okaish. The sound quality is clean but the sound signature is trebble heavy. Like ear piercing sometimes. You might need to bump up ypur base via an equalizer, not to get better base, but to bring down the trebble for a balanced experience.

name: ZONUNSANGA
title: Just a general sounding earphone
content: Built quality is OK. The sound is more of balance with a little more on the high frequency side. Transfer of vibration wave from the cable can be heard aloud on the earpiece which is annoying

name: leo martin
title: Value for money
content: You will know why it is called Brand when you use it...You literally feel the difference between JBL and other brands..But the build quality is poor..i bought 4 of these within 2 years..u can expect 6 months of use from it

name: Vinod K
title: Only one problem...
content: The material quality is good for right now but doubt for long usage. Sound quality is good. Cancels most of the noise from outside. So you can be lost in music world. But major drawback is you can hear to wire jiggling when u use earphones when walking.. that's big minus point.

name: Ajit Acharya
title: Not durable. Bad after sales service.
content: The product is still under warranty period, but one side of the earphone is not working. The wire is very weak and started breaking within the first 2 months. I tried calling Amazon customer service to talk regarding warranty and they provided me another number belonging to JBL Customer Support. And guess what!? It doesn't work. Great way of fooling customers. Don't go for this product. Rather go for Boat earphones. They are cheaper and far more durable.

name: Raghavendra
title: Bad warranty policy and services
content: Never buy JBL products due to unscientific terms and conditions during warranty claims.. Not following what's written in warranty card and tell they have internal policies and reject the warranty claims... Deeply hurted and never recommend JBL...

name: Abhilash
title: Good earphone while it lasts...
content: I have used the earphones for about month and the sound quality & ear fit are good considering the price.. It feels a bit uncomfortable after using it for about 2-3 hrs, but I got used to it.. Main problem is the durability, within month of using (I use it mainly for listening songs, about 2-3 hrs a day) left earphone output became quite low. Need to try my luck with warranty. But I won't recommend this product to anyone.

name: jvk
title: Ekdam fadooüòç
content: I purchased this headphones at 599 price in republic sale.. The sound quality is amazing, sound is crystal clear and bass is also very clear,5 stars for that.. Noise cancelling is good 4 stars for that. Comfortable in wearing. I cant say about durability bcoz i am reviewing after 15 days experience. Always use the equilizer for better experience

name: Anu
title: How to claim warranty on this product.
content: This earplug had worked excellently till last week, then all of sudden the right plug had stopped working. Want to know how to get it replaced as it has stopped working a week prior to end of warranty. I am left with just 6 days to claim the warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Its JBL
content: I say this, "Come on its JBL" go for it man..!! Only word I want to throw to Jbl(I don't know if this is the right place though) I use my headphones when I drive my bike and keep my phone in my jean pocket, and its getting damaged (No issues with the wiring). I don't know how much longer it ill hold. But this is the serious issues, whether your material is not good or I am getting some extra inches onnmy waist... Lol

name: Tanumoy dutta
title: Not recommended
content: I bought a BOAT Basshead 100 and this one together. The boat headphones are cheaper by a couple of hundred bucks. Nothing special to say about the JBL headphones.... build quality is poor and wire gets tangled like crazy.....free suggestion....opt for boat headphones over these....as sound quality is almost the same....and boat build quality is better by a mile.

name: Pravin
title: Very poor quality earphones
content: Customers please see the quality of material used for this earphones, this is the worst headphones ever purchased, one of its earphones stopped working within 6 months of purchase. Other brands headphones purchased on same day is working fine without any issues.. When I tried to exchange this JBL headphones they starighaway denied to replace it. Don't buy any product of JBL

name: Hari Krishnan
title: JBL
content: Liked. 1. Good fit in the Ear üëÇ.. 2. Very loud sound.. 3. Sounds very clear to hear.. 4. Light Weight.. Dislike. 1. Low bass than boat headphone.. 2. Feels like Low quality wire.. Over all sound quality is best in this class. Don't expect more bass. Sound quality and loundness is good.

name: Anonymous
title: Not a good quality
content: Not that good. Juat a brand name. After few months you will get cable cut. The cable cut will happen for sure. It is designed to be useless after one year. I have experienced this twice. Don't go for brand name.

name: Sanabam Linthoingambi Devi
title: Best Quality
content: Very good fun designs which enables comfortable fit, closer to the baby's body. The flexibile waist band that adapt's to baby's movement to a comfortable fit. Yes dryness over the midnight, the magic gell that locks wetness away for upto 12 hours of dryness. Very easy to wear. Very soft and very good quality. Absorbancy is really good and very good leak proof. This is very comfortable for babies no itching problem and anything else.

name: Subrata Chakrabarty
title: Be cautious while purchasing thus item
content: Sound quality is good. However, JBL compromised on quality of material. Unexpected n highly disappointed. I purchased it 2 months back. Wiring is pretty cheap. So, u gotta handle with outmost care. I handled with outmost care, still I'm facing this issue. Can't hear anything from the right side of headphone. This is within warranty; however, I didn't get any number from Amazon regd. Seller to claim the warranty.

name: Mohammed Noumaan
title: Jack
content: Major Issue with the Jack!. It's been 4 months since iam using this and it's still working fine I sincerely love the Sound Quality. The only issue which Is irritating me is that the Jack gets out from the 3.5mm Jack just after I start to play something. ..... What is the use then, if Jack is improper. Consider buying angled jack product.. If any one is facing the same problem???

name: Suvranil Dutta Biswas
title: Great quality earphones at an affordable price
content: I really liked the earphones. They look classy, fit well into the ears, feel comfortable, have great quality, and nice bass. I have been using them for about a month and there's hardly anything that I can complain about. I recommend it to anyone looking for quality earphones at an affordable price. The tradeoff definitely pays off.

name: Rinku
title: Stopped working in 3 Months.DONT BUY
content: Sound quality is average.. Product stopped working within 3 months. Warranty service is useless as you have to visit the service station which is 20/30 Kms away from city.Dont buy

name: Santam Mukherjee
title: Value for money.
content: Go for this pair of headphones if you're looking for decent sound quality/clarity and inbuilt mic, something that is lacking in most budget headphones for some reason.. Cons:. 1.mic starts crackling when spoken too close to it. 2. noticable difference in audio quality when compared with Sennheiser cx180 street ii. With the Sennheiser coming out as the superior headphone (it however lacks a mic and is costlier).

name: Aman kumar
title: Sound quality is good
content: Everything was very impressive in this jbl c100 si bass was good noise cancellation was good sound quality was very good. But, the downfall is that the cable is not quite tough enough i used it for ahout 1 and a half month and the jack side cable got teared. Anyway at this price range u can't get braded cable. I'mma say if u are a music lover go for it because it's the best option at this price range

name: Kaushik
title: Sound quality and bass
content: Compared to the sony mdr ex-155ap, the jbl had more bass and thump and the feel is awesome. But i feel, the sound could have been smoother a bit so that we can use it continuously for a long time without any discomfort cus sony gives that smooth sound with bass. JBL is best for those who expect bass performance and quality but you might have a brake after some time. Jus go for it and you will get a best product at this price point.

name: Chaitanya
title: Falls off
content: Does not fit in my ear. Always falls on. I was better using a Boat earphone. For once, I thought JBL is a great brand, let's buy JBL but nope. Not buying JBL again. The wire is also pretty thin.

name: manu stark
title: lite weight,perfect fit, good sound & base
content: first of all thank you amazon. in this lockdown my previous earpiece were damaged.! so i dont have any earphones. i just order from chennai on 18/05/2020 i got it on 20/5/2020, i just got this earphone its very lite, i wont feel that there is a ear phone on my ears. over all its a good product. lets see how it will work. i will give my review after 1month of use. stay tune.

name: Sanjukta Dey
title: Buy It!
content: If you read positive feedback about this product, believe it. My travel in ear headphone, can't sleep in flight. So very handy for marathon movie session during long haul flights.

name: Bhaskar G.
title: Absolute worth for buying.
content: The bass quality and Noise is at its best... But for sound quality, when there's so much high Frequency treble in the audio, it can't manage that much high Frequency.. So some times, only sometimes you feel little uncomfortable when there's too much high freq. Treble... But besides that, this headphone model and company is best choice for my last 4 years, and also in my budget..

name: Onkar Mule
title: Sound quality
content: Sound quality is good. Music + calling. Light weight comfortable earbuds. No noise cancellation what so ever.. 3.5 mm jack seems to be gold plated.. Wire is of sufficient length but extremely thin.. It won't handle little stress on cables.. Get photo of comparison of general headphone with this Harman's JBL.. Sound is good only very thin.

name: Lishanth
title: Best but not beast üí™
content: Jbl c100SI is a beautiful earphone for daily usage . The bass is pretty good but not the best the audio clarity is clear , it comes with one button in the microphone . Its not that great as the senhenizer in terms of audio quality . But when it comes to built quality jbl is better than the senhenizer. Overall for jbl is a good inearphone for the price of 600 rs with mic is a good deal. 1 day delivery that's amazing good work üíØ

name: Owais Akhlaq
title: Not so good
content: Well the earphones are quite nice at the beginning but are not durable because its left side and the mic both had stopped working, i replaced it 1 month ago i.e. september but the same problem have occured in the replaced one too. I thought it would work for atleast 2 years, but it disappointed my expectations within 11 months.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headphones stopped working
content: I started using this product since last two months. It was working perfectly fine until today when it suddenly stopped working. There is no wire damage still the headphones are not working. Did not expect this kind of service from such a recognised music brand JBL. Also it seems that there is no warranty that can be claimed. Amazon should take this into account since we invest so much into recognized product.

name: pranjal
title: Jbl should hang in boots now
content: These economical headphones are not worth it at all. I believed this product was not a genuine one at all and I complained several times about it. Chances are one earplug will stop working within 3 months ... Do not go for this one buy an MI earphone where the quality is similar to JBL but u will end up saving 200-300 on them

name: Harish kabeer
title: Sound wise good but physical quality not good
content: It's been 3 months since I have been using these and I want to say that sound quality, noise cancellation and bass is good. But problem comes with the fitting of earbuds in the ear, it doesn't feel comfortable especially when you u r eating something and they come out sometimes. The quality of wire is not good as it get tangled very easily and sometimes it's very annoying to untangle it, it feels like solving a puzzleüòí

name: Clayton
title: Less price. Less Life.
content: It works as described. But lasts only for a few months. One side stopped working after 6 months of using very rarely. This is a backup option for me if my PLT Bluetooth dies of juice.

name: PREM
title: JBL C100SI
content: Sound and material plus wire length quality is excellent I have tried in IPhone and honor, MI Note 5 pro.. In iPhone and honor getting excellent quality sound but in MI Note 5 pro getting little bit low I don‚Äôt know the what is exact reason!. JBL C100SI is excellent product to buy from Amazon.

name: Madhu Mithra
title: Disgusting sounds quality and received cheap product
content: Overall poor quality not even worth for Rs 100 please take this back. And request don't spoile the brand name. We are placing an order because ok for brand. Sound quality is so cheap level like not feeling to listen anything. So disgusting

name: Debobrata Das
title: Defective product
content: The headphone comes out as defective as it is not giving consistant throughput to both the ears. It needs to be replaced or corrected. Please let me know the process to excercise warranty.

name: S Basu
title: Unexpected detoriation in quality standards
content: I used to like JBL products and purchased quite a few of them. But recently 2 earphones along with this one the microphone has stopped working after couple of months. Atleast we expect the product will survive for a tear or so. And unfortunately we don't have much option and time for availing warranty facilities. At end of the day it's a sellers market...

name: KOKU
title: Think twice before you buy this product
content: I purchased this earphone way in October 27, 2018 and now it is not working properly... The connection between earphone jack and Phone isn't feasible for listening songs or watch videos while lying down on bed ... After sales service is also not available or available but their call and email address for the JBL company isn't working

name: Crazy Shopper
title: Very Good
content: Serves my purpose of everyday use especially during travelling, so very good. Sound quality excellent. Noise cancellation good, but could have been a bit better while travelling by public transport.. Con: No volume control buttons

name: SRINATH
title: Received fake product
content: Received fake product. 1 year back i purchased this ear phones..sound quality is good..those are not working nw so bought this same product again but now i received fake product. This seller is not recommended. Its a genuine review. Dont buy from this seller

name: Sunny Bhattacharjee
title: Itna paisa mai itnaich milenga!!
content: For the money you getting it , it does justifies the sound quality.. Material quality is not very robust I mean its soft and I use it carefully because jbl headphone usually go bad from either near the microphone or just below the ear piece. Trust me I have used three jbl before.. Sound quality is fare enough , bass is there but not like an animal its just there. Which does not overthrow the lows and mids. Rather the mids and lows are on the little bit of higher end. The bass is not thumpy if I may say.. So buy if u like jbls coz u will feel the hint of there sound signature.

name: Jazz
title: Good Product.
content: This ear phone is nice, I mean for my regular usage. I don't face any problem. The only thing which can be an issue is it starts getting damaged from the end, wire breaks. But, I think that is normal. I used one for around more than an year, and got new one recently.. Go for it! Nice product at this cost.

name: Anuj Srivastava
title: Good sound quality, but least durable.
content: After daily using it for around 8 hours, it's in tatters. Though I'll buy it again, because the sound quality is quite good for a 400-500 rs earphone with mic.. Edit: I've bought it 4 times, and all my immediate family uses these!

name: Ashutosh Rana
title: Go for it if u want a good music and also mic...at this range
content: Good earphones, got it for around 550 in sale and using them from past 4 months. No problem till now. Its the best option in this price range as the seinhiser will not come with a mic. The mic is very sensitive and the bass is perfect for listening songs. Though i would recommend seinhiser if u would not use the ear phones to talk over phone. Music is best from the seinhiser.

name: kish young
title: Is it your Headphone of choice ?
content: 1. Good bass (90%). 2. Light weight. 3. Simple style. 4. Wire little brittle - chances of breakage are good ( handle it with care). 5. Ear fit -good. 6. Partial noise cancelling..(70%). 7. Good length.(120 cm). 8. No ear pain on your phone volume limit for 3 hrs ( I tried it upto 3hrs , you may go more or less). 9.Alexa and google works fine without any problem.. 10. Good product , I will give 80% overall performance.

name: mallock
title: Wow
content: I got back tired from a trip and put all my clothes for wash. Due to a problem with the washing machine (and my forgetfulness), the clothes remained submerged in water for over 18 hours. After drying my clothes, I realized I'd left my earphones in my jeans. I was heartbroken having lost another pair of earphones to my carelessness. I plugged them in, expecting the worst. But lo and behold! The earphones were still working fine. I am super impressed with this, just wanted to share it with you all.

name: Nitin
title: Dont read another comments
content: Best in its price range. not so much physically strong product but sound is superb . some are saying treble is high but it gives you incredible clarity, and bass is amazing checked all high basss sound compairing with my sony headphones , it is better than all. I am sony MDX user which is in about 3K range but after hearing this i am thinking, why Sony??

name: WinnerBoy
title: Great earphones for this price.
content: Have been using this product for more than 10 months now. Works great. I am always a fan of jbl so no complaints about sound quality. JBL is famous for its bass and this product is no exception to it. Noise cancellation is ok as with any other earphone. Mic works great. Total value for money.. Btw I did drop it a couple of times on hard surface but haven‚Äôt had any issues as of yet.

name: Nehaal
title: Worth the money!!
content: Sound quality : 5/5. Noise cancellation : 5/5. Bass : 4/5. Wire quality : 2/5. (The left ear stopped working after 3 months, not expected this from JBL). Overall prdouct is nice by looking at the price and sound quality I would suggest you guys to purchase this .

name: Shalabh Sharma
title: Decent sound
content: First time user of JBL. For the price @549/- the sound is really good. There are other higher versions available which are more expensive. I am gonna try the higher versions as well. But go for it definitely a must buy at this price.

name: kasi
title: Not Satisfactory
content: 1. Very low sound , probably the mic is not capturing the audio, other side people hardly can hear.. 2. Sound quality while listening music is not that great.. 3. Cable wire is not that lengthy, ite very short.. 4. If you are not liking this product for some reason , you still have to live with that only , as this product only comes with REPLACEMENT option and you can return this in Amazon.

name: Kartik Bhardwaj
title: Good for the price range.
content: The earplugs are quite comfortable and the sound stays muffed in really well. The sound quality and loudness is really good for the price you‚Äôll pay for these earphones but if you‚Äôre looking for bass I wouldn‚Äôt suggest you to buy these, the bass is really faint.

name: Anmol Kumar
title: First time user of JBL earphones
content: These earphones in this price range with mic are more better than others but not the best(if mic not included). Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is good, base is average, means the overall quality of these earphones is good. I feel, may be you not or you, some uncomfortable in my ears with these earphones. At last these are better earphones in this price range.

name: Aryan Chowdary
title: Good pair of earphones.
content: These are one of the most comfortable earphones I have ever had. The sound quality is quite good. The bass is punchy & the clarity is pretty good. The wire quality is not bad, it feels nice & soft. These are entirely made up of plastic & feel very light & comfortable to wear. These offer very good seal.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good headphones at normal budget.
content: Good sound. Ordinary bass and noice cancellation but it is pretty balanced. (Personal preference).. It goes strong for around a year and then gives way. This is the 3rd time i am buying this and both the previous ones started giving problems around 12-13 months mark

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad product
content: It has a very thin cable and it broke just in 8 months though i take very care and after that the whole covering from it wore out and just yesterday night the right side stopped working so now they are useless very poor quality but sound quality is good for the price but its not worth to invest in poor quality earphones

name: Swagata Banerjee
title: Good quality rich treble sound but built poor
content: Sound quality is good enough but not loud but yes tribble is high little bit base is kinda low I guess not rich one bt yes balance doesn't put yours of pain but the think I don't like this is build quality it is so poor if you are a much rough user like me then please dont buy... But jbl claim that if there have any problem on the product they will easly change the products but not to be damage anything only sound problem

name: sagar waydande
title: One Star
content: The one side of the earphone has stopped working now. Also, the rubber around the jack has torn out. I tried calling customer care JBL on 1800-102-0525 but it takes me to IVR and when I select the options the call disconnects after 10-20 seconds. PLEASE DO NOT BUY these EARPHONES.. I CALLED THE CUSTOMER CARE AND THEY WANT ME TO PARCEL THE EARPHONES AND INVOICE TO THEIR ADDRESS(HARYANA). (I LIVE IN PUNE. ). THE REPLACEMENT WILL TAKE 12-15 DAYS. AND I DO NOT KNOW HOW MUCH THE REPLACEMENT PROCEDURE WILL COST.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent if you're looking for something temporary
content: They are decent for the price. There's no noise cancellation of course, but I have seen better illusions of one in other cheaper pairs (like the Mi earphones for RS 400). Builld quality is average for the price, and should have been better.. Average bass for the price, but good sound quality overall.. PS: I was using my Jaybird X4 and needed a temporary replacement for it, so I went for these JBL earphones.

name: Suhash
title: Great product for the price!
content: Bought this specifically for Zoom calls using my laptop. Works perfectly fine. Participants are able to hear very clearly so mic is perfect! Plugging it to my mobile, it has good bass for music. Can't get anything better for this price from a known brand.

name: Ajit
title: Very costly and quality is not upto its price
content: I have purchased it almost 2-3 weeks back but it actually does not meet to the standard of normal earphone like samsung or sony and if you compare the price it actually double. it would have been better if its price would have been rs 200 instaed of rs 700. also one more disadvantage that i am experiencing is that it does not fit to ears.. I would not recommend any one to go for it at this price.

name: Sandeep (Bangalore)
title: Beyond expectations!
content: I never expected a headphone in less than Rs.1000 category to be so mind-blowing! I have tried both SONY and SENNHEISER. They are more expensive, but don't even come close to this one from JBL in terms of performance. Both bass and treble are very good, and come out with optimum balance.

name: rohit
title: Good sound but average rubber ear bud
content: The sound quality is good as compared to it's price of 500-550 rs.. The only probem is with the rubber quality of the ear buds, it starts itching after use for 20-30 mins and is not comfortable at all.

name: srinivas
title: Not worth for given price compared to BOAT, BOULTS, I Ball,
content: The standard of quality is only for 6 months, after 6 months when I have replaced with another ear phones due to the problem of not hearing one side from JBL service center it's again got only 6months with same problem it got damaged another too hear phones from the same company got same problem ... So totally it's not worth for a given price compared to other products... Boults, I ball, boats, are good in this price

name: AMAR DEEP ANAD
title: JBL earphones
content: The product is really nice in terms of the sound quality but the durability of the material is not so good. I used this product for 3years I believe and eventually the wire outer cover started to break and peel off, it‚Äôs a drawback.

name: ramsai
title: Fake product
content: Guys left one is the product which I have got delivered on August 9th 2020 and this product quality is very very cheap it looks like 100rs earphones and the right side is my old JBL cs100si which I am using from one year . Guys guys can see in the pic right side earphones wire quality is very good and the jack color is also different so replace tge product if you got like this or ask them for refund

name: R.Rohith Kumar
title: Bass becomes Dull over Use
content: It's a Awesome Value for money product !. Everything about the product is good !. Especially the fitting ! I just love it !. But the only thing which stops me from rating it a 5-Star is that the Earphones starts to throttle at higher frequencies and also over the course of time you would really notice a change in the Bass Quality.. Other wise it's a Fantastic Earphones for the money.

name: SC
title: Quality issues
content: the headphone when first arrived were pretty decent in the price range. incidentally with usage one of the earphones started losing its sound to virtually non-functional now. Possibly a defective piece. Placing a return/ replace request since the makers promise a year guarantee.

name: Porotta&Beef
title: 1 üåü product
content: The product stopped working within 6 months of purchase. The JBL name is a gimmick, it's actually manufactured by another company which is mentioned in the product page. Cheap and no longevity for the product. Deserves 1 üåü

name: Amazon Customer
title: May time Amazon give A to Z satisfaction.
content: Nice product this is my second time to order this.. At my first use I ordered black one this was good. Colour doesn't matter but feature is still good.previous one I use almost 19 months after it's one ear not work properly may be because of issue in wire still I think. ITNA MA ITNA HE MILAGA. So I ordered this red one this was still Pretty one.. Delivery is on time and I m happy with that. Thanks Amazon.

name: Certified Buyer (Rohan)
title: Good
content: Bought for 699, No Complaints JBl has awesome soind quality, has used many other brands in wired and wireless but JBL stands out in sound and call quality. Con: The endpoint is straight so while sitting/riding etc the wire bends due to pressure.

name: deepak mishra
title: Worth the price, better than any earphone in this segment.
content: Earlier, I had Sennheiser cx 213, which I had bought on sale for around 700 rs. I wouldn't say this is better than cx 213 but I must this is worth the price and no less than any earphone in this segment.

name: Debabrata Rautaray
title: Don't buy it
content: This ear phone is good only if you want to receive or make phone calls. Hopeless sound quality if you want to use it for listening music. There is no control panel for volume management & pause music. Waste of money, don't buy. I was always under impression that JBL makes good product. God knows even I have received a JBL product or any local counterfeit product.

name: Hurricane 0.8
title: Mind-blowing
content: Epic product . You will not regret it ... Use the big ear cushions they are the best ... Who has small ears ... You're not lucky. You can buy though they are awesome. But try bigger ones

name: Amazonn
title: Background noise irritating...
content: Good for music initially,. But after few days of use background noise irritating a lot especially during the call, less duration music.... Background noise (kharr kharr) is disgusting a lot during call.., same call without earphones is very clear.

name: Rita singh (reetzie_thefoodiegrammer)
title: Best earphones
content: So I purchased this earphone in 2017 and I'm writing this review in 2019. This is still working fine and performing well. Best sound quality and noise cancellation.'. Best for PUBG games too :P

name: Maulik
title: one side not working
content: company mentioned 1 year warrenty , but there is no option to claim this , because in jbl brand this product is not coming , I m highly dissatisfied with this product, This is attractive product ,but quality is not there so I would recommand to not buy this product

name: Shoop Shoop
title: Decent for price
content: Got it for around 700 and it does its job. Only issue is sometimes it doesn't stick in and falls from ears. Maybe it's because I am not used to in-ear earphones yet. Doesn't feel great in ears, but its noise cancellation is very good. Good for listening music byt not for Pubg.

name: Ramteja
title: Poor build quality, wire will get damage after few months
content: Sound quality is good but build quality is poor after 11 months of occasionally usage sound from left ear is very low sometimes not coming. It better go with good build quality, what is use sound quality if doesn't have good hardware I bought it for 800rs waste of money instead I could have been go through mi earphones it had a good build quality

name: Amol Pansare
title: Best product.!!!!
content: Awesome and Genuine product !!!. Signature product from the House of JBL in this price tag.. Each penny is worth ! spend for this product.. I'm using this from last two years but this product still working like as new product.

name: Mayank g.
title: only problem is it's hard earcuphs.....
content: best sound quality... but noise cancellation is not good as expected... if you are buying it for recoding videos , i must preffer earphone of better quality of more cost.... but at this price i think i justifies it's price..... only problem is it's hard earcuphs.. as a student i purchased it for lectures and it's hard earcuphs hurts a lot after 3-4 hrs of regular usage.. otherwise it's justifies it's price....

name: Supriya urane
title: No use of warranty ,JBL provides bad customer service
content: Thought JBL is brand but failed badly due to very poor customer service.. I have purchased earphones but its microphone didn't worked after 15days .. JBL provides 1 year warranty but its service center service is very very bad and in selected cities only.. No use of warranty they delivered faulty product in replacement.. While purchase please take customer service in consideration and in your city.

name: Ankit
title: Quality has deteriorate and Pathetic customer service
content: Quality has certainly g9ne down in last few years. Thisbtime my earphone only lasted 2 months and jbl customer service is pathetic. They have asked me to share product image after cutting it. I have shar3d it multiple times after cutting my earphone into 7- 8 parts but they say that image do not qualify for replacement and asked me to reshare. I have complaint about it but no response from jbl.

name: NAYAN MONI BORA
title: Yeah.Its sounds good .
content: As expected sound is good n clear. But in terms of feel d deep bass like senheiser cx180 or cx213 u won't. If I hv to rate SENHEISER BASS THEN i'll give 10 out of 10 .if i hv to rate CS100SI OUT OF 10 I'll give 8.

name: Rohan Pusalkar
title: good earphones. good build quality.
content: These are good earphones and they are seeing their purpose quite well. My daughter uses these for her online schooling and for listening to music. she's quite satisfied.

name: Ajay sai ram N
title: I fully on your handle of use
content: I'm not a fan of its build quality but it works fine as it's been 7 months after buying it's sound and bass are fine and good , is not 100% durable the button is not working and the mic is gone no voice heard on the opposite during a call or pubg play and I have shared the first image that the jack rubber has been teared off and wires are visible I need to gain warranty to fix these issues I request the seller to reply me as soon as possible.

name: Deepak Duduskar
title: Badluck of mine and lesson that no costly things last long.
content: Earphone is not working just after 16 month's from purchasing . I invested 700/- bucks thinking the earphone would last for 2 years .... But I was disappointed , upset by the way it stopped working. Earphone was just like my brother but today uncertaintly it's jack issue raised . Earphone physically is not damaged but internally it's wire are damaged. Help me if any solution.

name: Ashwin
title: BEST OFFERING for the Price!
content: Go for it, if you are into balanced and refined audio profiles.. All the aspects of a music - Highs, Mids and Bass - are very well balanced and refined here. Vocals are cristal clear. Long hours of music listening won't affect your ears.. Build quality is on the low side though and that's the only let down. But still doesn't hinders overall experience.

name: Varun
title: Good earphones with a better life..... One of the best at this price range
content: A really nice pair of earphones under this price Range the bass quality is really good and sound is also good at this price..... Reviewing this after usage of about 6-8 months still work pretty well for me no complaints as of now life is pretty good overall happy with what they are offering.. You could go with these easily if you want cheap ear buds these are the one of the best at such range

name: Nitish Jaiswal
title: How to replace it now it's not working...
content: The time I ordered this headphone it was showing one year replacement warranty, and now it's just showing one year warranty.. Anyhow I had ordered two headphone and one of them stopped working now so can anyone help me out. How can I claim for replacement now..

name: Jimmy Logan
title: Do not buy! Health risk... But for ear.....
content: Plz do not but & waste ur money. The sounds donot comeout right... Waste of money. My ear started hurting becz of how the sound comeout..... Too sharp.... Not suitable at allü§¶üèø‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. Also today is June... I bought on Feb 2020. And it's already not working..... No sounds coming anymore. Watste of money. Plz don't buy

name: Amazon Customer
title: Zolala ... Not epic ... Not bad.
content: It's a good buy for 550 bucks. Not as loud as I would like them to be able to get, but good sound quality. Material feels premium even though it's plastic. Compared to other earphones in the price range, it is pretty durable. All in all, it isn't a pair of earphones to die for, but it does it's job well for the money we pay. So value for money.

name: pushkaraj
title: Clear audio
content: Clear audio , if you are huge BASS fan then may not work for you , but overall tuned well . Great for calls . I even used it in rain while my mivi headphones gave up in rain ,these worked ( till now ) , no IP rating so I will not suggest to try that .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Damaged Product
content: Hi Team,. Please look into the matter as i am your oldest customer and purchasing each n every product from you, since i'm Not happy with my last Product as i had ordered JBL Brand earphone and i'm having some disturbance with the Earphone while i'm using it despite of warranty i'm unable to find any way to complain.. so team please fix my issue and replace it as soon as you can.. Thank you. Regards,. Asif

name: Madhunjay Singh
title: Worth buying
content: Sound is quite good. I don't know lot about music and stuff but this earphones delivers very good quality sound , music as well as vocals are quite awesome in this price range. In my opinion noise cancelling of this headset is above average. I can hear my heart beat when I wear this.. Cable is just a normal cable.. often get tangled also it's separation part get stuck in the table.

name: Sree
title: Quality
content: Using this product from last 10 months and quality of the material is very good. Sound quality is very good best for the price they offering

name: Rajarshi
title: Good earphones if you get it for 549. Otherwise buy realme buds 2.
content: After 1 year usage I'm updating review... PROS.. 1. Sound quality was very good.. 2. We get excellent bass. 3. Mic was good. 4. Vocals and instrumental sounds are clear. 5. We will get decent sound.. CONS.. 1. Wire quality is not good enough.. 2. The wire near headphone jack get teared.. 3. The wire near mic got punctured.

name: Dr.S.Bharathi Raja
title: Good.What elase
content: I like this product...gold coating for wear free...3 rings in the pin for maximum efficiency....Since JBL...I believe quality components are used in the speaker and will not harm our ears...good what else...buy and enjoy...i strongly recommend, if you are looking for a standard ear phone, though little bit costly...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Appeared to be fake
content: Just after return period is over, the headset is started giving trouble.. 1) Randomly kicks the google assistant. 2) Other party hears echos on the call.. 3) Not a great sound quality.. Totally disappointed. Not sure why so much around this earphone.

name: Rimple Sethi
title: It gives pain in the ears but sound quality is good.
content: The sound quality is good and the price at which I bought is also good . The only cons is it gives pain if used for more than half an hour.. It could have been more better if the design / cushion quality could have been better.

name: Harish S
title: Excellent product
content: JBL has always been an reliable brand and the headphones work well. After a lot of research I went for this headphones and it has not disappointed me till date. Noise cancellation and sound quality is good.

name: sagar saha
title: Paid for 100 so got 150 si
content: Well I ordered for job c100si, but while comparing the picture from the job portal it seems to be different, the packaging is of 100so but the product is 150 si when compared with the pictorials of jbl website. The 100si model has got a different type of mic case while 150si is different, the one which i have is certainly 150si and not 100si. Feel the need to authinticate if it's original at all!!!!!

name: vikrant khanna
title: Worth the price
content: Nice earphones at this price. Very much "jbl" sound , crisp highs clear lows and a little biased soundstage towards highs but all-over a very nice sound production

name: Aditya v
title: Excellent Product!!!
content: Being an ardent traveler, earphone is a must companion for me.. I had tried, TruBeat, bOAt and others.. Of all i find JBL much more refined and clear in its output.. No heavy Bass, just the right treble, the sound output is just great.. Maybe not the best product in the industry, but definitely the best in its price range.

name: Vibha
title: Good
content: Except Bass, same as samsung which we get as free when we buy the new phone. may be JBL has better sound quality if we buy the higher version. but this is same as other headphones. Dint fine much difference.

name: Shubhamdalpati
title: Great earphones at this price
content: Superb earphones i have just completed 1 year with this earphones and till now they r completely alright. Bass is good,sound quality is excellent and noice cancellation is also nyc. Best earphones with this price bracket.. Face little problem while taking calls, reciever sometimes want me to say loud, little bit disappointed with the build quality.. Otherwise the product is great.. JBL Rocksüòâüòä

name: SR
title: Not even worked for a month time...
content: Don't buy this , this headset not even worked more than couple of weeks. First had a worst buy in terms product quality from Amazon. I would strongly recommend not to buy this headset if you are looking for quality...

name: Utkarsh Singh
title: A well balanced product
content: The sound quality on an average is pretty good. The level of bass as well as the volume is good. This product fits pretty well in the ear and is comfortable even for long hours. Noise cancellation works well. The microphone is OK but it could have been better. My personal opinion would be that its a nice product but the microphone is the odd one out. According to the quality of the earphone the price is slightly on the higher side.

name: Gurpreet
title: JBl ear phone
content: Nice Bass. Got replaced as the first headphone supplied had less sound in left earphone. Got quick replacement. Again the left side has stopped working in 3-4 months. I had faced same issue in the first order. Will never buy JBL again

name: piyush
title: JBL C100SI
content: Nice and durable earphone, it does not come with the flat wire. Decent fine sound quality with decent Bass mid and clear high. Value for money earphone. I also own Sony Ex150 Ap, in comparison with it jbl has good high and more sound output, it alao feels more durable. One thing that I don't like about this earphone is it's ear tips. They aren't comfortable. Brough for rupees 549

name: Shashi
title: Great Buy for Price !!!!
content: Pros :. 1. Excellent music quality. 2. Price - I bought it at 500 bucks. 3. Light weight. 4. Fits in ear very well. Cons :. 1. Build quality is not very great, it feels very delicate and brittle. 2. I brought a white one, it easily gets stained.. 3. Lack of braided cable, it can get tangled.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointed with the quality of the product
content: I bought this ear phone in July. After few months one side of the ear speaker stopped working. I bought this product hoping that it will be durable. I am totally disappointed. Even I am doubtful about the genuineness of this product and seller as well. Now, I want to know how to avail the warranty of this product ?

name: Vikrant Chauhan
title: Great value for Money
content: The product build quality is good, Nice noise cancellation, i use them mostly in my way to college in bus and can barely hear any noise, The bass is thumping, can irritate the ears on very high notes which is common for any earphones in this price range.. I habe tried Sennheiser and Boat earphones in this price range (can't remember the exact product code) but this is the best pair of all.

name: Jelly
title: Very bad product and no service support
content: The earphones gone bad in 2 months and struggled to get the service center.. After reaching the service center the person was very rude and denied to provide the service even the product the still under warranty.. Please think twice before buying JBL products.

name: Senjit Ram Behera
title: Value for money
content: If you compare it with boat earphone which costs 50 rupees less. Then boat has better bass and it was sturdy. But the difference here is that, the earphone fits better in the ear. Which in case of the boat earphone, it was falling out every time there was any jerk. Also the sound quality was comparable with the boat earphones.

name: Ashique S
title: earphone gone bad within warranty period.. customer service not ready to take complaint
content: bought this on 2018 March. The earphone stopped working now. We contacted customer care but she was exteremly rude. She was just telling no replacement will be done and was not even listening my issue. The manufacturer contact is also fake and when told her the same , she replied Amazon doesn't have that much time to verify every manufacturer, she asked us to google the details, can't even contact him now.

name: Adnan Naushad
title: Decent product at this price range
content: Pros. 1 Good sound quality. 2 bass is awesome. 3 build quality is ok. 4 value for money. 5 good for online class and I love the Google assistant button... CONS. 1. build quality is good but please use it properly otherwise purchase earphone protector.... 2. If you are not a bass lover then this is not for you go for Sennheiser cx180...

name: Sai
title: The microphone on/off does not work
content: This is the 2nd time I bought the same model and both times after a few months, the button provided to receive calls when listening to music does not work. It works initially and then stops working. One has to take the phone and receive the call from the phone screen. Rest is ok.

name: Mr.MD
title: Awesome earphones...!! Just the right ones at this price..!!
content: The sound quality is superb and bass is good. The earpiece design is also very comfy and trendy. These donot offer much of noise cancellation, but they are also not meant to. While listening to music these filter most of the outside noise. Overall sound is awesome and its JBL..!! So definitely worth buying...!

name: Janaravi
title: one side of headphone not working
content: I bought this headphone in march 2019 and In starting of January 2020 one side of the headphone is not working but the headphone is overall good in the usage period. Previously I used boat basshead 225 headphones. But this JBL earphone is better than that boat earphone is so slipping all the time from the ear but this one don't even if you shake you heads real hard

name: Sandip Bhar
title: Not felt any deep bass as such...
content: Clarity good. You need to keep volume little high to feel the overall effect. But sorry, no deep bass was felt as such. Made in China. In case of any issue you can only replace it with a fresh copy.

name: S T
title: Waste of money
content: Headphones stopped working within 20 days (from buy date) even after limited use. I am not habitual of using headphones, so hardly used that in last twenty days.. Due to lock down, i started using for office calls, and suddenly one day it stopped working (voice not reaching to receiver end).. Waste of money i guess.

name: Naushad
title: Pathetic. Don't buy this and waste your money.
content: Sound is just ok. Quality is below average. The rubber in-ear bud is bad quality.. Update: after using only one month, left earphone is not working. There is no warranty of this product. I have to put this in dustbin.. Pathetic product. please don't waste your money.. Surprised to see that Amazon is selling such cheap local products with JBL label.

name: Prashant
title: JBL is best üòç
content: well what can I say JBL is best!. no one can beat c100 at sound quality and and noice cancellation at this range, it's the best.. cons: wire quality should be better, but if you'll take good care of it, it'll last 2-3 years. I've been using this since 2.5 years, its still working fine.

name: Shaik Khaiser
title: Impressed with the  sound quality but disappointed by the mic.
content: Pros:. 1. The earphones are very good, sound quality is awesome.. 2. Theatre experience. Bass and surround sound are perfectly balanced.. Cons :. 1. But the main problem is they doesn't fit well in my device, I'm using Moto G5s plus, when I connect them to my device the pin doesn't fit very well, and the mic and controller won't work.. 2. Build quality is weak.

name: Daminiüå∏
title: Quality Issues
content: The product worked amazing in the beginning. However, after a while, one of the earphone stopped working abruptly. Disappointed to the core.. The same happened with another pair of earphones purchased by a friend. Not recommended at all.

name: Prabhunath
title: Worth buying this headset
content: Delivery was awful. Amazon sends a pin to validate the recipient but of no use.. They will just give it to anyone they wish though my family members were present. They didn't even call. This is least of the expectation from Amazon delivery.. I have bought this for the 2nd time and I have enjoyed it.. Previous one lived for 9 months inspite of good care

name: Narsaiah V.
title: Socket broken , wire quality weak
content: Sound quality is good but Wire material is not good and very fragile !. The first time I ordered I liked it very much but the wire near socket was broken within six months so the earphones were not working.i thought it was my mistake due to my poor management .I ordered again and same thing happened again. It's been only 5 months that's it.. Please improve the wire quality ..that is make it stronger so that it won't bend or break easily especially near the socket

name: Arvind Nigam
title: Cheap and best
content: Frankly speaking this is my 5th or 6th JBL earphone, not for me but for others.... I haven‚Äôt noticed any problems in any of the model so far, have used sennheiser also.. But Both are different class, JBL in same price offers almost same quality and with MIC.. Its Durable and crispy.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No value for money
content: Didn't liked the quality of sound. Even at full volume not getting that effect which I was expecting from such a big brand. Voice was also very suppressed and not creating that feel.

name: veda s.
title: Right earphone stopped working after 1 and half year
content: I ordered them on 27th May 2019 and received them the next day. Everything is perfect about the earphones. I didn‚Äôt use them that oftenly in 2019 but in 2020 during lockdown I used them a lot like more than 10 hours due to online classes and it is also perfect for gaming. So on 6th November my right earphone stopped working. But overall satisfied with this product

name: vigneshbabu
title: Headset sound and bass quality are good but headset wire is very thin
content: Headset sound and bass quality are good but headset wire is very thin. After used Redmi Head set with thick wire for many years, felt this JBL headset wire between mic and ear phone is very thin. Personally I feel like If I use it hard then wire will be teared soon.

name: Muhammed althaf
title: JBL c100 si best headphone under 1000
content: I have used the product this is so nice and comfortable but the bad thing is in the built quality of the headsets it's not good as I expected the JBL headset have better sound quality and if you prefer a headphone under 1000 rupees JBL will be your best option it have high bass response and high sound cancellation any way best headphone I recommend buying this under 1000 headphone

name: Nikhil A R
title: Just buy it. You won't regret.
content: The best sound quality you'll get in any earphone in this price segment. If you're looking for an earphone with a natural balanced type sound with a little touch of bass.. see no more... go for it.. you won't ever regret buying these.. It's got a good build quality too that'll last for a minimum of 2 years... the only con- the earpiece is a bit oversized. It might bother you while outdoor use.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good
content: Received a genuine product, Thanks to Amazon.. Regarding the product... Its Good.. Sound quality is good particularly the mid levels are great you may listen to sounds which you may not have listened before. Regarding Bass its not that great , Bass is there but its not a deep bass , All you hear is "thud" sound .. Having noise cancellation mic, Its a good value for money headphone.

name: Piyush Chowre
title: Long term review.  Good product.
content: After using it almost a year, it got crushed in my car door while closing. It was working still but the plastic bit was chipped off and ai was hurting my ear.. So its durable, sound is also good.. Will recommend Someone who is looking to buy a budget headphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Unbelievable product for this price
content: I am using this jbl product for more than 1 year. This is the best earphone used in my life. Top merit is sound quality, bass, noise cancellation. Minute demerits are build quality when we play some audio the left ear has only low volume of sound for some audios only. But when we compare the price this is the best product for this price. The main advantage is this a top brand product for this price is unbelievable.

name: Sanjay Patel
title: Honest review
content: All things are good but wire durability of wire is not too good if you use it roughly it will break at the point of aux cable. Not value for money as compared to boat earphones.But if you have budget then you can buy .

name: deepak s.
title: Best at this price range
content: I think in earphones this is the Best in this price range. After all JBL is very good brand due to which sound quality is good and also the build quality. It feels the premium quality and when you compare earphones with your friends, then you goona win always at this price range thats the best thing.. I think that the jack should be L shaped so that it will not damage quikly. Thats annoying

name: Punyahun
title: Great one for bass and overall sound
content: These buds are designed for Bass The mids and lows are slightly subdued but much better than many other buds. After all it is JBL. The fit is not that great. Also the wires are too thin and I wish they could have tangle free flat wires instead. Pros: Best bassy sound. Cons: No volume buttons. Mic is not so good. Thin wires

name: Suman Saha
title: Great Value for Money
content: The deal of 549 for this awesome product is a must buy deal, great bass quality, durability looks to be an issue to me but if you can use it for 6 months then also worth it

name: Samyak Jain
title: Worth the money.
content: I like that you have more than one pair of earbuds to choose from. I do wish the wire was flat so the tangling could be avoided. The sound is brilliant and when it is raised to the highest you cannot hear anything around you. It's good for people who have annoying roommates.

name: Vinay Belaguthi Vishwachandra
title: Good quality ear phones for this price range.
content: I have been using these earphones from the past 2.5 years.. I still use them for taking skype/teams calls. No disturbance as off now.. Good to watch movies. One con which i faced is that. It does not have an L shaped plugin.. so chances of cracking the wire near plugin is more. Mine got cracked after 1 year.. I had applied 5Rs super glue (fevikwik) for cracked part and its still working.. :P :P

name: Gigin Haokip
title: Too bad for the price
content: I would rather buy Mi Earphones the next time.. Its sound not bad but not so good.. Its bass is average, and has excess treble sound that seems like its peeking off. For the price its too expensive just because Its JBL like Apple.. No much feature but costly

name: Tridip
title: Somewhat Disappointed !
content: Jbl c100si is a decent sounding earphone (Only if you use equalizer). However, in its raw sound profile, its treble is very high to my liking and also the bass is low. Comparing to Sony MDR-EX14AP earphone, it sounds better.. I bought this Earphone in 549/- Considering Price, its good but don't expect much from this earphones (As I had great expectations from a Brand like JBL which turned out to be flat).

name: sushree sahoo
title: Disappointing sound quality:(
content: Didn't expect such a bad product from JBL. The grip isn't good in the ears n the sound quality is very distorted n terrible during call, however the bass is great during music. The previous model was perfect in less price

name: Kiran
title: The product was fake
content: Don't purchase this product from amazone, i purchased the same from amazone and it stopped working in two months, and when i try to register the product on jbl official website for guarantee the product serial number is not being accepted, which means the product amazone provides us is fake. Guys these are just copies of the original product, don't waste your money on them

name: Qurratulain Haider
title: Decent Earphone
content: Use for past 3 months.I like it for the small buds.Fits very well to the ear.Bass is above average but sound quality is awesome.Mic is good tooo and supports all phone with 3.5mm audio jack.

name: Gavaskar
title: Without few days the headphone becomes useless.
content: Usually I don't give negative feedbacks.. This is my third JBL purchase. First 2 works perfectly, till today over the last 1 year.. The third JBL headphone I brought recently, unfortunately this becomes useless within 5 days. Since I opened it after few days, not able to replace too. Completely scrap product.

name: Sanjana R Y
title: A good price for great sound quality
content: I absolutely love these earphones. Sound quality is fantastic: high clarity and unbelievable bass! Since my kitten chewed through my first pair :( , I had to get another right away.. Noise cancellation isn't really a feature with these earphones, nevertheless I can't hear a lot of outside sounds with these earphones in my ears.. A great product from the house of JBL, a brand I love and trust!

name: ABHISHEK
title: not COMPATIBLE with REDMI mobiles
content: It is seriously not COMPATIBLE with REDMI mobiles.... I bought it today and i can hear music through one earbud only.... To hear it from both i always have to adjust it before hearing and its really so frustrating that i cant explain....

name: GS
title: Good one
content: The product it awesome. Sound quality is good. I bought it for Rs. 699 thinking that the product is in offer. But the product is available for Rs. 599 in Amazon itself. Check for the price before you buy.

name: Bipin Yengkhom
title: Awesome bass, nice treble. Enjoy the Taste of music.
content: Yes, it is really nice. The bass quality is awesome and the treble is also fine. However the noicecancellation, when i make a phone call, the left side in-ear speaker has a strange small noice. In my experience this is the only problem i have in this product. For gaming, listening music and others there isn't any problem; the product works quite fine. ENJOY!

name: Vikram
title: Decent
content: Material is decent.. Sound is better than other brand in this price range. Durability is also good as I've been using them roughly and there's no problem till now

name: satyam tiwari
title: perfect sound and bass quality but right part stopped working after one month
content: sound quality and bass quality is absolutely perfect.. i mean its one of the best in that aspect of earphone and it can even beat earphones in range Rs.1000-1500 but after using for one month, right side of earphone stopped working.. and that's the issue with this earphone.. not only my earphone got this problem even others have same kind of problem ( damaged right side after one month use).

name: Amazon Customer
title: Money saver Headphones nothing much.....
content: First off all this product does not have good bass. But the sound quality is good. They have provided warranty but you'll have to replace this product at least once in warranty period. (Service of service centers impeccable. they will replace the headphones without asking any questions)

name: Saliha khan
title: GREAT!
content: I don't think so this product need an explanation or some good review to proof its worth... At this price point this is the best you can get..... fully satisfied with the headphones.

name: YOGENDRA TRIPATHI
title: Worst due to made in china product!
content: Made in China product......beware of such type of distributors available in India.. Worst product quality as well known about made in china products.

name: Maverick
title: A quality product from a trusted brand.
content: This is the best wired ear phones that you can get withing this budget. Best value for money. Its been few months now since I m using this, and beyond doubt the sound quality and durability is too good. Just go for this....

name: Babu
title: One of the Best IN-EAR WITH MIC !
content: I use tons of In-ear earphones, this earphone sound quality is not a top notch. For a newbie this maybe a awesome In-ear. The material quality is superb perfect length not over stretched or shrinked but its NOT BRAIDED.. But this is one of the best IN-EAR WITH MIC !. Can rate 8 out of 10 considering the price point and other compromises

name: Vivek
title: one ear piece will going to work effectively and other god's grace
content: they hardly deliver you genuine product within a month of use one ear piece is working and other one who knows what the hell happened.. only thing I know that Amazon don't even assure product quality they just sent the product without even checking

name: GOPIKRISHNAN V.S.
title: Good...  but,
content: Good product, but the loudness is not as good as my previous jbl earphone T200a. The built quality is slightly better and tangling is also resduced a bit comparing to t200a. Voice clarity is good, moderate bass and treble. Very good in this price range.

name: Yuvaraj
title: Waste of money, sellers cheating the customers
content: First I want to tell u that sellers are trying cash the situation by placing return items to the customer in offers season.. I received the product with the multiple foldings which we can find easily as reused item. I started using the product and button on headphones completely stopped working after 2days and mic not working properly.. Waste of money and don't buy this item saying honestly I saw brand choosen, but it is waste.

name: Faizur
title: Worth upto Rs.600
content: I bought it for 599 rupees.... Definitely worth the money... Sound quality is very good.... Buy the wire that connects the earbuds is not upto the mark.. It feels very cheap... But the sound quality is definitely great.

name: Sairam Subramaniam
title: No Bass sound at all
content: It absolutely has no bass at all. I purchased it because such a good brand was being sold at just six-fifty at that time. But it absolutely has no bass, and when you increase the sound a bit, it would start irritating my ears. After two times of listening, I gave it away to some one. This one wasn't worth it (at least for me!)

name: SURYA
title: Cheap and best ever
content: The cheap and best ever in ear phones... I bought twice.. But this time it stopped working right side in which microphone is setup.. I don't know what the issue is but my friend had the same issue in his earphones. Right side ain't working.

name: Vaibhav
title: Heaven for ears
content: Best earphones under 1k. Nothing beat the quality of JBL. Its very comfortable I can put it on for hours without any problem. But earbud quality is not so great, I don't know how but it broke after 3 months of usage.. Overall experience is great.

name: Sanjay Singh
title: Highly disappointed with quality !!
content: Within 10 days started getting problem, there is noice, voice breaking in right side speaker.. Now cannot replace also.... Opted for JBL for quality but very disappointed !

name: Swaraj Karan
title: Right bud stopped working.
content: I had ordered this product few days before lockdown as my old earphone's one of the buds had stopped working. After receiving the new product, all was okay. It fit my ear perfectly, sound was also good. But, after 2-3 days, right side of the earphone stopped working. I initiated the return, but till then lockdown was implemented. So, I had to spend my 1.5 Months of lockdown without earphone. I didn't expect this from JBL.

name: Abhishek Raj
title: Value for money.
content: i purchased these earphone in june 2018 and very nice earphone by jbl at this price range. i purchased it on lightning deal for 699.00. sound quality is very good and noise cancellation. suddenly one side of earphone stopped working but i have used it for 15 months. if you're searching for a budget earphone at Rs 600-700 you can go for it.

name: Anil
title: Fairly durable value for money headphones, but not very durable. Broke in a year
content: Wire rubber insulation feels good, not delicate but not as good as nylon braided. Sound quality is good not too bass heavy, has good balance. Value for money (bought at 899). Update: Broke in a year. I would say I had a fairly high usage. Not very durable

name: Jitendra Tolani
title: These things are not meant to last
content: The company conveniently give 1 year replacement warranty as they know these things wont last longer than 18 months. ive been using these earphones since 2018 and in close to 14 months, one ear stopped working. I suggest dont spend this much money on these earphones and go for samsung instead, great mic quality (mic of jbl sucks btw), and decent sound output with durable materials used.

name: Opo m.
title: Good sound at this budget
content: Jbl never disappoints. At this price range, comparing with other same price range earphones this one outstands them all. Though higher prices jbl earphones would sound better. But the sound quality(especially the bass) of this too works fine. If you have budget range of this earphone go ahead without any second thoughts.. A thumps to this headphone from my side. Happy with it.

name: MOHIT SINGH
title: Very Good Headphones.balanced music.great experiance.
content: sound is overall very good.the punchyness is there,treble is there, but the bass is little less when we compare it with its competetors like mi dual drivers,even mi basic earphones, and i felt little extra treble while listening any kind of music through it.. THIS IS VERY GOOD ONE TO BUY GIVES VERY GOOD SOUND DETAILED CLEAR CRISPER MUSIC.

name: Ravi Kant Pandey
title: Worth for Money for a short span of time.
content: I have purchased this product on 10 December 2018 and it's 9th May this product has started torn out from mobile plugin side. Sound, Noise cancellation and usability is very good. Manufacturer shout out as it will work for Year but I do not agree. Its life cycle is not more than 7 months.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Not at all satisfied stopped working in 2 months
content: Very bad first at all it has low sound. Then it worked only for 2 months suddenly audio stooped from one side then from another side. I thought it may have been cracked or something but no my earplug is in good condition i don't know why it has stopped working totally waste of money i wasted my 699 rs and it has no warranty

name: Nathan A.
title: Good product. I recommend it.
content: Good material with pretty good durability. I would have given 5 stars if the sound quality was perfect. There's a slight problem with the sound. In the right earphone the sound is clear and perfect with epic bass but in the left ear the sound is always low and hence bass is low which creates a slight defect while listening to music or watching movies but other than that that I find no other problem with it.

name: Aditya Remy Shah
title: Sound is good, the the cable/wire is a trouble
content: I would have given it more stars but the cable of this earphones are a mess. They tend to entangle so quickly that you would spend more time unscrambling it than using it some time. JBL needs to do something about it.

name: Kiruthika
title: Jbl vs Sony vs Sennheisers
content: The sound quality is good over call. Compared to Sennheisers cx180 the bass is subpar. Since the head phone jack is not L shaped it breaks easily and won't last long. usually 3-4 months after heavy usage. I've used Sony MDR-EX255AP in past and the material was sturdy enough to last for 2 years. Noise cancelation is good. Three stars because inspite of all the merits it won't last long.

name: Tanay Singhal
title: Bought again...
content: 1st I bought this product 2.5 years ago.. Sound quality, noise cancellation, bass -5/5. No doubt.. And in 2.5 I never regretted for buying this earphone. It's worth every paisa they charge you. I have changed several earphones but never come across this quality. Keep up the good work @JBL.

name: VINOD NEWASE
title: Good but not robust
content: I have purchased twice, as I have misplaced first one,.. My previous experience is very much good,. But the second time I got defective piece, the right earpiece stopped working, no sound from right earpiece, i have hardly used for 3 months üëç

name: Ravi Ranjan Kumar
title: Defective Product has been delivered
content: I bought this earphone this month only which was delivered around 10 or 11 of May. I started using the earphone after date of return and I found while talking to someone on phone or listening music a strange sound is coming from this. This happens just in new product. I don't know which type of product was delivered by u. This time I had a very bad experience in shopping with Amazon. My belief got broken.

name: Raghaventhan
title: Warranty
content: I bought this product one month back. It's not working now, how can i claim for warranty ?

name: Swetha Pershad
title: Product is okish
content: It's a okish product, nice sound. But rest everything is very poor. I purchased it a year ago it works exactly & perfectly fine as its warranty is for a year. Then suddenly once the warranty period is over it starts giving issues. My right side plug is not working now and I have to pay and get it repaired which is very painful as they don't have proper service centres in the city.

name: Bhagirathi Mishra
title: Best For The Price.
content: Everybody Has Written A Lengthy Review.. So, I'll Only Rate Every Spec. So You Can Decide On the Basis Of That.. Sound Quality - 4/5. Clarity - 4/5. Bass - 2/5. Noise Cancellation - 5/5. Loudness : 4/5. Overall, Bass Quality Was Good But Not Enough Fr Me, As I had used other Earphones Previously,Which Had Better Bass Than This one, But. Medium Bass Has One Benefit That Each and Every Sound Is Clear And Immersive.. So You Can go Fr It.üëç. Bass Lovers Check Other Options.

name: debarun choudhury
title: BAD BUILD QUALITY, THE WORST .
content: The sound quality is good, enough to enjoy some good music, BUT the build quality is VERY VERY VERY BAD. THE WIRE ARE WEAK AND PRONE TO WEAR AND TEAR EVEN WHEN HANDLED WITH CARE. The joint with the mic is so weak the it scares me whenever I stand up. Dont buy it if you are planning to use it for longer periods of time or while sleeping.

name: Shashi shekhar prasad
title: Wast of money plzzz don't buy
content: This is a duplicate hadephone, after some time branding is deleted and wire is hard then its broken, my another jbl hadephone purchesed on 2017 but now its wires are soft and it work properly and i purches this hadphone in 2019 now its not work

name: shubhangini
title: Claiming warranty is a myth
content: I ordered these earphones in January, and once again this product stopped working in just few months. When asked for warranty , a clear no was said . We are supposed to go deliver the damaged product in the collection centre,which in my case was around 20 kms far . And there they will check the product , after which the product if not working according to their criteria, only then a new product will get delivery.

name: nikhil adlinge
title: Not happy
content: Not awesome but good product. I would suggest to go for Artis which is way better than this. And Artis comes cheaper than JBL. For this product JBL should decrease the price. Artis comes at 350-400 and have a very good quality sound, more durable

name: Soumya Ranjan Bhattacharyya
title: Super awesome sound and loud too
content: The sound quality is awesome for both multimedia and call. Only thing is there is no volume button on the earphone. Also the wires are so thin i am not sure how long the pair will last. But, while the earphone last, i am going to enjoy its exceptional audio quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: ... daily for almost a month and the quality is poor. The volume in the right earpiece has already ...
content: Have been using these headphones daily for almost a month and the quality is poor. The volume in the right earpiece has already been defected and you can hardly hear anything that too in less that a months usage. The wires get tangled all the time and not of good quality. I am really disappointed with the quality of earphones from JBL.

name: Amiet Maliik
title: Bad Piece
content: I bought this product a few months back but couldn't write a review about it. It looks like a duolicate cheap quality product. Within 2 days one of the ear phone stopped working and started making a hissing sound. Gives problem with laptop as well. In overall, a very bad product to go with.

name: Vijay tiwari
title: Don't buy worst base and sound don't buy waste of money
content: Fake product got from amazon button in not working bass is worst I have purchased it only because of YouTube after 10 days of purchase left side got slow and it's very unpleasant to hear variation in sound

name: Dhruvil
title: Outage Material(cover skin)
content: Its sound and quality is nice but after some time its outage skin is getting damage automatic..even i am not used it for last 3 month...so its material quality is not at much acceptable...and when i go for replacement then they not accepted it...and even they not to reply our email also...so pls friend if you want a product for long use then go for other company....

name: vivek
title: Lacking in bass and sound quality (combination of different frequencies) is below expected
content: I found it to be lacking in bass which cannot be managed by using bass booster apps. Slightly disappointed. Also causes pain in ears after short time. Couldn't experience the expected "JBL legendary sound".

name: Tanishq J.
title: Excellent one
content: This one is for the people who love vocals and highs.Not for bassheads but it does have adequate bass.The overall sound stage proved to be excellent.But the product has to be used carefully as the wire quality was pretty average.The microphone for taking calls is decent too.

name: Anuradha B
title: Good one, affordable price
content: Quite a good set for frequent, rugged use. Using for my son's online classes and it withstands all the wear and tear in between tugging from within several wires.

name: Abhinav
title: Stopped working within a month.
content: Please note that one earpiece would stop working sooner or later. Mine stopped working within a month. It has been the consistent problem with JBL ( have used few and same problem with each earphone). Although service is good but I wish their products to be as good as their service.. Time to try some other brand now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: lasted 8 months
content: I bought this on 16 Jan and used it till 19 sept. sound quality is good. The product is good. Moreover, durability depends on how you use it. satisfied!!. Update: I am a daily user of headphones and use headphones for 5-6 hrs in a day. The quality is good for this price... never disappointed me with the quality. I don't expect headphones to be in good condition even after extensive 6-8 months use.. But I recommend it and till now I bought 3 of same headphone . And a happy customer of JBL.

name: Ankit Kumawat
title: Recommended
content: Really good to hear with this earphone. Believe me guys if you want to buy an earphone for around 500rs then must go for this. It deliver so smooth sound, I am using it for 4-5 hours continuously and no ear pain. Best results

name: Ashish Vishwas Devale
title: Mic not working properly.. Ok sound quality..
content: Received package within time from Amazon.. thanks . But now about issues with Earphones.. 1) Poor sound quality 2) Mic not working properly. So i got them replaced..
