Even the replaced piece behaved same way.. Mic not working properly. The person at opposite side of cal can't hear and lots of background noise.. even i am calling from home .. Now searching for an option to get my money back... !

name: TVD Murthy
title: Best from JBL
content: Awesome earphones from JBL. Sound clarity is excellent, Bass is very good ,but mids are avg. Stereo is perfect, noise cancellation is nice. Wire quality is abv avg, mic is very good. In Ear feel is nice and feels light weight.. JBL sound signature is very unique go for it.

name: Kirito8x
title: Bought this earphone 2 times
content: I bought this earphone in 2016 I think, And I fell loved with this product. I even jumped into water with earphone I actually thought it stopped working, I left it to dry and surprisingly it worked ! In 2019 January 28 I lost this earphone and i again ordered this earphone without thinking twice cuz this earphone made many of my days, today March 10 2019, I again jumped to water(River) but it again worked!! this made my day!! and I thought I should write a review about this product!

name: Shereza syed
title: OK product not so great sennheiser cx 180 is much better, cheap earphone with jbl sticker on it
content: Well I expected a nice product from jbl but wasn't really happy with the quality, which is to say OK so the quality is pretty cheap and doesn't look like it's a jbl but honestly quality aside I expected more from sound quality which is OK not as great as its rival the sennheiser cx 180 which is way!!!! Better to use Quality is superb and sound quality is superb it just lacks the mic which for people who use it for music is fine

name: Sonu sharma
title: Do not buy from amazon at all, it will be a good choice to buy from jbl's official site.
content: The earphones are not the same as they appear on Amazon. Made of very poor quality material. The microphone and control button are given in the right side while its video has a button and mic in the middle main wire. amazon is selling its copy. Do not buy from amazon at all, it will be a good choice to buy from jbl's official site.

name: Mithun
title: Good Buy - Go for it.
content: Its the best you can get at this price.. Sound is very good, very balance sound. Handle good base at the same time you hear vocals very clearly.. I have used Sanheiser, Boat, Audiotecnica, Mi in this range.. This JBL In Ear is best of all.

name: Arvind Srivastava
title: Do not buy
content: I had bought this earphone and after 6 months of use the right ear piece has stopped working. So i had claimed warranty and i got new pair of the earphone but again after 4 months of use the right ear has stopped working again. I am very disappointed eventhough the sound quality is very good and it has decent noise cancellation but after normal use of 4-6 months one of the ear piece stops working.

name: Sukanya
title: Great
content: I loved these earphones still do the bass on these are just too good, switched to bluetooth earphones recently but if you have a 3.5mm jack port for your earphones go for this it's a great buy with good sound quality.

name: Itsparikshit
title: Among the best & waterproof too !!!
content: I should admit this piece is a class in its own and can compete with those price above 1000 and below 5000 rupees. Simply go for it you wont regert. And yes this happened when i forgot to check my jeans before washing it in machine and after drying it for three days this piece worked the same as before ......

name: Rishik
title: Worth the money
content: Sound that comes from this earphones is good.. It's not super bass heavy, but gets the job done.. Got a defective earphones but was easily replaced by amazon.. The cable is a bit thin and might get damaged. hope jbl gives a braided cable in the future

name: Mrinal
title: Good product in this price.
content: In this price range its really good wored earphones. Sound quality is good.. low and high volume sound is Good.. Mic is good.. Bass is ok.. Good Fit in ear

name: Sweta
title: Damaged during lockdown period
content: On purchasing this product, you will be satisfied with the sound quality. Design is good and within a few days, you will get adjusted to it so that it fits on your ears perfectly. I opted to rate it 4 star rather than 5 star because of the inferior quality of it's wire and plastic material used. The logo printed on the earbuds will fade with time. Else, it's a good earphone to give a heads up in this price range.

name: raviteja
title: Please Don't Buy JBL
content: JBL is not worth product as before I bought 2 different sets C100 and C 200 but both are not working now. For one only one earpiece is working.. For other set suddenly volume goes high which makes disgusting while driving.. You'll have WARRANTY but if you have patience to give your earphones for 45 days please go ahead.. So please think before buying JBL products

name: Vibha Rajput
title: Used for 1.5 yrs
content: Writing this review after 1.5 years of use, sound quality 5/5, noise cancellation 4/5, bass 3/5, after 1 year microphone stopped working and after 13 months left ear stopped working. Brought it from Amazon in ‚Çπ548 in no sale days. At this price this product is more than that you need. But I was shocked that after 1.5 years its price increased. Now it is of ‚Çπ699, Don't know why.

name: Ramanna KS
title: Stopped working suddenly! Bad quality product!!
content: I have been using this earphones since 1.5yrs and suddenly I am not able to hear things properly even at the extreme high volume. Suddenly it stopped working. This was not expected from JBL. I had assumed JBL to be best quality product of all. But it turned out to be false. A very bad quality product! Suggested not to be purchased.

name: Simpal A
title: After using 3 months, earphone sound is not coming
content: After using 3 months, now both right and left of earphone sound are not coming.. I have tried connecting with customer service however, no one has responded. I don't know what to do now.. No value for money.. I am not it is original or duplicates it's better to add few more money and buy original JBL

name: Rahul
title: best one at it's range
content: Sound quality and bass was quite good in this price range compared to other leading brands. Very comfortable for ear . Don't expect Noise cancellation..

name: Sharon s p
title: Did not meet the expectations.
content: Sound quality and bass are note upto the mark. It totally disappointed me. If you love using over head headphones and can add some more bucks then go for 'boat bassheads 900'.Trust me guys, I have one and the sound quality and bass levels are top notch.

name: Rehan
title: Good
content: I liked it so much that i ordered another one for my niece. The bass is amazing and so is the call quality. Overall, sounds like a genuine JBL product.

name: Isha
title: Good product
content: I have ordered this for the third time. Was very happy with earlier ones. Somehow I found these to be very flimsy and weak. You cannot the sound quality for a JBL though.

name: prasanna sachin salagare
title: Good sound with durability.
content: Sound quality is great but low bass.. At this cost all other earphones are delicate. I love jbl because of its durability.. It the only one which will last longer than a year. Works for me. Doesn't hurt in ear. Stays at place even while workouts.. Worked even after unknowingly washing in washing machine.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mind blowing sound quality
content: Excellent excellent i never heard such a brilliant sound quality from an earphone . such an awesome sound quality, bass is not enough apart from that excellent earphone in this price , good treble mids highs vocals are very well balanced definitely buy this one if you like good sound quality

name: Metta Ramesh
title: Awesome bass
content: I used boat 112,103,100 earphones model, skullcandy, Audiotechnica earphones sound quality is super, but this Jbl earphones is superb sound quality üëå, And Extraordinary deep bass, jbl signature sound so good I never listen this type of sound, smooth button earphones, mic is exactly noise cancelling,best mic earphone, All songs listen deeply & Original sound..

name: Mili S.
title: Product not upto the mark as expected.
content: Got damaged within 3 months of usage. Left piece won't working. Contacted customer care but, they denied to give warranty and give a replacement. Bad quality headphone. Please don't buy,please. Instead buy other brand earphones with less price and better quality.

name: Shruthi B
title: bass Cans
content: on hearing it I feel like some kind playing cans near your ear while listing to nice music. over all its a cheap China product which Vendor want to get rid of on the name of Dasara.& Divali. recommed to pic something else if you can offerd

name: W.P. A.
title: it doesn't have too much of booming bass goin on which is perfect
content: the frequency response in these headphones is perfectly balanced, it isn't too much in the low end which is perfect for blues, jazz, metal, 90's pop even the modern pop stuff even without the eq on.. great product.. much less costly than the tempo range and in my opinion it's the best JBL product right after the reference range..

name: Karthik
title: Poor Quality
content: The earphone doesn't work on the left side while it works only on the right side. For the first three weeks the earphone was functioning properly after which the left side stop working, while only right side works. Now this earphone has become useless and another junk in my house.

name: Rahul Kumar Verma
title: Not satisfied! iPhone users, don't buy it.
content: I bought this to use with my iPhone 6S but the sound quality is not as good as I have experienced with my apple earphones. Moreover, they are not efficiently compatible with iPhone during calls. Mic does not work properly and mic button does not support call accept or reject feature.

name: M V RAVI
title: Great value for money
content: The audio quality is very good and noise reduction improves sound quality further. The cable used is too thin and not sure how long it lasts in Indian weather condition and handling. I really liked my Samsung and Motorola ear phones as the the cables were rugged. It is a good product which can be made better to last long.

name: chirag
title: please replaced it with New sealed pack unit for what i have paid
content: quality of earphone is not that much better what i expected just opened it looks like someone used this after i reveived i dont know why amazon os doing this i got delivery after 5 days what they commited dont know what to do all cables are bended its look like it is used headphone no seal on box no kuch .. Please replaced it with brand new box pack unit for what i have paid ....

name: yeswanth yassu
title: Good
content: Everything seems to be fine regarding sound. But, the earphones wire is so slim. I felt like it was delicate. Those who use very roughly it will not suit for them

name: sudarsan subramanian
title: Best sound experience with the worst wires..
content: Sound Quality is excellent... Bass is simply superb..u will not get this much bass anywhere for rs 800... But a major con is the Wire Quality..if you are a rough user, then this is not for you. Maximum life of the wires are 6 mnths.. JBL should seriously look to improve the wire quality..

name: yogita
title: Misleading country of origin
content: I had thought jbl is not a chinese company but wen i opened it i saw it was made in china though it was an american company so i am not satisfied with amazon as they did not inform me earlier

name: Deepa Srivastava
title: Not working after a week
content: I had brand loyalty for JBL. Buy it was all gone as both headphones have given really bad result. Both are not functioning properly. Don't advise to buy

name: arun bhorge
title: Bad customer support.
content: Wire quality is bad, after 4 months of use the earphone stopped working properly.. I have asked customer service to help, they had suggested to visit service point at Harman, Mumbai.. When I had submitted the earphones there, they had rejected it saying that it is damaged even though the women who checked my earphone pulled the wire from mic.

name: Sahil Shivam
title: Great earphones
content: Great earphones , using them since Nov 2017, which is pretty awesome lifespan for a budget earphone considering the fact that I'm a heavy user. It firts in the ears perfectly and once the music is on you won't hear anything from outside. The sound is balanced and offers great experience. For those who love a balance between treble and bass, go for it guys !

name: A C
title: Not upto the mark
content: Doesn't seem original, seems to be a roadside material. Don't buy, wear and tear will start within a few months. Mine didn't even last a year. Earlier left earbuds were dead, now wear and tear has made it a no use. Better to buy jbl products from store. Was a great experience with mi earphones though.

name: Pawan  Bathe
title: Very good earphone for regular use
content: I am using this for past 8 months, perfect for music or watching videos.. I used these to listen class room recorded or online lectures, and sound quality is very clear and they are comfortable too.

name: V M
title: Senheiser with mic handsfree is better than this
content: Earphones ear plugs are hard n any of the three sizes of plugs u attach, it keeps falling off unless u force into ur ears. But the voice calls are clear, noise is cancelled but could have been better .. I majorly use it for calls on large display fone as holding fone for long is impossible. Used senheiser before this and was very satisfied with Senheiser with mic handsfree

name: Amazon Customer
title: Go for it!!
content: Good quality headphones. I have been using these for quite sometime now, nearly 3+ months and they have worked well. Seems expensive but as compared to other available headphones, this is definitely worth it for daily rough use.

name: abhishek saurv
title: Sound Quality
content: Comparing this earphone with sennheiser CX 213, I find that sennheiser is a better one in terms of sound quality. The only + point with this earphone is MIC. But if you are buying just listening to music I would suggest to go for Sennheiser.

name: Anish a.
title: Sounds Electronic
content: It sounds so electronic and artificial.... it's like everything is happening in front of me.. Use the small earbuds given in the package... It feels comfy and it has a lot of grip as it slides into the earcanal.. Edit :. The right ear bud stopped working after 3 months... Pls don't buy this product

name: Aditi
title: MADE IN CHINA!!!!!!!!
content: Pls specify beforehand that its made in china.not everyone is eager to buy products made in china. It kinda looks plastic and quality has reduced somewhat...compared from my last purchase.

name: sashank
title: best for vocals , bass is moderate
content: i bought this product because i wanted the vocals to be clear . For the people who love vocals in a song then this is best but for the bass lovers it is not as good as boat even though itis fine. noise cancellation is just moderate. I've used it for 6months no issues till now. i love this

name: Gulafsha
title: Okay
content: I bought this on lightening deal. The sound quality is good. However the base is not so good. No water proof. I don't know the exact word for that, but the small black cover that give a smooth hearing is coming of after few months of purchase.

name: SoftRock
title: Decent earphones
content: Good earphones with nice build quality. 3 sets of ear plugs in different sizes to suit individuals. Noise reduction and simple one button functionality. No mute option or fwd/reverse playback option. Was aware of this when bought so no issues, since I'm not a big music fan. Use it for phone calls while working, work good and do the job meant.

name: Srikanth
title: Worst headphones
content: I don't think they are genuine brand, sind quality is bad and on top of it the are muting the volume automatically I am unable to use it now don't know what to do.

name: deepak patel
title: Worst product and worst customer service
content: This is one of the worst product i purchased via online method. The sound was automatically going to zero level on inserting on the device. I tried hard to return the product and get the refund but I found Amazon customer service to be most insensitive and foolish. My humble advice to online customers is to refrain from buying such electronic platforms via online method.

name: Kevish sharma
title: Bed product..not upto the mark.
content: After use of 2 months, mic is not working. I'm totally disappointed with JBL now. Please replace my this headphone. Even i used it only 4 some days with very carefully. But when i want to receive call with this headphone, button is not working and mic too...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Volume tooooo low
content: Frankly.. dint sounds like JBl.. volume is too slow and even left earphone is not working properly.. dint expect this from JBl.. not worth the money

name: Momo
title: Wonderful 19 months
content: Overall a very good product. I am a hardcore headphones user. I use it about 8 hrs a day on average. It had worked very well for 19 months exactly and then one side of the headphones stopped working. I'm thinking about buying it again.. Go for it without any second thought.!

name: aniket
title: Faulty Product, But Kind Amazon giving an exchange !
content: I have been using this earphones from 6 days with an honest advice from my good friend. Sound quality is pretty good but the right part suddenly stop working. Its feels so disappointing using earphones with only left ear. Might be this one is the faulty product. But Thanks to AMAZON SERVICES that they accepted my request to exchange with other set. Hope the new arrival would be good as I expect.

name: mahesh
title: Ok product
content: Pros: Ok product, worth for the value.. Cons: Wire quality is very poor, no noise cancellation feature, ok sound for the call purpose, not ok for the movies and songs

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good buy for branded sound at lesser price
content: It's a good earphone for a decent price. I mostly used Sennheiser earphones before this, decided to use jbl this time. Can recommend to someone who wants to buy a branded earphone but don't want spend huge amount. You can clearly hear various sounds coming from different instruments and tell them apart, that's a sign of a quality product.

name: Juby Eipe
title: A high quality headphone
content: Whether you are listening to music or talking to someone, the sound quality of this headphone will amaze you. The noice cancellation of this accessory will help you to listen to your content with clarity even in a crowded and noisy railway station.. With long and rugged usage you may find the ear buds coming off the earpiece. So make sure that you keep the extra earbuds that come along with the earphones in some safe place.

name: Amit Khandelwal
title: one audio stopped working within two months
content: I bought this product on Dec 18 and by Feb I wk with very nominal usage, I am finding the one of the audio is not working. Need quick resolution in terms of replacement. Requesting customer care to look into it on priority. its extremely difficult to reach out to you as you guys are always busy. :(

name: Forceal
title: Good sound bad build quality
content: These headphones sounds great but after only a month one end stopped working. The wire quality and durability is not good. There are many choices at this range so i would suggest to by some durable ones.. Sound wise they are amazing and almost similar to cx180 the bass was not that good but the mids and highs were good.

name: Biswajit K.
title: Excellent product!
content: JBL is a renowned brand. Nominal price but great product indeed. If you want to record your voice WITHOUT background noice then there is no other great choice within this price range.

name: aditya rai
title: Amazing product
content: Pros:. the rubber of the earplug is soft and doesn't hurt your ear.. The sound quality is amazing.. The product quality is great for using in daily purpose.. Long lasting.. Well packed with 3 different ear piece rubber.. Cons:. Except the no volume button situation there are no upsetting thing in the earphones.

name: Bains
title: Good for price
content: If u want clean voise .... Less noise ..smooth highs and lows...you wont get all of this in them.U might wanna spend around 3000 to get such experience.. More oevr bass is not taht powerful, but it works for me as i dont like bass that much. Go with sony if u like bass.. That being said..it delivers balanced sound which makes it a good buy at the price.

name: Devv
title: Better than boat bh 225 and ant audio w56
content: The clarity and bass is superb ( overpowered) 4 bass lovers,, batter than boat basshead 225 and ant audio ,, it sounds like Sennheiser cx 180,, but cx 180 has better clarity (best)and descent bass,but lack of mic unlike jbl,, so overall go for jbl

name: Vivek
title: Decent CHINESE product
content: Overall a good product with good sound quality, bass and decent physical look. Product details mentions Country of origin as India which INCORRECT- it is made in CHINAüò°. I realised after return period was over

name: dinesh samanta
title: Good
content: Very good earphone with 1 year warranty, i am using it since a year now still it delivers good sound, i am a rough user and found the built quality is really good its my 2nd JBL earphone i had.used a same model before, it lasted for almost 20 to 22 months, i you are looking for more crisp sound u can go for sennheiser and it also comes with 2 years warranty and if you are a rough user then go for jbl

name: Ashwin.P
title: Would buy again
content: I mean at this price range it's honestly wayyy to good compared to many 1k+ earphones out there. It broke after an year and half only cause the wire quality was a little bad(well it went under pretty much barrage of drops and stuff and min 5+ hrs of listening to music per day)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fantastic!
content: It is JBL and it is excellent! :) Quality and sound of this headset is awesome. Gifted this headset and the receiver was very happy. It is product worth money.

name: Gaurav Singh
title: GREAT PICK FOR MUSIC LOVERS üëçüèª
content: JBL has always been my favorite brand for earphones ans headphones. The music quality is exceptionally good and if you handle with care, the product will stick with you for alleast a year...

name: Girl in Denmark
title: Great product
content: I bought these headphones as I was looking for a not-so-bulky yet noise-cancelling ones, with a good audio output as well. These JBL headphones are just what I was looking for. My web conferences require a good microphone which these come with. The sound quality is also perfect. I would highly recommend this!

name: shashank
title: The red color looks awesome and sound quality is freaking good
content: I bought this at 649 and the earphones are with crisp good quality and clarity. It also has a mic with noise cancellation which is also an add up. The bass is minimum but i guess too much bass in a close ear won't be good for your ear health so better go for this rather than some other earphones which can harm your ears giving a great bass effect at a cheaper price of 250 or 300. Spend some more and get a good one.

name: N Shopper
title: Awesome quality for a budget
content: If you are looking for earphones for daily use whether it may be music,movies or calls these are the best ones I found in this price range.The wires are a little delicate but overall quality is good.Bass quality is average.But overall the sound quality is really good as compared to the price.

name: Rumsha
title: Very bad experience of JBL Earphones .
content: Ok... So i am writing this review after more than 1month of use. I suggest not to buy these earphones as the voice used to come out of these earphones , the person sitting next to you would be able to listen what all you are listening very clearly ,even on low volume also. 2nd thing is after some days of use ,the earphones starts getting damaging as shown in pic.. .

name: Kishan panchal
title: Good for bass
content: This headphone has very good bass and noise cancellations. Mic quality is also good. But u didn't get Voulme up and down key. ( Don't worry, just press and hold the power button and tell your Google assistant to up or down you Voulme !!!üòä). U get only one button to play and pause or jump to next song or for Google assistant.. Overall it's good headset!!!

name: VINEET KUMAR
title: Good Earphones but low bass
content: This is a good product by JBL. Overall build quality is quite good. I am using this product daily since 4-5 months. There are no damages and no complaints with the build quality. Once you plug in, you cut off from the world and immerse in good sound that it has to offer. However bass is not that much impressive. I will give it 7.5/10.

name: Shashank
title: A Boss Item From JBL
content: JBL has always been a boss of this range of earphones. This one is no exception. The bass is awesome and sound quality is great as well. This is a great product to have. I got it for INR 699 as part of a lightening deal.

name: Unknown
title: A product worth considering
content: No doubt product is good, but the packaging is not intact it seems that it has been tempered with. Overall sound quality, noice cancellation and bass quality are as expected in this price range. Amazon should be careful about packaging of the products and of packet as products may get damaged during transit.

name: Nandu Devarasetty
title: Excellent purchase. Don't doubt.
content: The sound quality is excellent. The bass is super and it is not muddy and does not overlap the midtones and lows. Noise cancellation is excellent. Once you plugin, there is no way you can hear your surroundings. But i have to say, there is no difference between c100si c150si and c200si in sound quality.Excellent purchase.

name: Awatansa
title: Nice Product, But didn't lasted 6 months
content: I'm a heavy user, use it daily while sleeping. that might have been a reason that it didn't lasted for 6 months. (left ear gone dead) however, sound quality, bass all are very good. you will enjoy the quality.

name: Ritwik Kundu
title: Good sound quality but poor in look
content: The sound quality is great, no doubt about that. All the frequency are clear, bass is also decent. But, the only problem is it's built quality is not up to the mark. It has a look of a street side headphones. If this factor (the look) doesn't matter to you then you can go for it, as the sound quality is value for money.

name: Khitish Bania
title: Sound Quality is good, but Fit is bad.
content: The sound and build quality of the earphones are good, but the fit isn't the best thing in the World. My old Mi Basic earphone used to fit far better, and so did my old Audio Technica earphones. I think it's a build problem, rather than an ear tip issue. But whatever the case, if you're on a tight budget, you can make this work. Just know it'll be a little lose and easy to fall off.

name: Ravi
title: Overall Review
content: Product is very good! It passed all the audio test. The bass effect is pretty much what I enjoyed.. A little disappointment because the earphones were not good for singing and there was a little latency when you sung in the microphone and hear your voice at other side of the end. But overall it's good if u just want something that produces bass and enhances your music experience.

name: vijaykt
title: Liked the BASS quality
content: Great earphone, got it at lightening deal of the day.. happy to have this. Crystal clear sound - could hear all instruments clearly in a song..

name: Kaustubh P
title: Bought in July, left bud failed in Nov
content: The earphones are nice, but a tad poor to resist some wear. The left side went bad in 5 months. This is my second pair of the same earphones. Be wary of buying these.

name: Yatin Aneja
title: Loving it.
content: First of all thanks to JBL for this amazing earphone.. The design of this earphone is really awesome. The bass quality of this earphone is next to awesome. The call quality is also up to the mark. It has a button that can be used to operate many functions. The voice quality of the earphone is really nice.. I M just Loving these......

name: Gaurav
title: Very poor build and sound quality
content: I didn't like it as the voice was too feeble and body felt cheap. It was the same even for the replacement. Amazon was kind enough to give a refund.

name: Abhay jha
title: Not long lasting
content: Only worked for 3 months one side of the earphone stopped working did not expected this from company like jbl .. You but quality earphones to avoid buying cheap earphones again and again and to have good quality music experience , but as it only lasted for 3 months seems to be a wrong buy. (Service center is also pretty far from my location i won't be going)

name: madhusudhan v.
title: Don't buy this jbl earphone
content: Don't buy any of this jbl company earphone . Not even a year of using this earphone, left side earphone is not working, I am trying to contact for warranty for this product but not response from the company. Boat earphone are less in cost compared to this jbl but Boat earphone will give best experience for the long term of use. Don't buy any of this jbl earphone

name: Niraj Patle
title: Ear plugs
content: A big thanks to Amazon for amazing product. Best item in this amount and perfect satisfaction. Perhaps I will have used this type of ear plugs but jbl products are outstanding. I got clear sound quality and bass quality. Into this average price this product are best. I recommend you to buy this item for bestie. This ear plugs are light weighted and good looking.

name: Pramod Simha
title: Very Good Product For the Price !!
content: I am using this earphone for more than 5 months and it's sounding Great!! It's the earphone where gives immense sound quality with any phones & PC's, Mic also works Great !! Amazing Experience for the Music Lovers. Just Go For This Product Without a Second Thought as i have already used other major products of the same price bracket but this one is SuperB!!!!!!!

name: Deepankar Sarkar
title: Good sound, Mike is just ok
content: Good product at the discounted price. The Mike can be better, need to speak louder to share proper voice with other person. Also need to keep it very near to the mouth. Sound quality is good. However no volume control available in the gadget. Volume can be control through the attached device

name: Vikash Singh
title: It dint even work for 1 Year
content: Purchased on Sep29 2019 & today its 10th Sep 2020 & its not working properly.. Sometimes I wont get the audio sound if I am on call & the right earpiece completely stopped working.. In few days left earpiece too will stop working. So, it waste of my money.. There is 1 year warranty buy how to avail that?

name: Kartik Singh
title: Bang for your buck!!! Smart choice!!!
content: For the price range this earphones come in, it can't get any better.. I had the Sennheiser CX-275s before these, and trust me when I say that these aren't any worse than those were. In the same device, they both sound the same.. Definitely go for these.

name: Akshat Tyagi
title: You need to do something..
content: The product worked nicely in the beginning but then issues started .. First it malfunctioned and then totally shut down.. This product does not go up to the mark crieteria.. It is ruining the name of JBL and Amazon india.

name: Saswat Raut
title: Can go for it.
content: Sound quality is good. Comfortable for long hour listening. Price is quite high but brand can be trusted. Warranty is there but in order to get it covered you have to send the earphones through courier to HARMAN Service Center at Gurgaon which is a cumbersome affair and time taking process.

name: AshaKishan
title: BEST
content: Quality Sound is superb. I actually imported Klipsch early. Klipsch is one of the best international brands. But I started liking JBL more bcz of its sound quality at low volume also.

name: Abhay Pandey
title: Bass is not much high and Quality is not good
content: It's a not much better, but not worst as well.. Sound quality is avarage, some times bass comes great and some times you will miss bass.. Quality is not worth as per price, wires are so thin and no bfeded cable.. Ear Cabins are so light and you will feel comfortable.. Overall a decent sound quality and good to buy only want to compromise with built quality.

name: Arun Acharya
title: Always awesome jbl and thank you for the reseller... 4th time im purchasing it
content: I'm purchasing it for the 4th time and its awesome and jbl never let me down.. They are so good.. Reseller you rocked by delivering it the next day.. Amazon is awesome as usual..

name: rishiraj
title: Fraud
content: Doesnt looks like jbl item from its material delivery they have made me earlier.. the old jbl headphones were soft and its material they have delivered are different in sound and material. This time they have delivered different thing and im not impressed. It may be duplicate. I cant put reliance on online shopping. Poor product in comparison and poor sound

name: MANEESH CHANDRAN
title: An OK product but Not worth
content: Product wise this is an OK product and almost worth of money. Iam using this product for almost 9 months now. Just like other users it shows malfunctions, one ear plug is not working. So I claimed for warranty this week through their toll-free service glad that I claimed my warranty but I have to courier it to service center at HARIYANA. So iam not happy with this product even though I just loved the sound quality that's why I wrote this lengthy review

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ok product
content: I bought this after using sennheiser cx180 for sometime. I got it for 649 plus 49 cashback so. total 600 rupees. For that its worth, nothing more.. Clarity is very good, zero bass and treble is more, eventhough doesnt hurt the ears. Not recommended for. audiphiles

name: itsmatters
title: Best Sound Quality.
content: JBL C100SI Best At It's Price, Performance & Sound Quality. Used Several Wired & Bluetooth Earphones Since So Many Years, But It's Sound Quality Is Best Among All Earphones I Ever Used So Far. JBL C150SI Is Quite Similar To It.

name: Aneesh
title: Amazing Experience With jbl Product
content: I have been using jbl earphone from last 3 year T210 , T200, .Got my c100s earphone today . the packaging was perfect and delivered on time . I got in rs 650 , good noise cancellation good bass also sound clarity is very crystal clear . The product is very good at this prize range . five star from my side. Love you JBL.

name: shubham vasudeva
title: Worst product.. do not go on reviews.. mostly are fake!!!!
content: Worst product. Don't ever buy it... Isse better 100 rs vale le lo.. no quality at all.. Left side stop working after 15 days... They do not provide warranty as they know how cheap qaulity product they are using that will definately stop working after some time.. Go for any local brand but never go for this useless product.

name: Nandagopal
title: This earhone is not working within twomonths.
content: I brought jbl c100si this model earphone on 10/06/2019 now oneside is not working I am having one year warranty so I want to replace this one.can u take my compalint and do something soon.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome product
content: Sound clarity is awesome .... If you compare boat bassheads and this(jbl c100si) than main difference b/w these two is :Boat is good for see movies with very good sound with awesome noise cancelling.. Bass is extra... . But in jbl sound clarity with very detailed sound can be hear. You can hear a single tone of playback instrument.. Balance and effective deep bass

name: Rajdeep
title: Disappointed
content: The sound coming through one of the earplugs has become very very low even on full volume. It's been only 6 months.. This was my first JBL earphone. Was very happy with the Sennheiser ones before.shouldnt have changed. Update: Same problem with my brother's earphones JBL . We had bought it 2 months apart.

name: Alzamil
title: Ergonomic, Nice Sound, Mediocre Noise Reduction
content: Pros- 1) Depth of sound effects. 2) Tilted earpiece design enhances durability.. 3) Responsive Button. 4) Looks cool. Cons: 1) only one button control. 2) Noise reduction is erratic, Good for some songs, not so for some.. I ll edit this if any defect may rise*

name: Shubham Gunnal
title: JBL is JBL...Go for it.... Simply Awesome
content: I ordered two earphones JBL c100si(549) and Boult audio x1(324).. These both Earphones are just Amazing and Perfect.. JBL is better in Sound Quality and Bass is perfect.. Boult have little lesser Sound quality but far better for the price range and Bass is more than JBL.. Built quality perfect in both...No complains at all...

name: BHANU
title: Sound quality is super , but the major issue is build quality,
content: Sound quality is super , but the major issue is build quality, wire quality so cheap , wire broke in 30 days so this product not worth this price point . if u want long durability so try sony,.

name: Sujay jalmi
title: Not good
content: 2 stars just because its working, Poor sound quality, slim cord i don't know how long it will last, (my previous Samsung earphone was better than this and i used it for almost 2years), this jbl product is made in China ü§êüòñüòñ and it's expensive,I think it's not original

name: Nandani
title: Nice one.
content: Issue find out after 1 month with mic during call, but very rare you will find this issue in jbl i have another one its working awesome. Voice is little bit not clr during call what i got review from my frends, may be its not supporting my phn. Over all nice experience with Jbl.

name: Kishor
title: Good Product
content: I like it and have been using it for now almost 3 and half years.. The bass is satisfactory and the quality as well... Thank you. KISHOR DASS

name: rahul kumar gupta
title: Sasta Nasha
content: If you want for music buy it but looking for a gaming earphone dont go for this drum of this earphone dont give sound of vehicle when its coming and all time give sound of when when it is not nearby. Little confusion for gaming. For music it is best at this price range. üîîüîîDon't go for 200SI it is waste of money.

name: sanjeev s.
title: Wasted my money
content: I wish I could give its durability 0 stars stopped working after 9 months.Well the earphones were good while they lasted but if they are going to become faulty after such a little time then it's best not to buy them. I tried but could not claim the warranty I would suggest to buy them from a a electronics store instead of buying them online because they do take responsibility.

name: Omkar Jain
title: Average Sound Quality
content: I wasn't expecting it to be this bad. It is just an average in sound quality. I would not recommend anyone who wants an above average experience. They are okay for everyday use, but for good music experience, they are not the right choice.

name: dhananjay k.
title: best sound but issue with microphone button control
content: using these earphones from last one month....clear n crispyüëçüëåsound delivered....but problem is only with button on microphoneüëé. It delays 2-4 second(sometimes more) for answering call, playing next track of music n pausing the same and no control for playing previous track as said....üëén we can't expect better build quality from JBL in this price range

name: Lokesh Bhagwat
title: Poor material quality of JBL HEADPHONE
content: Poor material quality, started to fault in working properly. I thought JBL quality would be good but the unit I got changed my perception, if I got a duplicate from amazon then it is different thing. Disappointed with quality of the JBL headphone quality. It‚Äôs receiving button not working now, return window is also closed so I can‚Äôt even return it now.. If Amazon people really read the reviews then kindly suggest what do with this faulty headphone

name: KRUPAKAR
title: Not worth it
content: Stopped working after 2 months.. hissing noise in one ear phone.. and after few weeks.. totally stopped working. Design on audio jack not suitable for mobile phone, as the audio jack is a straight pin you always have to hold mobile in the hand while having video group calls .

name: Phani Deepak
title: Not upto the Mark
content: Not upto the Mark. Sound quality is Okay. Bass can be far better. Look wise really bad and feels like cheap quality. Wire is not strong at all and ruff and tuff users will get a problem in a months time. Did not expect this from JBL. I was using Boat earphones before this and the built quality of them is too good and durable. Bass is also good in Boat. Sound clarity is good in JBL comparing to Boat. Overall Okay

name: Manish Mishra
title: Left plug stopped working within a year
content: Do not buy this product, if you are going by the brand name or if you want a product to last atleast a year, you will be highly disappointed. The left plug stopped working and it is not even a year, going by the comments of other victims of this product, it looks like the warranty is of no use. Any suggestions on how to avail the warranty?

name: Customer
title: Good quality product for basic uegae
content: Good quality, clear sound...like the product..maybe noise cancelling ratio could be better...not sure if we can expect this at this price range...

name: Muthu kumaran
title: My review after used for 1.5 years
content: Well this item is a best one with this price range. It worked well until before 6 days. Right side of the earphone not working after it worked for more than 1 year. Its sad to conclude in that way. But i hoped to last for at least 3 years with the JBL name in its back but overall it's a good choice .

name: MADHUR MISHRA
title: Value for money. Nice Bass
content: Overall a value for money product. I really like the bass and sound quality on it. Personally I find bass on these even more premium than my other headphones which are OnePlus-Z wireless buds(which cost 2k) and Senheiser CX275S(which cost 1800).. I got these at 600 Rs in daily deals

name: Prasad
title: Only Bass...Compromised Music experience
content: JBL C100 earplugs. 1. Bass is good but Bass is not the only factor to enjoy songs and music. 2. Bass is suppressing tiny beats of music. 3. Portronics Conch earplugs is far better. Good for Bass Lover but below average for those who love to enjoy every bit of music

name: Saravanan RR
title: Good build and nice sound quality but expensive
content: Good quality product and this is the repurchase. Accidentally i forgot the headset in the trousers pocket and washed in washing machine. I remember only after dried out the trouser. Amazingly no problem with the performance and no damages at all for the earlier purchased one.

name: KR
title: Go for a better JBL model
content: I have been using JBL for many years. My last JBL earphones stopped working so I bought a pair of these, a lower price model. The wires are flimsy plus lose connection in one of them. Not happy with this one.

name: Rajat Gupta RG
title: Not Durable
content: Sound quality is no doubt good but the biggest problem with JBL is their products are not at all durable. They are destined to be not working within a year or just after end of warranty period.

name: Shrey
title: Honest review after using 8 hours a day from many days
content: For basic day to day office work on calls it's the best earphones and talking about sound and base anyone who has not used Sennheiser and Bose will be delighted but Sennheiser is premium sound this can't match in sound but yes bass is definitely 5 out of 5

name: Bruce wayne
title: Please read!!!
content: I bought them with my savings , in 20 dec 2019 , one year phone stopped working today on 19 April 2019 , I thought buying a branded one would be better so it will last long, even lockdown is going on, so disappointed from jbl , I thought these brands never fail but they failed my expectations. So dissatisfied üò£üò£ I don't know why I am so unlucky every time üòî

name: sharad
title: value for money
content: must buy. at this price range, it's really a great deal. not that much performing great in sound quality, but comparing to price it's great.

name: Kushagra Joshi
title: Awsome
content: Dislikes?? I dont guess i have any bought this 5 months before and i have been taken these everywhere i go.... Nice sound cancellation... Audio preciesion is up top bass is a little bit low but dont mitake this statement for NO BASS bass is there but a little weak.... Before this ptoduct i used to buy earphones every month.... But i have dis for so long

name: rajat
title: good for the price
content: the earphones are really good for the price range i wourldnt say they are the best but if you are looking in this budget range then look no more this is it, really does the job well, havent faced a problem yet'

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product quality not good
content: Request the seller to send the product fresh one please as the manufacturing date is very old I. The product it is been 1 year old and product is not good as well so send the fresh one I have ordered the replacement.. kindly do the needful ASAP...

name: Jazz Dorson
title: Faulty within 2 months...no warranty
content: The earphone stopped working after 2 months and the warranty this company give is fake which only covers physical defects...shame..

name: Prabal Tripathi
title: Best Earphone under 1k
content: Go for it.... Pros:-. 1.Amazing Bass pleasing to ears. 2.Treble is great, you can hear every string of a guitar clearly. 3.The balance of clarity and bass proves to be precise, and gives an all round pleasing experience.. 4. Better than the competition of boat, sony, and other earphones having mic at the given price bracket.. .. The only con was that the quality of the wire is good but it's not very durable if used roughly.

name: SUMAN K.
title: Cheating the customer.
content: I have used 2 jbl earphones C100IS , both got damaged in the same way. One bud is not working. This condition is faced just 2 days after the warranty period is over. I won't recommend to buy jbl earphones if wants long lasting.

name: Yuvraj Verma
title: Amazed With JBL
content: Clarity Of Voice Is Just amazing, Competition To other Earphones in this Range . Just a Single Improvement needed Which is Bass ,. Quality is Also Pretty Good And Extra Buds Are also In the Box Which Makes us Easy To use This for Any Kind Of ears .

name: Saumya Shukla
title: Best
content: Just one word - best. I was die hard skull candy buyer. I just gave it a try and donot regret it. Maybe price is high as compared to others. But its durable, different size of earbuds, good bass and one of the best noise cancellation. So overall 5/5.

name: Mahesh Mundhe
title: Worst product in case of durability
content: After exact 1 year of use one earpiece and mic is stopped working just after 4 days of warranty period over. Its too bad to have product like this which are not durable. Please don't go for this product as this is not durable I think they made it with precision of 1 year life.... This may be helpful for one who looking for this product

name: Ayushman Yadav
title: PRODUCT WAS GOOD
content: I WAS LOOKING FOR THE EARPHONE UNDER 600 I GOT THESE EARPHONE AT 550 PRICE WITH EXTRA 100 RUPEE CASHBACK IN SALE ,, I NEED HIGH BASS SO I CHOOSE THESE AND I M HAPPY THAT I PURCHASE JBL CS100 EARPHONE , FOR SOUND QUALITY I WILL GIVE 4 STARS. FOR BASS 5 STARS. FOR SELLER I WILL GIVE 4 STARS for good packaging

name: Thirupathi Kumara Raja
title: Best earphone I ever had in my life.
content: More than three years of usage, I am writing this review!!!. At this price, you may not get anything with such quality (Both sound as well as the material). I recommended this to several of my friends and they too purchased from amazon.. As usual genuine packing and sharp time delivery by the amazon.

name: Ashish Kumar
title: manufacturing origin India v/s China
content: It was supposed to be made in India as there is written over there i.e. manufacturing : india.. But i got this made in china. Why? Someone in comment box has the same problem as mine. I think they do it deliberately.. If i talk about the earohone, build quality 4.4/5. Sound quality 3.5/5. Base 4.2/5. I got it for 600INR

name: Ashish Meher
title: As usual one side problem
content: After 14 months of using this, one side stopped working.. most of JBL earphones have similar problems.. I have 3 earphones from JBL, non is working properly..can't go with JBL anymore.. wasting of money..

name: Honest review
title: Nice sound quality
content: These are great. But if you have small ears, chances are the earphones will pop out while u r listening to music. They do come with extra ear buds so yeah, adjust for yourself. The rest is nice, and JBL is trustworthy.

name: MomOf4
title: Not worth it.
content: Not worth it.. Bass - 0. Noise cancellation - 0. Sound quality - 0. Durability - Both sides not working within 6 months usage.. Only looks good to see.

name: Nani
title: Greatest One
content: I bought this for the third time,. I always lost these earphones, one time it was stolen, one time mouses in my home ate one wire, one time i lost that while travelling. I am buying this again.. understand the confidence man.....

name: Nikhar Sachdeva
title: Good earphones. Durable, considering the price.
content: Go for it.Using it for 2 years. Purchased at around 600.Sound quality is good. Even after using for the long time,it doesn't hurt the ears. After 2 years,now I'm seeing some problems in the right earpiece.And also the quality and volume decayed with time. Purchased it again.

name: LAKSH PUNJABI
title: Perfect for everything JBL is ‚ô•Ô∏è
content: Its sound is perfect for everything as I prefer gaming earphone and this can be considerd one of the best gaming earphone as it has a high bass which allows users to hear the footsteps of the opponent while gaming. Look are very good. There is an adjuster given with it. Extra earbuds given

name: Bharat kuwar
title: Got fault product replacement
content: Packaging and Product was good, however the Jack was loose and same was not working during the call. Sound quality as per price was good. Cant expect more..!! Since there was a issue with product, I had put replacement request. Got the replaced product and it's working wonderful.!!

name: Vidit K.
title: Best Sound Quality
content: An excellent product by JBl which has the best sound quality for the price(‚Çπ599 during the sale) but has OK bass.. Design and material- 4/5. Sound quality/clarity- 5/5. Worth the price- 5/5. Bass - 4/5. If u are looking for a high bass earphones then not recommended but if u want high class sound with great vocals then definitely go for it.. Overall - 4/5

name: Paul Panmei
title: The best
content: The best headphone for this price range. This is awesome...but I order this along with bluetooth earphone (refurbished) for 53% off which I got is the lowest standard of quality. The base was completely missing. I'm little confused but dont teust refurbished product. Whoever is dealing with renewed product, they are trying to cheat amazon customers.

name: Arch
title: Quite good. Jbl doesn‚Äôt disappoint
content: Bought this for calls, and does its job well. Have had this for a long time now, and still works well. Noise cancellation is decent. Doesn‚Äôt get painful even after a couple of hours of continuous use ( which is quite something because I usually cannot use in-ear types for more than half an hour at a stretch )

name: Yogendra
title: listen
content: earphone is awesum. material quality super. durable and xcelnt sound quality.. BUT... IT ALL DEPEND ON YOUR TASTE OF MUSIC.. if u like crisp music. want to listen each and every beat. then JUST GO FOR IT.. AND IF U LIKE MXED KIND OF MUSIC. AND DONT LIKE CRISP BEATS. JUST WANT A MIXED EFFECT OF VOCAL AND INSTRUMENT ....then its not for uüòê

name: Sudeep Sagar
content: Works for me in all the ways I need it to, for the price I've paid. From the Sound quality, microphone to the noise cancellation (it's not an active noise cancellation earphone of course, I am talking about the In - Ear fit).

name: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect for bass loversüòç
content: product sound quality is amazing and better than boat 225 earphones. It really gives extra bass,but the cable seems veri delicate,they should make it little thick and flat. overall product is good.

name: Rahul
title: Don't go for this earphone. Instead purchase Sennheiser CX180
content: I purchased this product last year and the left earbud stopped working within 2 months. I complained and got to know that they have only 1 service centre in Bangalore and the cost of travelling there is more the price of this earphone. :P Avoid buying this one. It won't last long.

name: Atharva Naik
title: Not Durable
content: It‚Äôs beeen 5 months m using these headphones at first they were awesome the sound quality noise cancellation all were amazing but now my left earbud has stopped working idk y and at first I thought it‚Äôs jbl so it‚Äôs just good but no I was wrong now I won‚Äôt take a single product from jbl now actually instead of jbl boAt is good.....even customers can look for senheiser,AKG,Sony,Philips,Skullcandy, but not JBL

name: Francis
title: Headset Feedback
content: Sound Clarity:Nobody can beat JBL in terms of Sound, it's excellent. 5 out of 5!. Material: When you touch it you feel like it's an ordinary headset not the branded stuff. 4 out of 5!. Durability: It's been 3 weeks, I am using it and working perfectly find. I wish it could live long. I can't give anything now, let's hope for 5 out of 5!

name: Shinoj Gopala Krishnan
title: Average earphone. Buds hurt ear.
content: Sound quality is average. Bass is low and sounds tinny. It hurts the ear, the material used on the buds is not in soft enough. You cannot wear it too long.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Microphones
content: Worst Earphone. Microphone is not working even I didn‚Äôt get the extra earbuds it‚Äôs look like a cheap quality product even I m not happy with the sound quality. Not proper fitting earphones worst service by Amazon plus Harman should work on this highs is too much Sound quality is OKAY I was thinking more from JBL anyways worst experience with this product bad service amazon!!!

name: Gaurav Dutt Misra
title: Not worth it
content: Only works well till 60 % volume ,turning up volume after that makes the sound too distorted and its painful to listen.. Base is ok .. But may want to spend some extra bucks to get a decent earphone for long term.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: Durable ....comes with three size earbuds...Good noise cancellation ....comfortable....lack L shape do can not use comfortable while testing good quality sound but ..not better than skullcandy or sunheizr of this price range...otherwise a good product..base is ok ok ...

name: marutendra
title: APPEARENCE- AMAZING SOUND QUALITY- AWESOME IN THIS PRICE RANGE BASS- JUST ...
content: NAME JBL itself is complete and needs no reviews but let me try .. APPEARENCE- AMAZING. SOUND QUALITY- AWESOME IN THIS PRICE RANGE. BASS- JUST PLAY ANY REMIX SONG REVIEW WILL COME OUT YOUR MOUTH NEXT MOMENT .. bought for my sister and she loved it micriphone is also very gud.

name: Rohit B.
title: Stopped working within a month
content: This is my 3rd JBL ear phones which stopped working within one month of purchase. One side of the ear phones stops working. Now I have 3 pairs of ear phones which functions only on one side:( Even though the sound quality is good, the product is not durable.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money.
content: Best in this price range. Good quality sound. I was using an mi headfone before, when compared to that this one is much much better. Not sure about the durability. Headfone wire is too narrow.. Update: mic volume seems to be low some times!

name: Keerthi
title: Average
content: Jbl headphones I tried for the past three. times... Every 5 months once you supposed to order new one. 1st time when it troubled, I thought it's because of my usage of the product. Even second time I thought the same.. but not anymore more... max to max 5 months you can use it.. Price is also not justifiable for the quality...

name: Chetan
title: Bad Product quality
content: You expect these earphones to stay with you for atleast a year! I bought this earphone and within 6 months it's left side of earphone was not working. So i got it replaced.. After around another 6 months right side of the earphone was not working. Since they don't have warranty for the replaced product, I was left with nothing!

name: shadab
title: Worst Service- No warranty for the product
content: JBL service is worst, I had bought the earphone and within months it got defected. MIC stopped working and there is no one to listen to your complain. So please be careful if u are ordering the jbl earphone as they don't have much service center and you can't replace your earphone by courier, doesn't matter whethr they are under warranty and not

name: Sandeep
title: Review for JBL C100si
content: Pros:. Build quality: 8. Sound quality: 7.5. Durability: 7. Overall worth of money for purchase. Cons:. 1 thing I need to say after 6 months I can't able to hear from my 1 side. I've replaced for that

name: Cheedella seetha Sahithi
title: REPLACEMENT ON  WARRANTY
content: After I bought the ear phones earlier it's sound quality ,bass quality were good but later they started decreasing.within 60 days the right side one is dead.now really I want to get it replaced by new set of jbl earphones

name: Tanay bihani
title: Nice headphones
content: I would had given 5 starts if it lasted more long. Best headphones by jbl. Used it for a year. Then one bud got defective. Sound didn't came from it. But till I used it... It was very good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good quality of materials used but poor bass
content: The product physically feels good, but the sound quality especially the bass is not upto par with others especially at this price range. After using Sennheiser CX 180 I feel that had better bass than this. Also the packaging was pretty flimsy.

name: Mohit Vashisht
title: Best quality earphones
content: I have been using these for a year now, I decide to write a review beacuse these earphones are just amazing. I have used JBL headphones and boat wireless earphone, these one are my favorite even though they are wired. Its base quality is superior to all devices that I have. I feel very unpleasant not to rate them yet. Just go for it.

name: Ann
title: No durability
content: It's been just over 3 months and the right earpiece has stopped working. There's no sign of the wire getting damaged, the right earpiece has suddenly just gone silent.. I don't know how to cash in the warranty but I'd really say this isn't worth the money, even if the sound quality is good. Because there's no durability.

name: Rongon Kumar Phukan
title: Don't buy it if you want it to last.
content: Not at all a great product. When you hear JBL all good thoughts come to your mind. But that isn't the case with this earphones. This will disappoint you. Bought it last September. Its august now still 1 month to go for it to be one year old and the right ear doesn't work anymore. Tested it on various devices, won't even give me the hope to work.

name: Krishna
title: lifetime is around one year
content: I ordered this product on 2 February 2017. It worked for around one year and had a problem with one ear. Then I brought the same product on 25 April 2018, it also has one ear problem after one and a half years. Same this happens with my friends also.. Sound quality, noise cancellation is good.

name: Pulkit
title: Go for it!
content: Don't think twice it is better than other headphones in this price segment and delivers a rich amount of bass, mids, sharp treble with noise isolation as they are in ear type headphones!. Build quality is something that will last easily 1-2 year if used with a-bit care!. Mic does awesome job no issue in that!

name: Arbind
title: Mic doesn't works, got a defected piece.
content: Dear Amazon,. I got a defected piece, please do the needful if you can, i ordered this from my home town (Mohali, Punjab, India) but now i have shifted to Delhi (India), so i am not sure what you can do but i got an email for the feedback so i just shared. Thank you.. Regards,

name: Mayank Saxena
title: Good Option for a Budget Earphones
content: I purchased these earphones just because of a "JBL Brand" & a microphone provided.. Sound quality is good, Vocals are clear but don't expect any extra bass.. I bought it for Rs. 699 & within a month price dropped to Rs. 549. I was pretty disappointed because of this.

name: Anindya
title: Average, sub-standard earphones
content: Comparing this to other earphones and headphones I have, these are nothing great. The sound quality while listening to music has low clarity, sharpness and bass-amplification is nothing great.. Not worth the price-point.

name: Nitesh Kumar Pandey
title: Impressive sound with excellent noise cancellation technique.
content: As mentioned, undoubtedly the noise cancellation is awesome and sound is impressive too along with the bass. But those who seek especially bass in music like me, will find a room of enhancement for the bass. Overall the bass quality is impressive too comparatively in the segment, but still it could have been enhanced little more.

name: vivek
title: Rough & Tough
content: 1) Awesome sound quality as expected from JBL.. 2) I am the kind of guy who break earphones only in a month or 2, but this thing is insane. I lost the count that how many times I accidentally pull the wire, sit on my earphones, bend the wire from where it is attached to my phone or lapi, still this thing is good as new.

name: Sachin
title: Good product
content: The base and sound clarity is good. I even use it in office for Skype calls, everything is crystal clear be it my sound or the guy speaking on the other side.

name: Mahima
title: Worth the price, hands down! (‚Çπ699)
content: Go for the expensive bluetooth earphones only if you want the Bluetooth technology that bad because the sound quality won't be any better than the wired ones, especially the poor bass. Go for the mid-range wired earphones like this one which give you a better sound quality. Basically, consider your use-cases before you go for the Bluetooth ones

name: vinoth
title: Unsatisfied
content: JBL is losing it's quality. I was a JBL user for too long. But they are comprising quality for the price nowadays. Recently tried BoAt headphones from a friend and realised I could get better product for the same price. Hope JBL come up with better product.

name: Abhishek R.
title: Very bad jack fitting
content: Audio is good but jack is very bad, loosely attached with my samsung m30s. Can not use mic on it.. also audio stops with slightest of movement.. cant return as box got damaged!

name: Paya
title: Durable with excellent sound quality
content: I am not an expert on sound quality but am writing this review after a year of buying a pair of these. None of them have shown any sign of wearing out and no short circuits of any kind. They both are working the same way as the day we bought them.

name: Goldie Verma
title: Good
content: Sound is too good.. But not for voice calling as the mic placement is like everytime you want to say something the aor will say something first... I. E.. Other person will listen air sound more than ur voice

name: GouravAdwant
title: Great In-ear earphones at this price
content: After having used Ur beats for more than 2 years, I wanted earphones that didn't burn the pocket and sounded good. One of my friends who had this suggested I buy this, and boy these earphones sound great. At this price, I would just say go for it without a second thought.

name: Gupta Devatha
title: Greate earphone
content: I‚Äôm using it from last 2 months and it works fine. Greate experience with JBL. I Didn't even knew my favourite songs contained the bass and the beats within them until I heard it using this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Just wasted of money
content: It's just a worst kind of earphone, which I have never experienced. Sound quality-0 out of 10. And I can only suggest to those one of you who has intented to buy this this earphone.not to buy this earphone for save monetary loss

name: Jai Mathur
title: Not for Bass Lovers
content: Sound quality is fine. Can't hear music on full volume because distortion happens. Anyways full volume is too loud so it's fine to hear on lower volume. Bass is not upto the level where other headphones have. So it is an average deal

name: Pooja
title: Flimsy product
content: The earphones are really fragile. Even though the sound quality and noise cancellation aspect of the product proves to be worth it, the quality of the overall product is quite low. The mic piece is of low quality plastic and it won't last long. The part of the wire connecting to the earbuds are way too fragile.

name: Ankit Chauhan
title: Right side earphone has less volume
content: One side of the earphone doesn't work properly, right side earphone has less volume than the left, no doubt that the sound quality is good but one side of the earphone doesn't work properly .. And maybe in future that the right side earphone didn't work .. Not expected this from the company like JBL

name: Y Nayak
title: Altimate budget head phone...
content: Best budget head phone at Price of 549/-. Best sound quality with good quality bass. Mids are also good, you can enjoy the vocals nicely. Lows are also clear. But the voice are not very clear it is ok. If you are looking for crystal clear voice during phone call it is not so, but to use as music listening it is the best Choice.

name: BUNNY P.
title: Paid 549, worth the price
content: It's JBL and I was expecting good sound quality. Paid 549 and just got the delivery. Immediately plugged it to my phone and was smiling within minutes. Good base though treble is high at full volume. At 75% you will love the output and bass. Quality of earphones is nice too.

name: Rajesh Rane
title: Awesome earphones, Value for money
content: Just awesome experience with these earphones, cheaper, branded and decent bass experience while listen. wire quality should be improved thats the only spoiler I am presently facing.

name: Prince Chandra
title: Great Headphone!!
content: Like - Sound quality is awesome. Bass & noise cancellation are also good. Due to Work from home situation, need to attend multiple call & meetings for official work. Perfect item for that.. Dislike - The quality of cable. I am not satisfied with that. Very thin, so must be handle with care.

name: Swaroop Pattanayak
title: No bass. Just simple sound with good material which would probably last long.
content: Returning after 1 day of usage. I felt little or no bass and the sound gave me irritation/headache.. I don't know about other reviews which I saw before buying this product, but for me I didn't like it. Material is good. Look is good. The sound ...just a normal one.

name: Jithin R Shenoy
title: A good headphone under ‚Çπ700 price tag !
content: Been using since 2017 close to 1 year and 7 months.. If you want a worthy one under ‚Çπ700 this is okay to go. Don't expect much.. User Alert : Fragile item !! Handle with care !. Yes. Had to buy a new one since this was no longer usable due to cable damage! So please take care !. Moved to Sennheiser CX 275S.

name: Nirvik
title: Best quality
content: I buyed it for 549rs. 'Made in china'üòÖbut the quality of the product is really awesome i tried mi ear phones for 499rs after the great indian sale is started i saw this product for 549rs actually it is 1400rs and i got it for 549rs

name: sanchana
title: Headsets review üåü
content: Sound stage was good, it has richest sound quality and the Bass quality was ok!. It has Angular in nature and it's perfectly fit s to the ear and it will block the sounds from the outside.. It has an integrated mic with single button.. The life is depends on how we used to handle it.

name: rajeshrao
title: Ok head phones, bad design good sound
content: * Sound quality is good balanced sound 8/10. * comfort 5/10 because of hard caps, iam not comfortable with even small caps. * Ok build quality 3/10 because of mic not loud enough, may be iam expecting too much. * If you r a rider (bike) please avoid because people may not able to listen you while you are driving. * Mike is far away need to hold while talking. * Overall 7/10 because of audio quality

name: Markus Mukhia
title: Expected real deep bass
content: Was using Apple wired earphone and since it got old and broken thought of replacing it with this after reading specifications. I assumed that It has real deep bass But It is not.. But for Rs. 499/- It's worth it. It is a strong one.

name: Sandip Sanyal
title: GOD of heavy BASS!
content: Well, u want bass? BUY it. It outperforms everyother on this front. But its not a Sennheiser (balanced and mellowed sound) neither treble heavy SONY.

name: Mukesh S
title: Great sound only compromised by the plastic casing of the mic.
content: the sound was great ..bass was wonderful mids and treble was good too...balanced sound throughout best for overall sound experince but the plastic casing of the mic broke immediatey as i opened the earphones ..but after fixing it maually it seemed to fall off more often ...it doesnt stick firm and falls off exposing the wire instead and i had apply some adhesive to make it stiff.wires are good fro price and they do get tangled a bit but easy ro remove and comfortable to use even after us of 2 - 3 hrs

name: Amazon Customer
title: Wrong item received
content: The order which I have received is wrong.There was no made in china tag in image but I received with made in china tag. I have raised return request through customer service for 3 times.But it was not successful for a single time.At last I prefer to use this duplicate headphones with made in china tag. Customer service support is not that much helpful for me.

name: Vinay Rawat
title: Good product
content: Worked well for a year. The lead that connects to the mobile port is not working, no problem with the headphone as such. Not working now but overall a good product.

name: Muni Krishna
title: Earphone good for six months
content: The earphone works great, however after 6 months the normal wear & tear makes it un-usable. my first earphone tore around mic, the current earphone after 9 months the wire bend around the Audio pin seems withered bit and right side ear phone doesn't work. Needs to improve the overall Quality

name: Vedant Kulkarni
title: JBL delivers quality.
content: JBL always delivers. In this price segment we cannot demand too many features like noise cancelation or bass and what not. I ordered it for my mom who needs it for regular usage of watching videos, calling and working.

name: Oldwine Rocks
title: Nice pick for the price
content: Overall this a nice product, built quality appeared to be good, sound is very nice but not awesome but remember the price. One special thing is noise cancellation is great.

name: Gaurav Sharma
title: Excellent sound quality awesome build quality
content: 1. Packaging good. 2. Made of premium quality plastic. 3. Very comfortable no pain in ears after using it for 2 hours. 4. Noise reduction is very good. 5. Bass is little less but trebble is quite good and very balanced voice.. 6. Very good branding.. 7. Mic available. Overall satisfied with the product...!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy this useless earphone
content: Don't buy the product. It is neither durable nor the sound quality is great. I had bought this product in March, 2020 and it's coating started to wear off after 6 months. Also, it's left earpiece stopped working after 7 months. Though it was under warranty period, yet they refused to accept it for replacement since the coating had worn off.

name: ≈§√ò√ô≈†√åF K√é√ëG
title: Best sound quality and bass Of this headphone
content: Oh no very very nice headphone jbl is the best product of sound quality and also Sony i don't know who won in sound quality both are best i didn't compare this jbl headphone of bass is powerful if yoy set this headphone perfectly in your ear so you understand the bass and sound quality always best of JBL company thank you JBL

name: Paridhi G
title: One of the headset peice is not working, poor voice quality too.
content: One of my earphone set of right side has stopped working. Its been a month or so that i have been using it but i think its on warranty kindly take useful steps for the following. also, the noise cancellation is poor for this model also, the bass quality. The voice keeps breakings along side and its elongated at many instances

name: Arijit Pramanik
title: Stopped working after 1 year of usage.
content: Headphone is no doubt good, but it stopped working after 1 year 4 months of usage. What can i find is that the jack is not working properly and left side can't release any sound from it. I bought 2 at a time, both of them have the same issues. Really disappointed and please anyone let me know if they can repair it.

name: Shekhar
title: Too much background noise
content: I bought it quite some time back and just started using it. When I want to hear music it's fine, not too good. But when I am on a call, there is just too much disturbance and so damn loud. I have tried with other done as well.. The disturbance is always there when I use this earphone. Wonder if it's some fake jbl!! Can't even return it now.. What a waste

name: Sriraj
title: Value for money product
content: An awesome pair of in ear headphones by JBL. The fit and finish is very good. The ear tips provided are very soft and doesn't give any kind of discomfort even if using over long period of time. Talking about sound quality it as expected by a JBL product clear highs and mids with punchy bass. Noise cancellation works like a charm.. Only con that I can come up would be the quality of the wire which normal rubber wire rather than braided though they do the work perfectly.

name: Kushagra Sharma
title: Durable
content: I have been using it for a year now. It works very well. It's a good product with mic and such good sound quality in so less price. I use it even when I'm sleeping. It's comfortable and durable.. Its base and sound quality are very nice. Comes with three buds of large, medium and small size. Fits perfectly.

name: Avinash Meher
title: Best in terms of sound quality also comes with multiple ear plugs.
content: Pros:. Probably the best buy for 800/- odd money.. Sound quality is better than most earphones at this price range.. Comes with multiple ear plugs is really useful.. Cons:. Build quality though could have been better,. the plastic that covers the point where the wire and Jack is connected ruptures over time.

name: Punit M
title: Two thumbs up, worthy.
content: Best headphone for your mobile phone under 600 Rs. Mightily impressed with sound quality especially bass reproduction. Inbuilt mic is ok. Great asset for your smartphone.

name: Nilanjan P.
title: Durable, Comfortable, Good Balance and Clarity!
content: I have been using this product for almost a year. The sound quality is very clear. There is a good balance between the clarity and the bass. At this price point, this is a good deal. Moreover, the wires are made for heavy usage. Even after a year's usage, they are in pristine quality. Recommended.

name: Jonija
title: Good product
content: I was looking for a product which is affordable price and a branded one so this product fits in this criteria and i must say that jbl brand is really good with it's product the sound quality is fantastic and it's a worth it product but matrial quality is not up to the mark as wire is with soft and thin but the ear buds are up to the point

name: Febz
title: Bad product.
content: The product which I brought isn't working properly. Before the 1 yr warranty the product become very bad and it doesn't have proper noise cancellation as well as the bass quality isn't that good. Very bad.. I'm really displeased with the Amazon's delivery on this product. I would never recommend any one to this product.

name: utkarsh
title: Extra treble
content: Its bass is good but there is extra treble which creates a noisy sound. However if mobile sound is low it doesn't creates such trouble but at max volume(for extra bass u have to max the volume) it becomes annoying die to such high treble.. P.s.- My friend plays Counter Strike and says it gives the best foot...

name: Vishwanath
title: One of the worst product from Jbl Amazon promoting such a worst product as ambassador.
content: From JBl one of the worst product, i have recieved order on 8 February 2019 within a month right side ear phone is not working. I am very unhappy with this product. New customers seriously don't buy this product.. Amazon has to refund or exchange this product immediately to mentain its reputation.. ?

name: Rakesh
title: Best sounding
content: Some say durability is a bummer since cable quality is not that great, I would say that's a better tradeoff for the sound quality u r getting, I have also used audio technica (not to forget) after them these are my next goto earphones

name: Shilpa Nair
title: Economical and effective
content: The life of the earphones is up to 1 year. It is a good purchase and fits comfortably in an acceptable price range. Definitely recommend this as a good buy.

name: Amazon Customer
title: JBL. Best in class
content: JBL, the name is enough.. BEST Sound Quality literally. There's no one better than in bass than JBL. I bought this headphone like a year back and still they are working fine. The quality is really fine even till date.. In this budget, the noise cancellation they give is amazing.

name: P Biswas
title: Clear sound but poor bass
content: Sound quality is is very clear. It enhances the trible notes , bass is not good. To watch movies we know the bass is required to be good.overall voice call quality is good. Bass is poor.

name: Kushi
title: My favorite headset
content: This has good sound quality. It fits perfectly into ears. Bass is not that great. Wire gets entangled very easily. With rough usage, it lasts for a year, post that due to frequent entanglement, one of the ear stopped working.

name: Shahrukh
title: Almost good enough
content: This is my second time purchasing these headphones. It's sound quality is good but product looks like it was manufactured long ago and had been in warehouse for a long time

name: Rushikesh Ambulgekar
title: Value for Money
content: I have been using this Earphone for more than 10 Months now. It is a good product for budges users.If you are looking for a Earphone around 650-700 go for it.. Sound quality and bass Quality is Okay, you can not expect more from 700 RS BTW i got it for Rs.649.. In future i will not buy it if it is again made in china.

name: NITYANANDA PATRA
title: Built quality... giving a premium attitude...
