content: After using almost 2 years, i completely forgot when i thought to buy a earphone between this 2 years. It is very helpful when you are travelling in a bus or train or other crowded vehicle. If you just put on this earphone, it block almost 50-60% noise and the sound quality of it is just aswam...

name: Edwin
title: Wonderful product!!!
content: The headset is of superb quality... It gives a comfortable wear and it feels good too... The bass and sound quality is impeccable... The noise cancellation is only because of the ear canal by the ear plug-ins which just reduce a bit of sound.... The single button for playing yhe last sing foes not work for some music streaming services like spotify.....

name: R.GOPIKRISHNA
title: Don't expect more than a year..
content: Sound everything in perfect meter.. just the wire may broke at the edge.. quality should improve... Mic ,sound, everything good apart from build

name: Goutam Mondal
title: Poor Sound Quality - Not Worth of Money
content: This is a very poor quality headphone, sound is as poor as Rs. 100 local headphone.. I bought by seeing JBL band and some good reviews. However those reviews was either paid or fake.. We can get far better headphone with half of the price in Chandi Market (it's made in China).. Only positive thing is Warranty.

name: Shubham Sinha
title: Poor build quality
content: Sound quality and bass quality is really gud ....but the main problem with the earphone is the build quality which is poor...the wire is made up of rubber....it has been almost an year after I purchased it but the wire has got cuts everywhere ...overall the sound quality is appreciatable but the build quality is very bad

name: S.Bhattacharjee
title: OVERPRICED!
content: For its price, it is heavily overpriced. Not the best sound quality.no passive noise cancellation whatsoever even after trying all the available earbuds. Mic had issues. One of the worst build quality. For the improvement in sound quality over its competitors, the lack of built is not justified at all. Wouldn't recommend.

name: pushkar anand
title: Durability @1 year
content: Previously also I bought JBl Earphone and it worked fine till 1 year. I think at this budget if your earphone works properly for an year it definitely deserves 5 star. That's y this time also I bought JBL earphone. It's been 3 months now and it's working fine. Also the sound quality is great.

name: Swapnil S.
title: Cheap and meets my needs
content: I was looking for a cheap branded earphone and it is working perfectly with my Redmi Note 5 Pro. No issues.. Edit: After just over a year the left end stopped working. So reduced my 5 star rating to 2. Better quality products are expected from JBL.

name: Arul R.
title: Good product. Pathetic packaging. Check pics
content: This is my second pair of JBL earphones (additional). Buying them as I liked the ones I owned previously. Good product.. The packaging was horrendous. Very bad. All banged up.. Please.check pictures I have uploaded, for details.. Quite disappointed with amazon for this particular product

name: sagar uparkar
title: Value for money
content: Material quality was good and intact. Sound quality as preferable, but noise is bit low as well as no volume control, but still worth it. So far so good, no idea about near future so given 3 stars for durability.

name: Akash
title: Works Great
content: Just what you expect. I have been using it for nearly 2 yrs and it's still alive and well, just had to use sellotape to prevent the cord and jack junction.

name: bibin baby
title: Waster service from JBL india
content: My headphone was dead after 10 month and i had send to Harmon service center in Delhi to replace (JBL support India) after 4 month i didn't get my product all the time customercare team said still processing. Guys don't by This waste product. Same time i had purchased Skullcandy the same issue happed. But within 20 days they replaced the product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best choice for a long run!
content: Have been using this earphones since 2017... One of the best earphones I have ever used! I have used skull candy, Sony, Philips and Various brands before .. though they all seemed to work fine in the beginning.... Somehow ended up in some problem but this one is the best if you are looking for a earphone that would come for a long run!

name: Anil K.
title: Go for a better option than this as it stopped working within 8 months.
content: Please don't buy this product. Second time it has work out. One side of the earphone stopped working completely. Better buy some other product at 700 around u can find better one.

name: Santosh Thiyagarajan
title: Best for Regular use.
content: It's a good earphone for regular use. I had been using this for 3 year now. Brought it again as my old one got damaged.will recommend this to people who want a earphone for regular use.

name: Gaurav
title: Good earphones but No Bass
content: Satisfactory in-ear headphones.. It's has extra deep TREBLE due to which BASS effect gets cancelled or cannot be felt.. Overall good product. Not suitable for Bass lovers.

name: Oshin
title: Not at all durable.
content: I bought it in mid jan this year n now its not working... left one is already not working and the right one is already on the verge of not sounding at all... i kept it so carefully then also .. no use of buying such products from here.

name: Amit kumar
title: Not worth it.
content: Sound and noise cancellation works fine. Bass and quality of sound is great. I have purchased third time this earphone and eveytime it lacks buit quilt , Everytime wire will got broke from the bottom part,. After ward things won't go alright.. I preferred it because of sound only but built quilty is poor I will say.

name: Nilesh
title: loveeee this.............
content: while thinking of buying an earpiece.. then go this worth buying.. I purchased at a discounted rate but feel worthy after having them.

name: biswajit
title: Awesome product must buy
content: I got this at the cost of 500. Delivery was super fast. It's just awesome product must buy if you looking for a good hearphone must go for it.

name: Ajith S K
title: Most durable earphones
content: I re-ordered this product after 1.5 years again because old one I accidentally washed in washing machine, still the headphone working but microphone got damaged. The product durability is extremely good. I keep everyday in pocket and still didn't got damaged.

name: Arnab
title: Nice on sound but low on the built.
content: I was looking for an earphone on budget so I rounded up on this one. Sound quality is reasonable but I must say that the built quality is very poor. I somehow pulled the wire and that was it. It tore is not usable for now.

name: Jeshani
title: Very Disappointing
content: Definitely not what I expected. Sound quality is Not that Great .The product design as such hurts the ear after long hours of use.. An ok Product for the price band.. I was using Samsung ear phones and that was worth better even at higher price band and sound quality was very good.. Very Disappointing...

name: Alam Damodar
title: Excellent sound but Bad build quality
content: I love the sound signature of JBL...It's damn crisp..But the only problem with these earphones r the wire tends to damage within 6 months..So,be careful while using and carrying..

name: TIPSY WADHAWA
title: Great but deteriorated
content: The product, at first, was extremely nice. I was very happy with it. However, after a few uses, the sound quality of the earphones deteriorated and now the volume of both the earphones is extremely low. With the 1 year warranty it offers, I would like a replacement of the product.

name: Mukesh kumar
title: Not long lasting- used two pair of same model
content: Sound quality and bass was good with this price range, but the cord was too thin and can be damage easily... One more thing, left side of speaker stopped working within 7-8 months for both my CS100SI.. Do check service center in your area because it doesn't have it in all cities

name: Amazon Customer
title: Try it yourself.
content: Honestly expected a bit more from JBL company but still these headphones are amazing. I was in a notion of getting this thing I know what more can you expect from the price but the JBL has always been delievering the products at good prices affordabke for the customers with good quality product. So, JBL uh are amazing.

name: Akshay Pal
title: Awesome Sound at Awesome price
content: JBL needs no introduction, this earphones sound signature is extremely good according to price point. Must buy ear phones it gives competition to some higher end ear phones like Senheiser.

name: Jeevan Lal
title: Amazing.
content: Perfect Working on my PC and mobile phone. Base and build quality is best.

name: Lone Abrar
title: Worst and cheap wire used
content: 3 same JBL earphones were purchased by me & my other 2 friends, .The one remained for 5 months & other two lesser than that. The wire used is tottaly unacceptable ,All our 3earphones have same defect of the wire loose near the insering pin. Got cheated on this guaranteed product that they claim. "Biggeer The Names Bigger The Scams"

name: Students
title: Student
content: For me the sound quality is good but after all its JBL then it has to be great. The earphones has bass in it. I bought earphones in 550/-. Don't buy if it is above the price range because it is not that much good. If you have to buy earphones go buy Panasonic TC earphones it is best in the rang upto 800/-.. The material is very cheap. The wire will be break easily if there will be some pressure

name: vanshika a.
title: Yes
content: I personally am not a fan of materail quality as having them for like an hour gives me some serious ache, but overall this is a treat at this price! And literally the sound quality is the best. Wish they could do something about those rubber plugs!

name: Harry
title: 1.4 year of using. Base and clearty Prity awesome
content: Very nice quality and delivered before time. If you want to buy this you will get a great experience of music ever... Base and clearty are Prity awesome.... Go for it,. Today it's 1 year and 4 months almost still having best experience of music and calls as well as pubji üòãüòÇ. No complaint. You have to keep it safe from the kids and petsüòÅüòé.

name: Author
title: Ok product
content: It is ok ok product, in my opinion my Sony earphone(which comes with mobile) is better, even Samsung is also better than this one, but the sound clarity, fitting is excellent but if you are a bass lover then I don't think this is for you. ALL the views are personal.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Earphone
content: This earphone is good but its wire started getting crack near jack within 6 months and this is not only with this one I have brought same earphone 2-3 times and every time its wire gets crack near jack. other then durability sound quality, bass and everything with this earphone is very good.

name: Saxon Vincent
title: One of the best in this price range.
content: Very comfortable in ear. Sound quality is neutral. Not suitable for bassheads. Durability is somewhat disappointing, tends to easily break, so no rough use.

name: Shrinivas
title: Beautiful sound, and some cons too
content: As always, beautiful sound from JBL!! It plays both high and low frequencies (bass) to perfection! But this product doesn't look like it will last for long especially because it's not flatwire. Otherwise also, it's seems fragile (probably because I'm a flat wire user)

name: Santhosh
title: Useful review
content: This is amazing haedset I have found at this rate even I have compared to boat and Philips headset but anyone can't beat this headset. Usage review : used for last 6 month sound quality is still Amazing and durability is well.....there is still minor can't be seen

name: Harshad Bile
title: Don‚Äôt buy it.Not worth it
content: The hearing quality is good but person on other side can‚Äôt hear until the microphone is close to the mouth. Not worth the money to be invested

name: VIPUL KOTHARI
title: Good
content: Good sound but the cost Rs. 649 does not justify same as Mi ear phone which has cost Rs.399.. If we are paying just double to listen a great music. I Am not satisfied.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Earphones stopped working after 2 months
content: The earphones are fine for the price, but the customer care is pathetic. They said I have to go to service center and give them for replacement.i don't have any service centers near me. They won't replace by courier service. My earphones right ear stoped working after 2months. Maybe it's just that I got the unfortunate defective model. Oh well gg

name: Astik
title: It's good at low volumes but at high volumes the sound cracks.
content: The head phones are pretty good at low to medium volumes. But when the volume is raised beyond the medium range, the sound cracks and the song is not so nice anymore. It's perfect for listning to speeches or documentaries but not so ideal for music.. The body is durable and of good quality. So, overall it's 3 star worthy.

name: rosh
title: Looks cheap, sounds fantastic!!
content: Overall sound quality: 4.5. Vocals :5. Instruments: 4. Bass : 4 (PS wear right rubber tips for your ears). Fit: 5 (comfortable). Look : 4 (red). Built: 4 (all plastic, light weight)

name: nyla
title: Good headphones
content: Great headphones. Good sound quality. Hasn't gotten damaged till now. Which is great. Bought it a year ago. The wires get tangled though. Easily. So recommend buying a case along with this.

name: Naman Punia
title: Better than most other products in the 1000 Rs range
content: Earlier I was using Sennhizer earphones and although they are better in the sound department, they don't have a mic. and their built quality was very poor. These are more durable with a thicker wire so hopefully they will last longer than Sennhizer which broke within 1 year.

name: Shriya
title: Fragile Earphones
content: Build is weak. Two weeks after buying this product, the jack got bent while using, making the earphone worthless.. Though sound quality is good for the price, what's the use when hardware is so fragile.

name: AMRITANSH AISHWARYA
title: very good at reasonable price...no doubt...
content: sound quality is awesome... please don't doubt it even for a second.... length of wire is 1.2 m...which is more than enough....you can easily keep your phone in any pocket of your jeans and still you will be very comfortable to use earphone. audio quality of the microphone is also outstanding... and it is obvious that it should be as it is JBL

name: Mohan Siva
title: Cheating
content: What a product very cheap quality but high cost ,actually is it jbl or any other china earphones because it is made in China.I really upset with this product,very bad it's called cheating.The wires are very thin and sound is poor

name: Reeta devi
title: Rally nice earbuds.
content: These earbuds are the real bank for the buck. one month has been passed since i started using them. really good sound stage. there is bass also present in adequate amount. Really makes my day if i listen to some beats through them. Highly recomanded by me . the wire dosent tangle too much. Gold plated 3.5 mm jack.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very Satisfied with the Product
content: The sound quality is good and the product is worth its price, I have been using it since last 2 years now and there are no issues. It works fine. But yes it is delicate, have to been kept inside a good container/case so that you can use the Headphones for a good amount of time.

name: Rohit
title: Absolute value for money.
content: Fabulous earphones for the price. Absolute value for money. For better quality, you'll have to pay more. At a price under Rs.1000, this one is fantastic.

name: apurva
title: Worst than local it stopped working after 1 month only!
content: It was just working fine for 1 month but I don't know what happened and one of the earphone stopped working just in one month I did not stretch the wire also I used it so carefully still. Jbl as company should at least provide earphones that should work more than a month didn't expect such low quality by jbl highly disappointedüò°

name: Rajashree R.
title: Awsome product.i am loving it
content: First i ordered a jbl t210 and m not satisfied with dat one so i returned it and got a jbl c100si and believe me guys this one is amzing.. Bass is just super awsome .i love the clarity of the soundalso. -with a mic placed perfectly. -this one comes with an golden plated 3.5 mm jack

name: Subu
title: Poor noise cancellation mic n average bass
content: Bought at a discount keeping in view high brand value of JBL but product under performed . POOR noise cancellation mic with average bass ear phones !! Expected a lot better !!

name: Anand Vaidya
title: Overall ok product
content: Nice quality of sound. You have to handle the wires with care as it is very delicate. Some guys complaint its sound is noicy but I didnt found any disturbance in sound. Bass is not so good.

name: vivek baghel
title: Not worth
content: Its helpful for sound quality but actually the product material from outside is bad so not reliable for long. my ear phone's endpoint was going to broken after only one month so quality should be improve for better experience & also exchange policies not interested to take any quarry so its fake that customers satisfaction n all

name: Shangeth
title: Good one at this price
content: It's a good one, but not for long run.. Purchased 2 times, audio/mic everything is good for common use, but tears after 6 months, which is fine I guess at this price.

name: Praveen Kaydan
title: Base and treble both goes hand in hand .
content: This is the best you can get in this price range ...it have good base but treble at the same time .. So.if you like high treble and high base hand in hand it's a great earphone ... One should not accept too much base from.this. base can be improved by equaliser.. Overall good earphone go for it .

name: Kamble Vaibhav eknath
title: mic and speaker not working
content: never expected this from JBL, Harman. mic was not function within a week and left side speaker is aslo not working now, after a month. asked for warranty...then i came to know that one sided shipping charges have to paid by me, that too shipping alowed only to harayana. which itself costs Rs.160 from here.

name: Madhu
title: Decent Ear Phones
content: This is a good value for money. Haas the JBL quality and convenient of a microphone. Quite small in size yet comes with different sized ear buds to fit your ear cups. Good buy.

name: Prabhudas Pernati
title: Useless.....waste of money....
content: Head phones got problem with in a week ....I tried for replacement, but the option is ended by the first week ...Mic is not working and not head phone aren't supporting to any phone that I jacked in......Suggestion never purchase waste of money....sound quality is average....noise cancellation is nill....bass quality is good..

name: Mahi N
title: Nice
content: Sound quality is awesome it's just I've used boat earphones before....compared to sound quality & material quality boat is awesome....price is also low than jbl

name: Prabakaran
title: Worst Service and Low quality Product
content: After using the product for only 3 months, the right earpiece started showing problem and within 10 days both the earpieces did not work. I tried to contact the services via troll free number given by amazon, but the number is always busy. Overall, not satisfied with the product. Not a good choice at this price level. Go for other brands.

name: Sarita Upadhyay
title: Received a 2nd hand damaged product
content: I was delivered a damaged product . This is the 1st time something like this has happened to me by Amazon . One side of earphones ain't working and have cuts on the wire too. Fells like someone tried to stick it with some adhesive substance . Feels like a used 2nd hand product. Very disappointed from the retailer and Amazon.

name: AJ
title: Good product in this price..
content: I have taken out 1 star for attractiveness of the product..I dont understand the technicalities of base bass and stuff.. so for me its clear and lovely... keep watching for offers I bought for 899 and just after 4 days its 699..

name: Naresh kumar
title: Reviews after 2 hours use of realme 2 and JBL c100si wired headphone
content: Overal in sound clarity and bass control and quality of the sound in fact it may be the instruments as well as the singer voice and bass control can easily differentiate as compare to realme wild buds 2 but the cons of JBL 100 is only the build quality is not so good as compared to realme buds 2

name: RAVI PRATAP SINGH
title: Poor quality of product wire damage oil is coming from wire.
content: JBL ka earphone C100SI bahot ghatia nikla mera 8 months hue hai or wire khrab ho gya hai or 1 right wale mai sound he nhi aa rha or warranty mai hai but change nhi ho rha kyuki wire damage jo warranty mai nhi aata so plz dont buy this product .. Amazon sell very bad product ,this time I am very dissapointed .

name: Rohan Tambade
title: Value for Money
content: What I could say about this. Putting review after a year use. I did lot of research before buying earphones. This is really good in sound quality. Superb bass. Design is very cool and don't hurt even with excess use. I got this at 549. If you have budget with 600 just go for it without any second thought. I got black, go for blue, look really premium.

name: Nagesh B. Gohil
title: Bad after Sales & Service
content: I purchase jbl c100i on 15 oct-2019 after 8 months one side ear phone not working & wire also break automatically. Its 01 year warranty i seach & call service center but number not working....really bad service..so pls purchase before call to service center & collect details of term & conditions of repair or replace policy.

name: Mohammad adil
title: Not for Bass lovers
content: The vocals are good you can hear songs clearly but the bass is low as compared to my Sony earphone.. Instrument separation is also not clear

name: vikas prasad
title: good product with good sound quality
content: I would say the name itself suggest the quality product. I have been using it now long. It works fine and has no problem. So great product would suggest you to buy

name: RAMAKANTA SAHOO
title: JBL always awesome with sounds
content: The brand is enough for review, all the earphones from jbl are good. Everything is good no need to worry but one thing to keep in mind jbl is known for its sound clarity not for dj music so don't expect pub type bass. As I compared with others in jbl bass is little slow but sound clarity is awesome.

name: manasa
title: Good sound quality
content: His earphone has good sound quality . Only drawback i feel that the noise cancellation is not very effective and efficient

name: Karishma K
title: Don't buy it if you love good sound for your games and music
content: Expectated better quality from JBL. Bass is not as good and mentioned. And in same price range many other products have better sound quality. Really upset. Kinda wasted my money and the problem is there is no return option so stucked with itüò£

name: Manaf P.M
title: Poor mic quality(low sound)
content: Sound quality is satisfactory but the mic is a disaster. I strongly recomment you to go for other products. I have been using jbl ear phones for 5 years and this is the worst product i ever used. Comparing to the price sound quality is okay, but tge microphone hardly recofnise any sound

name: Naveed
title: Worth every penny
content: Superb sound. Some people are complaining that bass is in sufficient. If u wear it properly u will find that the bass is superb. I compared it with original samsung earphone worth rs 1999. This is one far superior.

name: Anshul Samarwal
title: Good Product At This Price Tag
content: Guys, buy this if you have a medium budget to spend on good earphones. Good quality build, nice and soft buds, and nice bass along with a clearer treble. Nice and cost-effective product by the giant company JBL.

name: MD ASHIKUR RAHAMAN
title: Disappointing with Redmi Note 6 Pro
content: I find it disappointing using it with Redmi Note 6 Pro. No bone shaking Bass atleast. Sound is kind of a suppressed and low even at highest volume. I have used Boat BassHeads220 which goes far better with my phone. I regret this buy.

name: Nikam d.
title: Not durable for longer duration
content: Decent product but stopped working within 5 months of purchase sound quality is decent not that great bass is good obviously cant expect much in this orice range but i wont recommend this as it is not durable for longer duration go for boat bassheads 225 they are a much better option

name: Rishi Singh
title: Good product. Value for money.
content: M writing this review after 2 month of usage. I've used it for listening music, for phone calls, for sound recording and for online lectures and it stood up to marks..its awesome...sound quality is too good. For me its a value for money product.. Note : I bought it for ‚Çπ600 only /-

name: Sneha Rao
title: JBL exceeds our expectations
content: The earphones are just a value for money. Excellent bass quality and the noise cancellation feature is the best. The button on the wires also gives you an option to pause the song without the need to look at your phone. All in all worth the purchase and the money you invest

name: ASHUTOSH JHA
title: Worst product and worst Services
content: Never recommend anyone to buy this product. Bought one in Feb and after 2 months of use stopped working.. went to service center in Nehru Palace, staff were so rude and make you wait until you get exhausted. Rude and very uncooperative staffs

name: Mayank
title: Best for temporary usage
content: Needed an earphones for normal use for watching youtube videos for that it is best at this price, bass is not good .... if you are looking for an earphone for temporary use these are best at this price range go for it.. Not recommended for listening music because the treble is very high which is annoying for me sometime.

name: Veronica Rapol
title: Package defect and duplicate earphones
content: My package was damage already and after open the package I found that the earphones I received is a duplicate as it doesn't have JBL logo on it and the earbuds are dirty and filled with dust. I have returned this product ..I have ordered earlier from Amazon but this is the first time package is opened and duplicate earphones

name: Ayush
title: It's nice
content: Jbl c 100si I like this product. Sound quality =it has good quality sound probably in this price range. Bass quality =bass is average u can modify it by changing the bass level in settings overall a good bass. Build quality =build is really bad if u a type of guy that did not care and use roughly it is not for u

name: aman s.
title: Amazing for those who want clarity of music and crisp ...
content: Amazing for those who want clarity of music and crisp in sound. Not for bass lovers. Allover value for money. If u litsen music for the sound quality and not the bass go for it. One thing worth mentioning, the rubber over the headphone jack is the weakest part and doesnt tooerate much of rough use like keeping mobile in jeans and litsening music. It gets torn. a bit quick.

name: John Punnen
title: Value for money
content: Since I am a HiFi listener through Audiophile equipments I can't say this earphone as anything that great. But certainly it's a good value for money device. Neet sound with good mic.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent product
content: Sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is also good. Overall a satisfactory purchase. No other product comes to mind when purchasing headphones with mic.

name: Anil Kumar
title: Poor quality Cord wire
content: Please do not buy. After 4 months' use cord wire ripped below the pin (see photo) and I approached nearby JBL service center they declined to replace or repair. Contacted call center, sent email several times without any reply. One year warranty is not honoured.

name: Rakesh Ch. Jena
title: Good product, but delicate at the same time
content: It was good at the beginning, but didn't expect this to be last not for more than 4 months. Mice didn't work. It's a delicated product. So better be careful while using.

name: Joseph
title: Cheap quality this is not jbl
content: Overall Not so good ...bass is not good sound quality is ok.. treble is too much and sometimes noisy it feels like it is not jbl fake or defect product I am not sure .packaging was good I checked the internet to find if it is a fake product but could not find.i have C50HI and it's better than this 450 rs only.

name: Gaurav Kumar
title: Go grag it before its too late
content: I bought this jbl earphone@ Rs 700 . Saying very fair , the bass is awesome, sound is very unique, slim design. I request to all reviewers of any product that they must mention the amount which they had pay ,, so every one can see the price fluctuations of that similar product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very very comfortable
content: Very very comfortable and light weight, best for travelling and jogging. Sound wise. Pleasant, vocal are very good. Beats are clear and punchy. Regarding bass,I would give 8/10. Listen"aj see tera". Wonderful response by jbl. All around very good purchase if you buyed it at offer. I purchased it at 599. So ,wait for the discount

name: Amazon Customer
title: Maybe fake or copy
content: Though I bought it over a year ago but have hardly used it .....if I count maybe 20times ....and the voice now comes through only one bud. .....really disappointed....maybe it's fake .....be aware please.....in comparison my Sony ones are more than 7 years old ..roughly used but still working perfectly....think before u buy

name: Amazon Customer
title: Four Stars
content: Angular jack would be much better. Go for it better than t150 a. I m writing this review after more than 7 months of uses believe me u wont find better earphones than this at this price. Just buy it keep it properly becoz by the time u purchase this it will becime second love of ur life. Very sweet voice u can listen 5-6 hours unstoppable.

name: karthick T
title: Quality for longer term is not good. Use and Throw!
content: I have purchased this product on 17-July-18. It was good for only 3 months. After that, right side ear phone not working. I have contacted customer care for replacement. I didn't get a proper reply. They blocked my number for further investigation. Better don't go for this product. Use and Throw.

name: Nikhlesh Chaurasia
title: Must buy headphones
content: Product material is not that much good i have same JBL earphones white varient of this. white one has much better material I brought that one from Flipkart but sound quality of both are same. Cristal clear voice with very good base and treable. JBL is the best in this range I got in 550 during festival sale.

name: V.Ramakrishnan
title: Amazing headphone
content: I am using this headphone for the past 1 month, It was really nice when compared to Samsung headphones. The quality of the music is really good.

name: Bhupi
title: great
content: great.. but one side earpice distroting while on high volumes.. other than that everything is nice!!. got is for 599rs.

name: Vinay Lakahman M
title: Earphones are not my thing!
content: Well, this product made me realize that earphones aren't for me, i ended up losing this pair and buying a wireless headsetüòÖ. As far as the product goes, it was pretty good, the buds wouldn't stay in my ear for long which was one major flaw i noticed, other than that it was a pretty good pair of earphones

name: Onkar Chand
title: NO SOUND AFTER 7 MONTH OF PURCHASE
content: I bought this product on February 2020 and stopped working on September2020 (i.e. approx 7 months) without any physical damage. And this is 2nd time happened with me with the same product. 1 year warranty is there but u hv to find first shop near to u..that is not available in my area..so its hard to replace.

name: Sneha Dinesh
title: Good product!
content: Value for money product. Sound quality is very good...great bass.. also loved the design. I am a rough user of earphones.. i always sleep on them, and after all that this set works fine even after 8 months (ordinary set work for me lyk 3 months max) so its good material quality,

name: Amazon Customer
title: Wastage of money
content: I didn't like the product at all. I don't know but the headphones which I got with my oppo F5 are much better than these.

name: kaustubh
title: Not a durable product!!
content: Sound quality is Gud but.. If you are looking for durable product.. This one is not for you.. Lot of cuts on wire... Entangling tendency of wire very high.. Jbl should focus on Durability of product as well...

name: Arpit Mehta
title: Nice quality product for this price
content: Got the product for ‚Çπ499 and i gotta say that jbl is giving quite a quality product for that price. It's microphone works fine and the sound is nice although the built quality might not be premium because of the price but it still holds well, i am writing this review after 3 months of daily use.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great Product, Long lasting
content: First of all its JBL.. That's the first thing everyone notices "Oh wow, you've got JBL earphones, must've cost a bomb.". It really wasn't that expensive cos I bought it during a sale. Sound quality is great. I keep dropping it and banging it places so many times but it seems to survive it all.. they have a whole bunch of extra ear pods too which is great.

name: dheemanth
title: One of the best
content: Bought my 3rd earphone of this model. Other 2 were spoilt due to keeping near laptop vent. Clean sound and decent bass. Mic quality is also good.

name: Jignesh Parmar
title: Very nice sound qualiy. Impressive.
content: Very nice sound quality. Very impressive and crystal clear separation of music, gives a feel of superb experience of music. üëåüèΩüëåüèΩüëåüèΩ Very nice product. Worth thr name and price.

name: Adityanarayan Tiwari
title: Good at this price
content: More than ok , It is mid range all-rounder ear phone . Music sound quality,on phone call, you can listen music for long time 4-5 hours without any issues but suitable ear buds which they already provided with the box .. I have used with MI ,Moto,Sony,Samsung, iPhone.. Its output depends on cellphone.

name: Amazon genuine costumer
title: Buy it for music but not gaming.
content: Product built quality is good and sound is avarage when compared to apple earphones and earphones are slipping from ears.ovarall it is worth to buy it for listening music.. when playing PUBG game it's very loud like local earphones don't buy it for gaming its my suggestion.

name: Onkar
title: Good. But some static noise when idle.
content: It's been a month these are working fine.. It gives me some static noise when there is no sound coming out of player/computer.

name: SUNIL K
title: Not at all good. No sound quality
content: Not at all good. No sound quality .I think it's wrong product i bought this last year that time the product was good . But now very poor performance and the material used also very poor quality. May the dealer did some manipulation. I suggest don't try to buy based on the brand jbl . Jbl has the reputation ,but this product is duplicate.and one more, do not purchase the product if it is in offer.personally experienced the quality difference in offer and not in

name: kushant
title: Very great and almost best
content: Very great earphones. Best sound quality at normal levels if you like to listen loud dont because its so loud that you will go deff. The wire quality is not that great though.

name: philjophilip
title: Meh
content: Affordable because of its cheap price!. Its looks good for someone who is not into headphones like sennheiser!. This one is definitely not good in gaming like PUBG ! ( stuck by its poor quality ) one pro is it work fine in NETFLIX ! I watch the trio Dark using this , astonished by the bgms ! Ps: not the quality

name: Vipin
title: sound quality good
content: sound quality good ..but build quality worse ..so you shold use very carefully while carying ..need to put in a box while carrying in headphone

name: Abhinav
title: Good buy.
content: Writing review after using it 1.5 years bought at 715.. Sound quality- good and still no issue with speakers for this price range.. Material quality - for 1 year was good after that it gets some issues.. Overall good buy in this price.

name: Sai teja
title: Poor quality of material and doesn't last long
content: Noise cancellation is not as expected. How ever it gives you good quality sound but it Will not last even a year. I bought it 2 times. Both the times due to poor material quality the rubber came out. On a long run after 6 months the quality drastically decreased. Go for a long run one. Even though it covers warranty they declined mine.

name: Grace P
title: Not worth it
content: Apart from what the caller says you can hear everything... All the background noises everything CAN BE heard clearly; more than noise cancellation-- this is noise inviting.. Worst purchase decision. DO not buy

name: ajitesh k.
title: Good product
content: it is made up of good material and it is still in good condition since I am using this for more than 2 months and that also roughly.. Made up of good material, and delivers very much balanced sound. Good for listening music and talking. Can be used for long period of time & doesn't cause pain even, feels light.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome sound, durability and sturdiness
content: Good sound with great material. If you want to use it for 5 years then this is the product you are looking for. I used it for 3 years and gave to my friend.

name: Amol Maske
title: Awesome Product
content: .Very good product. Sound quality is best. Echo and it reproduce the sound with ultimate music. Sound output gove a feel of home theater in ears. Its very comfortable for ears as well. You can use it continuously without any ear pain. Over all product is very good and value to its price

name: Partha Sarkar
title: JBL rocks
content: JBL the names says it all.. superb sound quality. It gives you the typical richness of a JBL. Bass is not so much intense like Boat headphones in turn it gives you proper blend of balanced bass where needed.. I am totally satisfied. But two things could be better, 1. Tangle free cable. 2. Build quality could have been little more sturdy. It seems like it may end up really soon if not handled with care.

name: Arko
title: Woth buying
content: It has a good sound compared to its price. The only low about this product is that, there is a certain part of the speaker that rattles and in audible in the ears. I hope its not the case with all the headphones. Probably a small defect in mine. Nevertheless, it doesn't bother me much. Its worth the price of the product.

name: Sourabh
title: Consider before buying. Performance fluctuates, poor customer service by JBL.
content: Faced issues with the noice quality of the earphone just within couple of months, Had these arphones replaced through direct service center but the replacement too have the same issue. One of the earpiece won't function. Company asks me to courier the earphone to their service center which is a mess.. Please consider before buying these.

name: Shri
title: Doesn't feel anything special when observed as a JBL brand
content: Earphones are light in weight, that's the only pros. Other than this, sound quality and bass both are average. My suggestion is don't go on brand name for this set. Doesn't feel anything special in this earphone set.

name: Akhalaque Ahamad
title: Amazing sound quality, superb bass
content: I love it's amazing sound quality with super bass. Noise cancellation is amazing.. I am loving it... I have given this feedback after using it 3 months.. Honest review and one should not think of anything... Just buy this and I'm sure you gonna love this too.. Thanks alot JBL for making such a great product.

name: Naveen
title: wire quality isnt good
content: Everything is good about this product . the price is reasonable and affordable to buy jbl ear phones for such money . but within a short time the base of ear phones wire has been damaged . i feel like company must improve the quality of wire. except the wire there is no disadvantage with these earphones .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth for its price! üíØ
content: Sound quality is amazing. I use Realme Buds Air and OnePlus Buds...I bought this JBL earphones for my sister and I use this most of the time...this earphone is just amazing. You can go for it if you are a basshead. The vocals are also good. This earphone is such a value for moneyüíØ‚ô•Ô∏è Love it. Recommend it.

name: Naaz Rustom Irani
title: do not deserve title of "trustworthy" by their patrons. Poor after sales service.
content: No Durability... JBL is not a customer centric brand and does not care about their clients. It's evident from the fact that In entire Mumbai only one service centre.Its pathetic.

name: Anurag Dewangan
title: An awesome earphone within budget
content: An awesome earphone within budget...just one thing needs to be taken care of is the wire and jack junction. Need to be extra careful while pulling out the earphone.... Apart from this only con, I got an unbeatable earphone in such a price. One more suggestion, don't go for higher version model like c200 etc. I have tried those also, which do not stand in competition in front of this...

name: Udit
title: BEST UNDER 700
content: pure sound, no thumping bass as compared to boat which i dont like, better than boat , realme , mi ,boult,etc if you consider sound quality .RECOMMENDED

name: Aniket
title: Not for bass lovers
content: Sound quality is good but I'm kind of bass lover so it not full fill my expectations.bass quality is not so good. So if you are bass lover please keep away from it.

name: Antariksh Anupam
title: Quality budget earphones
content: Very realistic sound, every instrument sounds clearly. The bass is not out of the world, but the sound has a sweet texture that you get used to eventually and you like it. Light music, melodious songs sound amazing, in this earphone. The sound of each instrument is very clear, true to what the musicians want you to hear.

name: Nagasree Suresh
title: One of the headphones (right) stops working suddenly after 1 month
content: One of the headphones (right) stops working suddenly after 1 month. No sound comes from the earphones though its neatly maintained without dropping or damaging the ear piece.. In product description, I see there is 1 year warranty. What is the process to get it replaced as the product is within the warranty period?

name: Moyuri
title: One side of the earphone stops working after one month
content: Worst product ever. Don‚Äôt buy it. Waste of money. It is that every two months I am buying 1 new JBL earphone seeing its review, for 1 month 1 will run perfect. After 1 or two months one side of the earphone will stop working and then the next. This was the 3rd time I brought JBL earphone. Will never again.

name: Ahmendra
title: Very poor quality product.
content: Worst quality product. Within 15 minutes days it got defective, could not hear voice from.1 ear piece...Fortunate enough to get replacement bu took 10 days.. but the new piece has also gone defective with 4 month. Even a local brand works well n can last for at least 6 months. Very poor quality product.

name: SaketKr
title: Totally recommended for this price range.
content: I have been using it since like 4-5 months while I'm writing this review. It's working fine, the product is really nice. I totally recommend it.

name: Somdeep paul
title: Good product from JBL
content: Like it it have some good bass sound clarity also good. It has also noise cancellation if you have low budget then you go for it.Totally worth it. Between Sennheizer X-180 and JBL 100SI of course you will pickup Sennheizer for great Bass..Both comes with same Cost.

name: Shramana
title: Good product at this range
content: Good product at this price.. overall have all features and gives 60-70% satisfaction...bass is okay...mic is okay...when you take calls in a crowded area also the person other side can hear you just okay.. Sound quality is also okay.

name: PIYUSH PANT
title: Very good speakers with below average microphone
content: Speakers are very good but the microphone is not upto the mark. It just picks the voice but not details of your voice. Good for call but very bad for karaoke recording.

name: Rohit Singh Solanki
title: Really great product... Loved it.
content: Absolutely great product. Really durable product, material quality is awesome.. Sound quality is something out of this world.. Buy it in the deal time, you're getting your money's worth.

name: Ankit Parihar
title: Good built quality and Durability
content: JBL, the name is enough when its about earphones. I Ave used various JBL products but the only problem with this earphones is sound is a little low as compared to others which I have used. Other than that it's a great product durable and built good.

name: Sharjeel
title: Nice headphones
content: I received it today and I watched wonder woman 1984 using this earphones...it's bass quality is good and specially noise cancellation is excellent. I live with my sister's family Nd she had 3children who always shouting... So yeah this earphone will help you in canceling those loud noises

name: Atiq
title: Not satisfactory.
content: One the most imbalanced headphone anybody can find. Even though it has the name of JBL don't expect the quality. Noise cancellation isn't a feature, Mike doesn't work efficiently. Better go for some other earphone if you really like your music. Plus the bass is like completely absent. Two stars are only because of the build. Nothhing else is good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I NEED A REPLACEMENT
content: I ordered this product in June 2020. the product has a warranty of 1 year and one of the earplugs has stopped working in the warranty period!!! I can't find the whole process to apply for a replacement. kindly replace them since these broke within the warranty period.

name: geetha
title: Verrry Nice
content: After using this ear phone for a months aga the sound quality is too good, I recommend to buy this product , JBL is one of the good brand for ear phones

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not comfortable in the ear, design is defective
content: The product on the face of it and with its core job of producing good sound is nice. But the biggest problem is the design. It will make your ear pain. If you don't insert it enough in the ear it will fall off and not stay in the ear. If you try to stick it in, it will make the ear pain. So overall very unusable.

name: Romit
title: Decent product at affordable price
content: A decent pair of earphones for its price. Gets the job done. I needed a pair with microphones because of long conference calls and this pair has good mic quality and the audio output via the earphones is also decent and nothing to complain about. All in all, I would say it's a decent product considering the price tag.

name: R Ravi
title: Based in bass and noice
content: Its epic only problem is it has decent bass so if you know to use an equalizer you can play amazon music and adjust equilizar then the sound is epic .this review i wrote when i just biught the product bow its been 4 months it wirks epic the bass is full and its better that boAt Bassheads 100 in Ear Wired Earphones with Mic(Black) this one

name: Kalyan
title: Good mic for singing in smule!
content: If you are looking for a good mic .. ( specially for singing in smile) this product is very good. I have tried a few mics but this was the best

name: MSK
title: Mic Issue & Left ear piece issues
content: 1. I originally had this piece that I used for a good 2 years or so when one of the ear piece had a problem.. 2. The new one had problem with the mic: mic does not work at all. I initially thought it was because of the environment I was in but later realized that the mic is terrible. Got it replaced.. 3. Amazon replaced it for me as the issue happened immediately. But the replacement itself stopped working a week or so later, with the same issue with left ear piece. Initially, I thought that, I was probably using the old one. But later realized, both had the same problem.

name: Kalparaj
title: Excellent Sound Quality
content: Excellent Quality. When it comes to listening to music I always go with JBL. The product is exact the same as described. Value for money. I would definitely recommend to buy this product.

name: Prakyath
title: Loud & clear
content: Worthy price. Crystal clear sound for normal use and JBL quality of sound u can experience. For best base sound go for bit higher price.

name: Teja Mihir
title: Awesome in ear Headphones.
content: Guys this is the best earphone available at this price range.It gives you all the bass you need with crisp clear sound.I think you will not find any in ear Headphones like this at this price range. It fits good and no worries you got three sizes of ear buds which fits you well.

name: Amazon Customer
title: An average
content: Sound quality is an amazing.. If you're bass lover then it's not upto the mark for you.. Every thing is Balanced from bass to treble.. But built quality is miserable. Even mic doesn't work properly.. After using 2 days, my experience with sound is great but mic and button is not working properly .

name: VIMAL KUMAR SINGH
title: Customer service is bad
content: This product is not good because speaker side wire cover come out to speaker box & one speaker also working stop. If you goes to device center company called it's a damage they said you can't received any warranty. So please avoid this product. Bad üëé product and poor customer behavior by Nehru Place service centre.

name: shiva
title: stopped working after few months
content: these stopped working now.! within 6 months.. from the purchase.. very mild usage though just for calls.. little bad product.! may be its a duplicate i received.

name: Prasad erande
title: Why to buy?
content: Why to buy this product?. 1) better sound quality. 2) perfect wire length (other product from jbl are not good in this case they have extra lengthy wire). 3) perfect fitting in ear (go inside that's why best nice reduction?). 4) light in weight. Why not to buy?. 1) can be Brock of use roughly. 2) no L shape at headphones jack.

name: Yash Gupta
title: Cost is Justified
content: A decent headphone for the price range and the general daily usage.. Mic is great. Certainly not a audiophile lover product. Response is flat, use equalizer to customize as per your desire.. Wire's are an entangle magnet, also a bit fragile at the earplug and wire joint.

name: SAKSHI JOSHI
title: Not upto the mark!
content: I would say if you really want to buy a cheap set of earphones go for boat instead for this one!. I bought it on july 2019 and it stopped working in january 2020, though I will get it replaced but still if you want a decent pair add some more to your budget and buy one from sony. Way better than this.

name: Ramakrishna reddy
title: Better in this price range
content: Best sound quality and clarity.... Good for daily usage and bass is not much the best but good enough for average volume.

name: Vikram Deo
title: A good companion!!
content: The high tones and mid tones, vicals are good. Bass comes when it's there though it can be bettered. Well can't complaint considering its price. Overall for a price of 599/- one can totally go for this.

name: Avinash K.
title: Don't buy
content: The sound quality is good but the build quality is the worst. I bought 2 of these, the first one broke in 3 months while the second one broke in 1 month itself. So I wouldn't recommend these.

name: Swaminathan
title: Now one side of the ear piece is not working
content: Bought this with a hope that its JBL. But within 2 months of usage, one side of the ear piece is not working. We were very careful in using this. Now a days, the quality of the products are at a stake I feel based on the experience

name: Bharath
title: A Very Old Model.. Stop selling this please
content: There is no Noise Cancellation in Mic as provided in feature list.. No Deep Bass as claimed, very high treble.. Very Old Model, there are way lot better earphones at this price point of Rs 750

name: Moumita
title: Absolutely AMAZING
content: JUST LIKE THE BRAND IS WELL-REPUTED,THIS PRODUCT SURPRISE S ME EVERYDAY....SOMETIMES IT BECOMES UNCOMFORTABLE TO THE EARS BUT OVERALL...ILL RECOMMEND THIS AS THIS MIGHT BE THR BEST EARPHONES IN SUCH A SMALL PRICE RANGE

name: Arpit Khandelwal
title: Made in china product.
content: Beware. This product is made in China. Amazon should mention the country of origin as made in china products are seldom durable.

name: surendra kashyap
title: Dont purchase......
content: poor sound .. or coastly. I am not happy. Noice cencellation and sound not good. Ear pain some time after plug in ear.......üò¨. Bad

name: Abhiraj T.
title: Bang for my buck, definitely!
content: Fourth, maybe fifth time buying this item. (Only because I keep losing them). Absolutely never let me down. Completely bang for my buck.. Crisp sound, comfy to wear, great sound with all devices. I have convinced multiple friends to buy these!. Competes with high-end earphones for a lot less money.

name: Siddhartha Mazumder
title: A Very Affordable Quality Product.
content: A great product from JBL. I have Sennheiser MX365, BOAT BassHeads 225, BassHeads 152 and this newest one. I can say, this is the best. Clear sound quality, very good noise cancellation and a good bass quality. Value for money in this price range. I would recommend it to everyone.

name: Saikat Majumder
title: About the sound
content: Before purchasing I had checked the reviewer's comments and in some of them it is mentioned there is no bass. So, after using it I can see the bass is perfect. It is an in ear headphone, so if it is not put into the ear perfectly then there will be only treble to listen and no bass will be experienced.. Length is 4ft(1.2m)

name: vaibahv
title: Ok if  below 500 RS
content: average sound and build quality.. For clear and crispy sound with good base check below earphones under RS 1000. 1 : Creative EP630. 2 : Cowon EM1. 3 : audio technica ath-clr100bk. 4 : sennheiser cx 180. 5 : JBL c100si. Tested above with my rooted RN3 with viper4android.

name: Sanjay
title: Amazing earphone
content: It is good as per it's price point. I am using it since last three months and it is working perfectly. Good sound quality and good bass and also good build quality making the ear phone perfect. Go with it u will never regret.

name: Abhinay Runthala
title: Overall good
content: The sound quality was too good, and noise cancellation too was good. But the only thing I disliked in them were that It did not last long. I had two of same model n both didn't last long as expected.

name: Sindhu Choudhary
title: Great earphones, recommended.
content: The sound doesn't need to go above 75% it's pretty loud. The music so far is Crystal clear and the calls are great. The earphones can however get Tangled easily. But I'd recommend this one over boat 225 basshead because of the comfort and weight and because boat doesn't give earhooks anymore and it falls off easily

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: Instruments sepration is good. Crystal clear sound. Bass is rich. On full sound feels like Dolby digital but don't use full volume "It will damage your ears". Review after 3 months of usage. I got it for Rs. 699

name: Arpan Mondal
title: Great
content: It's mind-blowing product in this price range.Far better than Realemi buds 2 in terms of sound.. But the build quality and wire is little bit better in Realmi buds 2 thal JBL.. Overall it's a good experience in buying JBL C100

name: Anidhya Bhatnagar
title: Best sound in this budget
content: Genuine JBL Product, comes in original packing. It has great sound quality and long wire. Comes with ear buds of three sizes plug in which suits your ear size. Wonderful product in this price.

name: RJ
title: Waste of money and cheap quality.
content: I bought a earphones 3 months before.The product is very fragile.And within 3 months its cord broked and the connecting bush was also not working properly.I highly recommend others to go for some other earphones.

name: Bilal meccai
title: Very average earphones!
content: Not worth the price the sound quality is very low for a JBL product does not meet the standards.. definitely DO NOT BUY!!!!. INSTEAD GO FOR BLAUPKUNT EARPHONES THEY ARE BLISS FOR THE SAME PRICE!

name: Aashish Guglani
title: Perfect in this price range
content: I‚Äôve been using this product for more than 6 months now and it‚Äôs still working perfectly fine. The only drawback of this earphone is that the position of mic is quite low which makes it difficult for others to listen to your voice. It should be close to the mouth.

name: Mamta H. Gupta
title: sound is good
content: JBL C100SI In-Ear Headphones with Mic is comfortable in ear. Value for money. As good and as clumsy as any wired headphones (controlling wire tangle you have to work your care system). Relatively new so have to see about durability.. Overall good.

name: Tarushree
title: Go for it ‚úåüëç
content: The best earphones I got till date in a very reasonable price.. Trust me and take this earphone without any second thought.. Works well with every brand of phones.. I have ordered atleast 10 around of these earphones for myself, family and friends. Each and every earphone worked just well.

name: Hitesh Jain
title: JBL is the best.
content: Undoubtedly one of the best earphone which you can get from any company in the market. JBL is the best. Sound clarity,reasonable, light weighted, great design. Would have been great it would have volume keys button for ease of use.

name: Ankit Khandelwal
title: Average sounding headphones from JBL

name: Chirag
title: Very Nice Earphones

But some mobiles for best sound and beat we must adjust equalizer then it produces awesome sound effects. For both sound and bass. Go for this beast JBL C100SI. And purchased just for 549 on sale..

name: NJ
title: Not long lasting.
content: Stopped working in exactly 8 months even on careful handling. Repurchased a new one after that and the new one worked for hardly 5 months. WASTE OF MONEY

name: Syed
title: Disappointed with Amazon and JBL

I used it very rare but within 3 months one side earphone is not working. When you will reach Amazon they will redirect you to JBL and JBL will not give any replacement. So dont go with JBL.

name: BVKishore
title: Crystal Clear sound and Amazing experience

name: Avishek
title: Not recommended.

name: Puneet Sharma
title: Invoice please
content: Hi, I purchased this product in Jan-2020 and just after 1 year of warranty its one side stopped working.. I am looking for an invoice, whose warranty of 1 year is still valid just to fix the problem.. Any help.. One can email me the invoice on 11.puneetmoudgil@gmail.com

name: Krishna Priya

name: UTSAVA

name: Suprotim Karmakar

name: Abhishek Mazumdar
title: Satisfactory Level üíØüëçüëå

name: Amazon Customer

name: Hari Veerapaneni

name: Umang Sinha

Best value for money. üòäüëç

name: Robin

name: Falgun

name: Sumit Dewang

Quality is also good...sound doesn't destort even at full volume... I love the bass... u just need to set ur equiliser to bass mode to enjoy it... worth the money @799

name: Shank

Cons:. * Mic at times has to be pressed hard for connecting/ even for pause of audio (or) sometimes not working

name: Amazon Customer

name: Skyxz

name: Abhishek minz
title: Jbl

name: Anamika

name: Amazon Customer

Now to claim my earphones , i have to courier it to Haryana from Pune. No proper service centers available. Not worth buying

name: VINAY C M

name: amith

name: Hemant kumar

name: abjee93
title: The quality of cable is so bad don't buy this
content: Quality is sound is good, The quality of cable is so bad don't buy this. If you love sound quality then go for cx 180 instead. If you need cable quality and bass go for Sony.

name: Hamdan Ahmed.
title: Okayish stuff in this range.
content: Good product but I got exchanged it because one plug wasn't responding , thank god I just exchanges it before 10 days of warranty period left , all thanks to JBL!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good value for money
content: Had bought this earlier as well. Served me really well for two years with extensive use. Clear, crisp sound. Noise cancellation is okay, but don't count on it too much. If you're really into bass, then you might be a bit disappointed. Otherwise for other types of music, it works really well.

name: Harmeet
title: Great Sound Quality
content: It's a JBL product, no need for any doubts. Sound quality is ahead of its price range. Bass is mediocre but if you want bass then why go for earphones, go for headphones. The design is a little buggy and could be better but it grows on you in time. Overall, highly recommended.

name: Tribhuvan
title: Jbl c100si
content: These earphones r kinda ok.sharpness is good but I didn't like the bass of this.older one which I had was Skullcandy smokin buds 1 which was amazing with pounding bass I personally advice u if u want a good earphones go fr high priced.i even have jbl t200 which r amazing.still a good product by jbl

name: saransh
title: Stoped working in 6 months
content: one side of the earphones stopped working compIetly in about 6 and half month. I order the earphones on 1st of January and received on 4th of January. I am writing this review on 31july.

name: spandana
title: Value for money
content: Build quality, noise cancellation, bass quality and after sale service are very good. After 4 months left earbud stopped working but got replaced within a week.. Complete value for money

name: Mayur D.
title: My Best earphone purchase
content: The delivery was on tym.. using it everyday.. nice n simple... Price is worth it.. also bass n sound quality is just JBL.. was reluctant wen I purchased it.. but more den satisfied by the awesome sound quality.. simply amazing.. worth it.. under 900 best buy..

name: Suraj
title: Great Bang For The Buck!!!
content: I bought these for ‚Çπ600. And I have to say these sound amazing for the price. Highs and Mids are clear. Bass is there but they are not very bassy but you can easily equalize the sound to get the punchy bass. Overall, these earphones are the best in this price segmen. Just go for it, you will not disappoint at all. Infact you would love them.

name: Kuldeep Yadav
title: Nice product!!!
content: I have been using these headphones for an year...they work just fine...although I can't use them for more than 2-3 hours without taking out them once but that is not product specific....sound quality is good...bass is just ok...overall it's good

name: Saumya Kapoor
title: Defected earphones

name: Samiran S.

name: subrahmanyam
title: Best VFM ear phones from JBL
content: One word. VFM product from JBl. Got it for Rs.549. You can simply buy without a second thought if your budget is around 500/-. Most importantly they fit perfectly in my ear.

name: Sharib Zafar
title: Best Earphone you will ever spend on

I am using this from 6 months and since then no complaints/issues have come and it works as good as it worked for first time.. One month back, it got washed in washing machine, I was surprised to see it working smoothly with zero problem/issues.

name: sudip biswas
title: Worst product

If any one one buy this headphone don't buy 599 buy renewed 399 something .. cause renewed and original same ....

name: Amazon Customer

name: balasubramanian

name: Dominic

name: Abhishek Singh

Now that it has been more than 10days since it's was delivered,there is no option to replace it as well.

name: DHANASEKARAN E

I got the replacement and it is working finely. The bass is good , spund quality is good, there is very little noise. It is worth the money spent if u get an original jbl product.

name: shaikshah
title: Value for money....

content: Music wise these are a pair of good earphones, but the build is satisfactory to say the least. The ear cups have a thin foam, which cannot be cleaned and if you do you might just blow it and that is enough to modify the music listening experience.

name: Amazon Customer

name: Naveen Kumar

name: Amazon Customer

Pathetic customer service!

name: Rajat Kumar

name: mayur hulsar

content: The sound effect is great. But microphone is at quite a distance from the mouth. So one needs to hold the microphone and bring it closer to the mouth for the person to hear you clearly.

name: Romita Dey

name: Shubhro Dev Mitra

name: Amazon Customer

name: Nitin Manhas

name: asim

name: Nishka

name: Amazon Customer
title: Faulty earphone
