name: Ganesh Pisal
title: JBL C100SI
content: Earphone is good sound but in turns of Hardwear material is not good. I use Mi basic earphones is much better than jblc100si . I use MI basic earphones in last 1year and no problem in sound quality and hardware material of the earphone.

name: Prashant
title: WORTH EVERY SINGLE RUPEE ::: PAISA WASOOL HAI
content: I GOT THIS FOR Rs.549/- AND ITS TOO GOOD FOR THE PRICE I HAVE PAID , ITS WORTH EVERY SINGLE PENNY . SOUND QUALITTY IS CRISP CLEAR AND LOUD. IM LISTENING TO CLASSICAL MUSIC - TABLA, FLUTE ETC. AND IM ENJOING EVRY BIT OF IT.

name: Sheetal Kulkarni
title: Good product
content: Good product for the price . I use it very rough and usually lasts me 9-11months . I brought this the 2nd time don't think will change to any other brand.

name: Abhishek Verma
title: Disasterous!
content: I certainly didnt like the quality of the product. I bought 2 on these earphones and one earpiece of each has stopped working. Its in warranty period but you simply cannot find a service centre. Too much dissappointed. Never ever think to buy this.

name: abhijit
title: Earphone with great sound for price range
content: Sound quality is great for the price. There is hardly any noise cancellation at all. Is is not bass heavy which I like and durability is very good.

name: surya
title: Defective piece
content: Got a defective item whose right ear piece didn't work right out off the package.. Should have listened to others reviews talking about the same experience.. I would advice others to stay away from this product. I wish there was a refund, it seems a replacement is all i get.

name: yash
title: Jbl ear phones
content: The first time, a defective product was delivered to me, thankfully it was replaced and the second time the product was good. Good build, good sound, for this price.

name: PRADEEP TIWARI
title: Awesome sound
content: The sound quality is amazing! Go for it.. It doesn't have option to use it to pause the song or do next/prev. You can only mute the song using the button provided in ear phone.

name: Biswajit Barman
title: Speaker Does not Working
content: It was descent for first six months. But after spending a few months, it is having loose connection problems. And one of the speaker is not working properly. Its very disturbing to listen with only one speaker . I did not expected this from a brand like JBL ! Totally disappointed!

name: Stuti
title: OMG!!
content: I love songs from all genres, this headphone is nothing short of a dream come true for music lovers. And of course for hands-free calls. Loved it!!!!

name: Karthikeyan
title: Best headphones for price. And it doesn't get tangled like iPhone headset
content: It's has good bass, very good fit, not painful when used for long periods. Another good feature of this due to material used it doesn't get tangled if you keep in bag and take it out, this is the most useful feature. Mic quality isn't great but satisfactory.

name: Gajendran
title: Overall nice product..JBL's sound signature is amazing..
content: Good sound...Nice bass but not too much...Treble is better because of jbl sound signature..Overall ok product..Im using ant audio w56..comparable but bass is 10 % lower than ant audio...Thank you amazon for timely delivery..

name: jyotshna U
title: Not working
content: The quality of this product has gone down. It's not even been 4 months since I bought the earphones. They are not functioning properly. Like, sometimes only one of the plugs work and the other one makes a weird noise.. It's not even a year and the microphone doesn't work. I want a replacement of my order. Since there is an year warranty.

name: JIHAD N S
title: Good for listeners and not perfect partner for talkers
content: Overall the bass quality is good.. the noise cancelation is bad. But i cant blame the product bcZ the inbuilt is good if you are going for the music.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Make in INDIA
content: Why produce it in china and selling in INDIA ..make in INDIA sell it to an INDIAN..we would be more proud and happy..HARMAN JBL outclass.

name: Sharon Mahapure
title: Not good
content: Product was good until one day I used it for calling n the person on other end of call was not able to hear my voice at all though I heard her perfectly clear. Tried again with other call n same thing happened. And also I couldn't record my voice by using it. So just good for hearing music coz mic doesn't work. :(

name: KK18
title: Great headphones with average build quality!
content: The earphones sit so well in my ear, they're so comfortable!. The sound quality and bass is also great.. However, reduced 1 star for the build quality. The body is quite flimsy and I'm hoping its long lasting. Typical Chinese build.

name: Kishore Kittu
title: Waste product
content: I buyed it August first week by the second week of September it stopped working only one earphone is working for me right now.so pls don't buy it they are selling the cheap quality earphones.Dont waste your money by buying these waste products .

name: Sumith S
title: JBL
content: Best product from JBL for this price range. Excellent bass and sound quality and good noice cancellation

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headphone Jack malfunction
content: Unfortunately after my yesterdays good feedback, the jack of the headphone suddenly stopped functioning this afternoon....I am sure this must be malfunction internally....For which I wouldnt want to degrade the rating...Will be requesting Amazon for a replacement expecting that they would consider my exception

name: AMIT KUMAR BHADE
title: Awesome sound.
content: JBL is famous for their Sound and hell yeah it was providing Hd quality music... You'll never ever think of other earphones at this price expect than JBL.. This earphone is worth money but not that much durable.. If you can invest more go for JBL T210 it was Awesome everything is great.

name: Aishwarya T
title: Good
content: A little costly but has good design product is as shown in the pictures..great bass and noise cancellation.angled earphones...it has a little plastic like thing to avoid wire tangles..2sets of extra buds are given..

name: Gurpartap singh
title: Very good clarity and bass...go for it
content: These earphones sound quality is very good,there is equal amount of vocal and bass together and treble is little high.there is no distortion of audio at high volume.

name: AMARESH KUMAR SAHU
title: Mic stopped working within 4 months.
content: Headphone is working fine. Sound quality is decent. But Mic stopped working within 4 months. Difficult to claim warranty for the same. I will not recommend this earphone with mic. Earlier also i had faced the same problem with the Mic.

name: Shruthi venkatesh
title: Left side ain't good.
content: Initially it was really good but a month passed and the left side headphone is not as good as the right side one. It has good noise cancelation quality and and moderately good bass quality. But what pains me is the left side headphone.

name: Noctis
title: Ok.. for the price.
content: The quality is ok for the price but it lacks bass. If you've used a higher end earphones before, this has literally no bass at all. The highs and the mids are average I would say. If you are on a tight budget then only u should buy it.

name: Pranay bawne
title: Awesome product, must buy
content: The packing was superb, and the product was delivered on time..... The sound quality is really very good, noise cancellation is of top level, but the bass is not that Deep.... (Also recieved extra ear tips of different sizes). If you are a music lover, who would love to enjoy loud music and decent bass, these are the earphones for u.... Overall would give 4.5/5

name: Saravanan
title: Well its a good headphone.with some pros and cons
content: The headset is loud enough....The base is also good enough for the price point.it would have been perfect if the volume caontrols were present in the headset itself.bcz you have to take your phone all the time instead of just a click.over.build could have been better.

name: Bhargav
title: Review after 3 days of usage
content: I had a Sony earphone and wanted to replace it with JBL. However it's a not a clear match for sound quality. Noise cancellation is in par. Bass quality is ok. You cannot expect a premium quality at this rate.

name: Aamir mateen
title: Wire quality is like low budget earphone
content: The wire quality is not good it is like low budget earphone ,base is awesome you can feel every beats & the voice is okay like if you are a base lover then it,s awesome but if you are someone who listen to vocal songs then you,ll be a disappointed.Lastly not supporting with my redmi note 5 pro

name: nithin chowdary
title: Jbl again nailed it.
content: Amazing product with decent lows, incredible mids and highs..noise cancellation works good, no issues with micro phone.. I think built quality could be better, rest everything is worth it.. I like most:. No unnessesary bass drop (only situational).. Noise cancelation.. Crystal clear vocals.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Simply superb
content: Extremely crystal clear sound on headphone. What differentiates this piece of art is its mic. I sing on smule and having tried multiple mics nothing comes even close to the clarity of sound i achieve with this along with great filter. I have in fact bought me multiple of these as spare just in case

name: Navaneeth Rajan
title: A great headset for the price
content: A great headset at a great price . The sound quality is adequate . Noise cancellation is satisfying . Good for long hours of calls and longer hours of music . The build quality is good , but not suitable for rough use . The quality can be felt even at the lowest volume possible .

name: Kenny
title: Delicate but really good.
content: Amazing headphones, and definitely serves the purpose but it is quite delicate. My cat could rip the wires apart quite easily (nothing that can't be fixed with a bit of insulation tape), so you'll have to be really careful with these headphones.

name: Ashish Bisarya
title: Awesome quality of sound, wire could have been worked upon
content: Awesome product. Though made in China, hopefully that fix would take a while. But an absolute music to ears.

name: Adarsh P Deep
title: Nyc but.....
content: It is a very good and cheap product. The sound quality is very good. I have been using this product for an year and the high material quality sill haven't caused any damage for the item. But due to long use in high volume, the clarity of the bass has been reduced. For me it is a very profitable headset. Due to clarity problem I am goin to buy a new jbl t160 . Jbl is the brand we can trust for both cheap and costlier product.

name: MIR A.
title: Jack is pretty weak
content: The good thing about the headphone is that the sound quality is upto the standard of JBL. Along with that it's light weight and easy on ears. However the bad thing about it is the jack. The quality of the Jack used it way below standard. Even the slightest touchs begin to output sad sound. Need to work on that.

name: ARUN
title: Stopped working within 4 months
content: Everthing was going good. But suddenly one moment it completely stopped working. Very disappointing.

name: Nishant
title: Not up to the mark
content: Not up to mark. Sound quality is not that great. Bass is just OK.. In simple words, I didn't like it.

name: Mayur
title: Sound quality
content: It's a great earphones with the price it comes. I liked how it get fit on my ear. I haven't felt noise cancellation much but it still work on some places. For working out it's not best to buy they can easily fell off. Sound quality is what makes this earphone best in the category.

name: Shashank Kumar
title: Received fake product
content: I believe I have received a fake product.. I have been using JBL earphones for quite sometime now and was satisfied with the quality.. But the product I received this time is totally fake and built quality is just pathetic.. It has no bass and sounds like cheap Chinese knock off!

name: BJ
title: very long time usable with great sound quality
content: I was first confused with jblc100si or boat 225 . But chose this one after reading reviews . If you are a movie watcher you can go for this one . You can use it for long time without discomfort ,but bass is little less than boat 225 . If your a music lover u need bass u can go for boat 225 .

name: Narendra
title: It is good for 6 months to 1 year
content: This is worked for 6 months then had an issue with wire quality was not good, not worthy for rug use, we need to handle smoothly

name: Tarun Goyal
title: Best earphones
content: Good Budget earphones you can have.. durability of this earphones are very great I have been using it since two years and it is outputing the same quality as the day one.

name: Anwar Muhammad
title: Exellent product at low price from good brand JBL
content: good sound quality, excellent performance,,light weight,,feel better,,, affordable price among JBL products. build quality look like fine,,how long it will last need to know because I just start using this product around two months.

name: Shree SJ
title: Good quality üëç
content: The product is very good. I am using it past one month. I put 4 star because of sound quality is excellent but noise cancellation is little bit okay.

name: Somdutta Das
title: Best budget in-ear headphone
content: This is the best budget in-ear headphone i have ever used...nice product from JBL and its sound quality is just awesome, i just loved it...i used almost 2 years and then i changed my headphone and also bought another JBL headphone...thank you JBL thank you Amazon.in

name: MOHAN DEV
title: Awesome product!!!!
content: well great product as cmpared to its competitors in the same price range, I have earlier used Philipps earphones , but this one seems to be a lot better in sound quality than those(In the same price range)

name: Subhashish
title: JBL Ear phone
content: Performance is ok..but price appears to be on higher side.One of my friend is using much cheaper ear phone costing less than Rs 400 but is giving fairly good performance.

name: Raghunandan Rao
title: Five Stars
content: It's awesome; just wondering how long before it goes kaput because of handling. ... And I for my answer in 6 months. Not at all durable. One speaker has stopped working. No clue about the warranty.

name: Phalak
title: Seems like its not original
content: I have baught the same jbl headphone in white colour that one was awsome but the one i hav recived in black color seems like its not original and quality of the product was not like my first jbl headphone which i baught 6 months ago from amazon

name: Achal Rajyaguru
title: Not much bass but has clear Vocals
content: The music audio is very clear. Bass is close to none. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend if you‚Äôre a bass head. If you appreciate songs lyrics or just listening to video lectures like me you‚Äôll love it.

name: Trupti
title: Microphone stopped working in 2 months
content: The noise cancellation is good as the ear phones fit perfectly in the ear. The sound quality is good too. But the microphone stopped working just in 2 months. This is not expected in a product from JBL.

name: Sagar
title: a very good deal
content: this is a good product..used before also previous one is 5yrs old still working nicely.so bought again.

name: Rahul Unecha
title: Very good earphones.
content: Has very good sound quality. Bass quality is also very good. There is also good amount of noise cancellation. Mic and overall quality also feels good. Overall one of the best earphones to buy in this price range. For me only thing missing is volume control buttons.

name: Satvinder Singh
title: Worst product.....
content: Worst product.... Sound quality "hahahahaha" i think if i purchase 70‚Çπ 80‚Çπ ear headset frm roadshop is much better than this product.... After recieving product sudden request for replacement.... Amazon is such a good app for online shoppin bt i didnt expect for this type of product issue.. material quality is also worst... I dont want to give a single star for this bt its a policy to give u...

name: Pradip S.
title: It's good
content: I had bought this on sale which cost me around Rs.600. In this price range it is one of the best. You will get mic also.. My only concern is about wire. It's not tangle free. We have to keep it carefully so as to not get tangled.

name: Ayush shrivastav
title: About working
content: Actually it very comfortable for ears for long listening like songs and movies and sound quality is far better than others bass seems to be little bit good and noise cancellation I am not satisfied which can be more better to be seen

name: ashwin sharma
title: Good earphones, no volume buttons
content: I think these are super. I only wish they also came with volume control buttons which is why I took away a star. Otherwise, I enjoy tuning into music with these earphones.

name: Siddharth Singh
title: Always provide review comment after 6-7 month using product .
content: Durability is major concern before one years one side sound stopped working but I am not India so not possible to replace .. Always provide review comment after 6-7 month using product .

name: Sovon Singha
title: Amazing sound quality at this price
content: Overall a good headphon at this price range. You will also get kind of noise cancellation. Though I also feel wire quality is little bit on thinner side so if not careful you may break to wire very easily.

name: Ankit saxena
title: sound quality Awesome
content: i am using JBl last several years this product i ordered 4th time its very good headphones and the quality also,. sound , bass everything is good , i mostly use this item when i ride my bike

name: Visu Sharma
title: Paisa Vasool
content: The earphone is of best quality with superior sound and built quality.... Don't think much.. Just go for it.. best earphone in this price range.

name: Ishan
title: You can purchase but quality is cheap
content: , product delivery is good sound quality is best but the material is Suchi it fell out after 2 days the mic stop working and the cable from right here is being out from shoulder

name: A_shopper
title: Jbl headphones
content: Not able to judge whether its real jbl or not but overall good product at decent price

name: Rohit Kori
title: Just go for it !!
content: I bought this earphones and boat Bassheads 220 extra bass wired ear phone( In the ear) together just to compare the sounds. JBL bass is much better , light weight and sound quality is just awesome. According to me Best in market as of now. Boat earbuds are little heavy , comes out if you don't put it in properly .

name: shashwat singh
title: Best in this range
content: Decent Bass and volume. Good in noise cancellation also. The only problem in the earphones is the mic placement which is at the junction below your chin. So sometimes you have to hold the mic before speaking.

name: Vinod
title: Overall sound quality and the especial thumping bass is perfect.
content: Material quality is good. Sound quality is best with thumping bass. Ear buds are perfectly fits into ear. The cable length is short as compared with other standard earphones. Durability not known because I have purchased this earphone just a month back. Let's see how many days it sustain .

name: Isai Dilip
title: Everything is nice expect bulid quality and the bass is little less
content: Sound quality is too good -4.7/5. Noise cancellation is good -4.3/5. Bulid quality is okk -3.7/5. Bass is also okk -4/5. I have bought this earphones at rs 549 , this are excellent earphones for those who want sound quality with perfect fitting in ears and very comfortably

name: Mahesh Chaturvedi
title: Best one to buy
content: Great product by jbl good bass and sound quality. The life of the earphones depend on the usage. If you are using it roughly it will be damaged in a short period of time but if you use it properly it will last a long time.

name: Steve K
title: Cool üëçüèº
content: Very well balanced sound. No frequency too overpowering. Material is also not bad. I wish it came with angled jack.. The worst experience I faced with this order was the time it took to reach me. A solid 17 days!

name: Amit
title: Mic reception is very poor
content: Mic is not up to the mark, you have to hold it close to your mouth, to make it catch your voice. Sound quality is just okay with bass on the lower side. Overall it is not solving its purpose of being a Mobile Headset.

name: Mohsin Akram Ansari
title: Superb experience with the earphone
content: This product got delivered to me 2 days ago in good packaged condition. Voice quality, bass effects is just excellent. Specially designed ear tip always stick to ears. Superb sound, Happy with this product.

name: Aditya Kumbhar
title: Good sound quality.
content: Sound quality is very good,. Your ear wont get uncomfortable even after long time hearings music... Its good quality in sound. But wires get tangle easily. So need to carefully untangle the wire so that wire should not break from speaker. Strength seems to be low quality.

name: Rajkumari@s
title: Not to the expectations.
content: Not satisfied with the product. I had lots of expectations being JBL brand. But it's painful in ear and not fitting and it's not bass sound at all but more like stereo type. Cheap earphone sounds better than thia.

name: Chirag
title: Lost in the echo...
content: Mind blowing sound. Bass is adequate and mid and highs are handled flawlessly!!! Recommended to everyone who wants to buy an earphones under 1k. For all those confused amongst 1more , sennheiser and sony, you won't be disappointed with this.

name: Karna Bhatt
title: Decent earphones for 550‚Çπ
content: Wire looks thin. I doubt about the durability of the earphones. Bass, treble has good balance. Vocals sound crystal clear and overall sound has no harshness or bluntness.

name: Manish Srivastava
title: Poor Bass, not for listening music
content: It does not have goodBass, I expected a good bass as per this price.. Can only be used for calls... not designed to listen music

name: Nitin Jain
title: Best buy under budget!
content: Signature JBL sound. The cables are thin and sensitive. Form of the inline microphone button makes it difficult to access while driving, running, etc. Everything well except these.

name: Souvik Dutta
title: Big boost bass
content: Super duper bass world class sound quality but there is problem that is it's built quality is not good.I aspect a better built quality product in this price. You want to hear jbl sound you can hear it but if you need a good built quality product sorry that is not for you. You can get better options in this prize.

name: Anand Goud
title: Worth for money...hood product
content: I took this product 10days ...sound nice....looking very good..compare to bot headset....this is the best one I took...in recent days...song n quality...if u want to but headset....go fir this...u dont feel bad after buying this...thanks jbl

name: @jbl
title: Good quality
content: Good quality product and value for money..i purchased it 2 yrs ago but now this earphone is not working due to defect in one side of the earphone..wire quality needs work..it is not bad but it can be better... Now i purchased jbl c200si i will share my review about that in few days...

name: Tanveer Aziz
title: Good for hearing documentry
content: Good for listning documentry but not for long term listning music noice cancelation is best .But still in this range it is the best .I cancelled it and ordered jbl T 50

name: Rishabh Pundir
title: Great product.
content: These earphones are really - really awesome. You will feel the crispiness of the audio and even the slightest of noises in the movies. And the earphones built is sturdy with appropriate length given for the connector.

name: S
title: Highly disappointed!
content: One side stopped working after just 3 months of purchase. Did not expect this from a JBL product. I should have instead bought a local earphone, might have lasted longer than this one. Very disappointed and I don't even see a link to report also to claim warranty!

name: Nishant Sharma
title: Perfect Bass. You get three pairs of ear buds ...
content: Purchased this Earphones a year back. Still working perfectly. Perfect Bass. You get three pairs of ear buds according to your ear size. I loved this.Also recommended two of my friends to get this. The best you can get in INR 700. Just go for it. You won't regret it.

name: Naina
title: Not worth the money - one earphone stopped working in six months
content: Potential to be a great product, except this is not worth your time -- even if it's JBL. One of the earphones randomly stopped working as soon as six months passed.

name: Anubhav Singh
title: Amazing sound quality!
content: Good product. Classy and amazing sound esp the bass. No wonder why do people write negative reviews. Value for money. JBL rocks !

name: Elex
title: Good earphone but without Bass factor
content: Amazing sound quality.. Good clarity of sound but please take a note that there is almost no bass in this piece. NO BASS. Mic is functioning well, no need to adjust while taking calls on it. Wire length is also optimum.. Hope it helps

name: Rahul Pathak
title: Earphone stopped working
content: One of side of the earphone stopped working within 3 months of purchase, is it an original piece from Amazon? Amazon, you must check authenticity of this JBL product. Let me know the process to get this replaced.

name: User
title: Bad build quality
content: It's a decent earphone in terms of sound quality. When it comes to build quality this one doesn't score. Keeps giving issues and stops working in no time

name: Amazon Customer
title: Its the best product ever
content: Its the best product ever.... Its been more than year still the best ... Just go for it you will be happy with this product

name: Tarun
title: great for the money
content: great balance between mids and highs. bass is present and its clear not at all muddy. build quality is more than average. sound quality is great. mic quality is phenomenal. remote functions are good

name: ArpitP
title: Bad
content: I had to get them replaced after they stopped working after 2-3 months of purchase.JBL took almost 4 months to replace them

name: Cdt. Sagar Deka
title: Nice earphone With nice sound quality.üëå
content: One of the best earphone from JBL. When i ordered the earphone i was thinking that how will be the earphone. and i seen lots of reviews on youtube. Lots of Big youtuber given positive reaction. And the sound quality is better material is good. and also the earphone look awesome. Thanks To JBL and so thanks to Amazon.

name: Ranjan B
title: Doesn't pain your ears
content: Good functional product. Mainly bought this thinking it will not hurt ears for long calls and the design and shape just takes care of this. Only problem is the rubber beeds come off. Spares provided are of not same colour

name: Pavan Motupalli
title: Not preferable..
content: The product design was cool, but the inbuilt sound quality was too worse, thoug they mentioned "noise cancellation" as its speciality, it is the first defect that i have observed in this product

name: Rick kundu chaudhury
title: Upsetting
content: It's already been 6months. For this 6months it was great. The build was quite good, sound and base was pretty awesome. But after so many days it stopped working the mic is not functioning, now the right side have no function. And there the product fail it's not for long term investment!

name: Vishwajit Singh
title: Good Sound Quality, Average Build Quality, Very Light Weight and Comfortable.
content: Earlier I was using Sony MDR-XB510AS but this JBL Earphone costed me less than one-third the price of that Sony Earphone. JBL has almost same sound quality but much poorer build quality compared to the Sony Earphone that I used. Fits Nicely and is comfortable because of its light weight.

name: Mukesh K
title: Mic and earphone not working
content: I just bought this JBL ear phone and it's mic is not working and also in my phone this is it working correctly sound is Not coming in ear phone. i have requestd for return as I was told by amazon refund is not possible for electronics item .

name: Sandelbert
title: CHEAP PRODUCT üòë
content: Cheap Quality product... if you want to use it for just 2 to 3 weeks then go ahead and buy it.... or else this product is a total waste of money. Period.

name: Deepa
title: Not a very reliable earphone..sound quality good though
content: Headphones worked well for about 6 months however now I don‚Äôt hear any sound from the left earpiece. It‚Äôs very irritating.. Looks like it‚Äôs time to buy a new one

name: Abhyuday
title: Worth the Money.
content: It comes with the trust if JBL. The sound quality and acoustics are great. I would recommend these. The price range is appropriated for this product. Also the color that it comes in is unique and not like the usual black ones. It is funky.

name: Srishti S.
title: Great earphones
content: Sound is balanced. And bass is good enough too. Great choice in this range. Worked for 2 years exactly. No complaints.

name: Praveen
title: Poor Bass, stopped working after 2 months
content: Bought this seeing positive reviews. Not satisfied from Day 1.. Bass was too poor when compared to Samsung EG920.. Wire quality too seems fragile.. After 2 months, one side not working.. Only positive thing is the sound qulaity was smooth in ears.

name: Aviral Jain
title: Great sound, Durable, best earphones
content: A perfect earphones especially with mic.. Sound quality as expected from jbl is good.. Have been using from a year and no defect or degradation in the quality so far. Recommend several others for the same.

name: GOWTHAM
title: Worth for money
content: Resonable price and sound quality was excellent ...mike was small and audio was clear while making calls ....only disadvantage was there is no volume button ....otherwise worth for money ...

name: Vara prasad
title: Facing problems with Mike while making phone calls
content: All is good but I am facing problem with Mike I purchased it few days back only i thought jbl is very big and quality with responsibility compeny but see now what happened to me while attempting phone calls I am facing problems with Mike its not receiving voice properly can you suggest anything to me what to do

name: A user
title: Good headphones.
content: Good headphones..Clarity and bass is good..only drawback is microphone is quite far unlike previous JBL earphones..Quality wise product is good..

name: ram
title: Regretting after buying
content: Average bass quality medium noise cancellation.when you listen music or watch videos unwanted noises from the wire itself comes and irritate you.if the wire comes in contact with anything it produces noise which is not normally seen in earphones like Samsung, Nokia

name: Abhishek Kurri
title: Worth buying this product in 2019
content: Most Trusted product on amazon.. Products delivered before the estimated time and day.. Suggestion-wire quality can be impove. Otherwise the product is simply awesome üòä

name: alok
title: Good quality
content: Its good product nice sound original as well as they give you addiyional two pair of buds with diffrent sizes to suit your ear comfort

name: Mandar Phatak
title: It's. A JBL product....
content: Great value for money, bass quality is great,. Silicon cups fit perfectly in ear and has very much enough cable length.. also has a mic to make and receive calls directly....

name: babul banerjee
title: Poor quality JBL ear phone
content: I purchase this on 19 July from 5th August onward it's giving me trouble. Right part sound is totally off and the big issue is 10 days return window is off ( was upto 29 July).. One year warranty is there but it is totally west of money and time.. Poor quality product in Amazon.

name: senotrius
title: Would recommend it for the price of
content: Fit is right.as is the weight. Would recommend it for the price of 600-700inr

name: Rupam Samanta
title: Awesome sound quality
content: 12 months ago I'm not a Jbl fan but now I'm a huge fan of Jbl. It's build quality is good & sounds is awesome & buzz is not bad. But when you every day listen song very loud then the sound comes slow. 2 times I change my earphone from Service center.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound Quality wise Below average product
content: Very disappointed with JBL. Sound quality is below average, not for Bass lovers. Even Jagadeesh Market, Abids 150 -200 Rupees local earphones sounds better than this earphones. May be users who rated high they don't know much about sound quality... Don't buy this go for other options...

name: Devna
title: Good product.
content: I liked that the same is of very light weight. If we raise the sound to the maximum the sound starts to quiver a bit.. Other than that good product

name: Ankit Verma
title: Good but Not L Shaped wire at end
content: Earphone is of good quality. But one issue is that wire at end that's at jack is straight. Straight wire gets damaged easily. It should be L Shaped at end.

name: Yaman
title: Goos sound quality
content: If you want to listen to quality music this jbl piece delivers what it promises. Noise cancellation is very good. Black color look is top notch.. Bass is good for this price range. (Bass lovers can go for little premium peoduts than this)

name: Sreekanth
title: Need to be improve the service
content: All fine but when ever if I placed an order I'm not getting probably something will getting damage or some issues I hope this is couple of times I'm facing the problem in feature I don't want face this kind. Today I placed an order sandal let's see how the service will work

name: AMAR BIR SINGH
title: Excellent product at this price
content: the sound quality is crystal clear with decent bass. Pleasant to ears.No doubt it is a good choice for music lovers

name: Arpit Sharma
title: Great earphone, great price.

name: Aayush Rajpurohit
title: Great,Great,Great....Matlab all in one ;Base,sound , comfortable and Design. üëçü§ô

JBL launches this earphone and again prove it, he is a King Of Electronic Brand .. AMAZON are great price to deliver every items and very easy Way.

name: Mayur khadse
title: Worst earphones ever
content: Worst earphones ever. There is no decent bass. Sound magic earphones are better at this price.. I didn't know JBL would be this bad. Not meant for long use. You feel irritated by the sound. Probably seller sent me a 1st copy product.

name: Manas Eapen
title: Value for money
content: Value for money through and through.. Best budget earphones.. Got it for 599.. Great sound quality.. Good for taking voice calls as well.

name: Santosh K.
title: Amazing!!
content: I am writing an review after one year of its use, so it definitely sums up the value of the product. You can use it ruggedly, it won't change the sound quality.

name: Adnan H.
title: Very good earphones for everything. Also for PUBG
content: AFTER TWO WEEKS USAGE.. these are the best earphone with superb soung quality.. These have a balanced audio with balanced bass and treble.. I BUYED THESE FOR PUBG MOBILE and i can hear every single detail in the game .. I also haer music with these FEELS LIKE A LIVE SOUND.. YOU MUST GO FOR IT .. BUT THE CABLE IS NOT DURABLE TOO MUCH.. IT COULD BE BROKEN IF TAKEN CARE CARELESSLY.

name: ROSHNI DASTUR
title: Replacement will not help in solving the problem.
content: The pin which fits into my Samsung J7 Max mobile is very loose. Hence there is a problem with the sound. If you replace this product with a similar one it will not help in improving on the sound quality as the same problem will persist. Please help me in solving this problem. Thanks.

name: Sanchari
title: Amplified sound
content: Sound quality is amazing. Bass quality is great. Noise cancellation is average but considering it is In-ear headphones I would say noise tune-out is good. Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase! JBL sells quality sound equipments and this perfect example.

name: Udhayakumar
title: Poor Mic Quality
content: The make quality of the Mic is not up-to the mark, after an rainy evening drive from office to home the mic stopped working, as i feel water mite have blogged the hole but since then it stopped working. My image on JBL gone down.. I have used many ear phones which was wet many times but those were working fine in many instances but JBL not able to survive even for one time.

name: Great deal..
title: 100% satisfied with the product
content: Very good quality of product, from a very long time I was searching a good product like this, finally I m satisfied with this product..

name: Arenla
title: Very bad sound quality
content: Very bad sound quality .. I m disappointed with JBL for otherwise I am very keen on JBL products but this experience has really impact my views.

name: Himanshu Rai
title: Average quality

name: Jignesh Sakariya
title: Its average product. Just name is JBL and made in China
content: I purchased with JBL name but nothing special. Its average product. Sound quality and noise cancellation is also ok. Nothing difference. Don't keep high expectation because name is JBL.

name: ANIKET CHOUDHARY
title: The best earphones under 700....

And guess what now i love those earphones i increased the bass and sound was already crystal clear.... Really these are the only headphones under 700 which gives you such a well balanced audio...

name: MAYANK
title: For often use , Good Product

name: Pushpender Jindal
title: Good product

name: Sailee Dorle
title: Go for it

name: nagendra
title: üëéüëéüëéüëéüëé
content: Just i used for 4 months right side earphone not wrkng, we r preffering branded headset because good qiality and long lasting.if The company providing such products means definetly automaticallyit will loose its brand. I will definitely tell 2 my frnds not 2 buy jbl ear phns anymore

name: Ramesh.R
title: good product but bass quality could better
content: Overall good product, plastic quality is good, sound and noise cancellation also good. Bass quality could be better though for this price bracket.. Thanks!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice product with low price. After high sound, it's coming outside headphone so it can be ignored

name: Shailendra Singh

name: Amazon Customer

content: I bought twice this item, for the first time i guessed it might be usage issue. Even same repeated in the second time. JBL is not suitable for iphone products. Your phone headset PIN will get damaged and if you use any other headphone after JBL they will also stop working.

name: Ohidul Islam
title: Review after more than a year.
content: I love listening songs and I am using it for more than a year now....i can say that,it is one of the best product in this price range... previously i was using senheiser cx180 ..but i can say i liked this one ...go for it...a must buy..

name: Hari T.
title: Short and Full Review
content: The Sound quality is perfect.. Bass is also very fine.. Noice Cancelation is good.. But the only problem is the quality of the Earphone.. The wire is pretty weak.. You cannot use it rough and tough.. But overall, Good Earphones at this price range.

name: Sanket B.
title: Suggest to buy this.üòÅ
content: I'm reviewing this product after 10 months. The product is too good at every stage whether you count the music clearity or durability. I've bought at 699/- suggest you to don't go further. The cord is thin and light to carry. You should carry the box to put in it. Thanks.

name: p.subramani
title: Quality product.
content: How some sound quality , no noise interrupted and super bass . already I having this .but lost the same hence buying new one. No doubt to purchase. clearly I recommended to purchase the same.

name: Rohith Kiran
title: Good one for this price range

name: Amaanul h.
title: Great product.
content: This is a great pair of earphone.material quality is good.sound dosent have the most bass but the clarity is awesome.durability is great have been using for couple of months nothing gone wrong. Would recommend.

name: Asif a.
title: Poor bulit quality
content: Physical quality or bulit quality of the product is really bad...my product has been damaged within one month.. .. .. I was satisfied with the sound quality but this headset have poor built quality.. .. .. I can't claim for warranty because it is a physical damage.. .. Poor quality product. So disappointed with the jbl.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic experience with earphone and even worse from customer care center
content: After use of 3 months, both earphones r not working. Very bad quality as 3 months not working. No one is giving proper answers at customer care centre. Even not picking up phone in AHMEDABAD service center. Overall bad rating. It's not indian product or international standard product

name: Rishi
title: Super noise cancellation and deep bass
content: An awesome product by jbl this is a wonderful product by JBL. It is very excellent on terms of noise cancellation and bass. After using JBL endurance run I felt this product is awesome u will just love it. I bought it at a price of 699/- but it is god level earphone at such a price.

name: VIJAY
title: Excellent quality earphones for a reasonable price

name: White Horse
title: Good bass, low volume, not suitable for calls
content: Volume is low compared to Sennheiser and other in-ear phones, Bass is good.. Not suitable for calls / meeting because of eco while you speak, this could be due to fully enclosed ear tips.. Over all good for listening just songs.

name: Niranjan
title: Best headphones in its price point.

name: Siddharth
title: Good sound, average build quality, not adequate bass

name: Tanya singh
title: Sound durability

name: Prathamesh
title: JBL.. The quality you can't resist..

name: K.P
title: Worth buying earphone but bad servicing and product durability.....
content: Worth buying... Entry 3 months after buying product: But just a bit less bass else a great product. Entry 7 months after buying product: All of a sudden the left earplug sound started decreasing and now its nearly inaudible.When asked for service centre to amazon 3 numbers were given by then 2 numbers are always busy and the 3rd one isnt working properly and no service centre nearby and no replies to mails given yet

name: GOLAM AZAM

And I'm not satisfied with the quality of wire.. Meanwhile it's going to complete 1 year of purchase the product ,and there is no warranty of the product.. Now what will i do????

name: Noyal Jose
title: Sound and listening features are ok but built quality is poor and unsatisfactory

name: BHIMSHA KOLI

name: nikhil

name: Parth Tomar

Cons: Not sure about durability, left piece is already starting to have minor feedback. Also length of the cord could have been more for comfort.

name: sunny kumar
title: Not Satisfied  Not Good only brand value

name: Shivangi

name: Kartik Dalal
title: Average earphones

name: Abhishek Singh

name: Plaban Datta

name: Praveen
title: Good

name: shailesh sinha

name: Amazon Customer

name: Adhya
title: Great purchase

name: Arun Prakash R

name: Vandy

name: Kapil
title: JBL- nice sound but not very comfortable

The sound quality of JBL is better, but the 1more are more comfortable and I can wear them all day long without any problem.

name: Anil KD
title: Good

name: G Subramaniam

content: I have been using this since 18months, recently the cable got damaged as I used to keep it folded in my pocket and both phones stopped working. Otherwise the bass just bangs your ears like anything, good product from JBL. Just keep it safe after use that's my advise to the buyers.:)

name: Aman poddar
title: Products are not good

name: aleen

name: nilotpal

name: Utkarsh Jain

name: Shreyasi M.

title: Worst earphone i have ever get online.

name: Amazon Customer

name: Amazon Customer

name: Sunny kumar

name: Manoj Tawarawala

name: Lady Sharon
title: JBL C100SI In-Ear Headphones

name: IK Reddy

name: SANDESH
title: STOPED WORKING..
content: Dear Amazon Team, I have buyed this product in July month. But in just 5 months the mice and both ear plugs stopped working.. As it is in warranty I wanted to replace it but due to lack of time availability it's not possible. Kindly help me out so I can further trust on Amazon product's.

name: Prashant Dixit

name: Matthew

name: Prathamesh T.

name: Prateek

name: Md W.
title: Good one.

name: Pankaj Kumar

name: Amazon Customer

name: Amazon Customer

name: Parteek sharma

content: They are worth every penny spent. A must buy. I used them for 1.2 year. Even after that I just lost it's earpiece otherwise still working like a charm.

name: goofi paruchuri
title: Issue with contacting Manufacturers, service center and warranty claim.
content: I Have bought head phones on April 1st its worked good for somedays almost 48 days but suddenly left headset is not working and this product has one year replacement warranty but Unable to claim warranty.

name: Dwaipayan Ghosh
title: Very Poor quality product .
content: Material quality is very poor , sound quality is good , durability is at list 9 month , I used 4 headphones of this model all are very similar in durability ... Very sad Jbl .

name: Irfan
title: Good for only couple of months
content: Initially this product is good and within few months right ear stopped working.! I've been trying out everything but couldn't fix it.! If there's any warranty provided I want a replacement for it.! Or atleast to fix the problem.!

name: Sumit
title: It's built quality is good. But bass is not upto mark as written

name: Subhash Saini
title: Poor quality product with the branded name.
content: The volume automatically gets reduce and we can't here the opponent. The opponent also not able to here us.. Really very poor quality product deliver to me. I have taken 2 earphones and facing the same problems after 2 months only. If possible please replace.

name: Elton Hurtis
title: Low on the Bass
content: Good product, the music quality could've been a bit better. This is not for the bass boost people

name: Dharmesh D.
title: Defective & Used product received

name: P.Tiwari
title: Sound output good, built quality cheap
content: The sound quality is really impressive. Good bass with surround sound.. However the built quality is extremely poor and feels really cheap. Boats at same cost provides much better material, with non-interminging cable, that's thread like. I don't see much life in these earphones.

name: Varun
title: Loved it
content: A balanced sound with Bass and treble, little bit problem with build quality of wire as it's not that good like Sony but overall if you use it with care then it can be a better option for you at a reasonable price

name: Mrinal R
title: Low Performance

name: Biswajit chakraborty
title: Excellent
content: After used 15 days :-. This is for bass lover. Bass quality is above excellent.vocal is very clear.and mic also very clear.but i think this headphone not work properly as a noice cancelation.

name: gurushankar19
title: Average bass, good volume,
content: I used one day delivery and it came on time. The bass is average. It fits good in ear. The noice cancellation is good. Good for the rate. If you are a music lover and you don't need microphone, then i suggest you to use Sennheiser cx180, which has very good sound quality with amazing bass.

name: chaitanya
title: Reviewing after using of nine months
content: Superb ..,I purchased twice skull candy before using of jbl ....but both skull candy ear phones gone with in six months ...skull candy sound quality is good but durability is very low ..I am using jbl since 9 months it's very good in quality and even in durability....

name: Rahul
title: Good but not great
content: premium sound quality under 50% volume. bass is not good for loud listners.But for this price segment this earphone is best.

name: Hemant S
title: awesome sound but average design

name: Swapnil
title: Won't buy it again.
content: People to be honest, this was my 6 or 7th time to buy these earphones. Mesmerized by the quality before, I never looked at other products. However, now it seems JBL is not loyal to it's loyal customer base, hence the quality of the product is going down every time. Spend a few bucks more, go for something else.

name: Devang Vyas
title: Do not buy these!

name: ANKITA SANYAL
title: Not long lasting
content: The product is quite good but didn't last long. It has not been even five months that it has been damaged. I handle it with good care and still it is now only audible from one side. I didn't expect a product from a renowned company will turn out to be like this.

name: Vishal
title: Senhiser CX 180

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth for the price..
content: You would get a much better quality product at the same price. If you are looking for just a "brand name" this is fine.. Overall

name: KIRAN

name: sunil

name: Adhil

name: Rocker
title: Good

name: Amol lad
title: Customer support

name: Vishi
title: Great buy

name: Aswini Sahoo
title: 4 star

name: Yasu
title: Jbl headset

name: Amazon Customer
